english_meaning: to allocate a task or duty to someone

examples.english: The teacher assigned homework for the weekend.
examples.turkish: Öğretmen hafta sonu için ödev verdi.

examples.english: She was assigned a difficult project at work.
examples.turkish: İş yerinde zorlu bir proje atandı.

examples.english: They assigned roles to each team member.
examples.turkish: Her takım üyesine roller tahsis ettiler.

english_meaning: help or support

examples.english: The organization provides financial assistance to those in need.
examples.turkish: Kuruluş, ihtiyacı olanlara maddi yardım sağlar.

examples.english: He asked for assistance in completing the project.
Technical assistance is available 24/7.

english_meaning: a thing that is accepted as true or as certain to happen, without proof

examples.english: The plan was based on the assumption of increased sales.
Her assumption turned out to be correct.
We should question our assumptions before proceeding.

english_meaning: a positive declaration intended to give confidence; a promise

examples.english: The manager gave his assurance that the project would be completed on time.
examples.turkish: Yönetici, projenin zamanında tamamlanacağına dair güvence verdi.

examples.english: Her assurance helped to calm the nervous team.
examples.turkish: Onun verdiği güvence, gergin takımı sakinleştirdi.

examples.english: The company offers assurance of quality with every product.
examples.turkish: Şirket, her ürünle kalite garantisi sunar.

english_meaning: to tell someone something positively to dispel any doubts

examples.english: I assure you that everything will be fine.
examples.turkish: Her şeyin yolunda gideceğine emin ol.

examples.english: The doctor assured her that the procedure was safe.
examples.turkish: Doktor, işlemin güvenli olduğunu temin etti.

examples.english: He assured his clients that their investments were secure.
examples.turkish: Müşterilerine yatırımlarının güvende olduğunu temin etti.

english_meaning: extremely surprising or impressive; amazing

examples.english: The magician's tricks were truly astonishing.
It was an astonishing achievement in such a short time.
examples.turkish: Böylesine kısa sürede elde edilen sonuç hayret vericiydi.

examples.english: Her transformation over the years is astonishing.

english_meaning: protection granted by a nation to someone who has left their native country as a political refugee

examples.english: The refugee sought asylum in a neighboring country.
examples.turkish: Mülteci, komşu ülkeden sığınma talep etti.

examples.english: They applied for asylum due to political persecution.
examples.turkish: Siyasi zulüm nedeniyle sığınma talebinde bulundular.

examples.english: The asylum process can be very lengthy and complicated.
examples.turkish: Sığınma süreci oldukça uzun ve karmaşık olabilir.

english_meaning: physically strong, fit, and active

examples.english: She has an athletic build from years of training.
examples.turkish: Yıllarca antrenman yapmanın sonucu olarak atletik bir yapıya sahip.

examples.english: Athletic performance requires discipline and hard work.
examples.turkish: Atletik performans, disiplin ve sıkı çalışma gerektirir.

examples.english: He participated in several athletic competitions.

english_meaning: an extremely wicked or cruel act, typically one involving physical violence or injury

examples.english: The atrocities committed during the war shocked the world.
examples.turkish: Savaş sırasında işlenen vahşet, dünyayı şoke etti.

examples.english: They documented the atrocities in a detailed report.
Witnesses described the atrocity in harrowing detail.

english_meaning: an extra part or extension that is attached to something; a strong emotional bond

examples.english: She sent the document as an email attachment.
He developed a deep attachment to his hometown.
The attachment to the file was missing.

english_meaning: to succeed in achieving something; to reach

examples.english: She worked hard to attain her goals.
With determination, he attained a high level of success.
examples.turkish: Azimle, yüksek bir başarı düzeyine ulaştı.

examples.english: They finally attained the summit after a long climb.
examples.turkish: Uzun tırmanışın ardından nihayet zirveye ulaştılar.

english_meaning: the act of being present at a place or event

examples.english: The attendance at the concert was record-breaking.
Poor attendance can affect a student's grades.
They monitored the attendance of all participants.

english_meaning: to regard something as being caused by; a quality or feature regarded as a characteristic or inherent part of someone or something

examples.english: They attribute his success to hard work.
Honesty is a valued attribute in a leader.
examples.turkish: Dürüstlük, bir liderde değer verilen bir özelliktir.

examples.english: The artist's work is often attributed to his unique style.
examples.turkish: Sanatçının eseri genellikle onun benzersiz tarzına atfedilir.

english_meaning: a public sale in which goods or property are sold to the highest bidder

examples.english: The rare painting was sold at an auction for a high price.
examples.turkish: Nadir bulunan tablo, yüksek fiyata bir müzayedede satıldı.

examples.english: They attended the auction to bid on antique furniture.
examples.turkish: Antika mobilyalar için teklif vermek üzere müzayedeye katıldılar.

examples.english: The auction lasted for several hours.

english_meaning: relating to sound or the reproduction of sound

examples.english: They set up an audio system for the conference.
examples.turkish: Konferans için bir ses sistemi kurdular.

examples.english: The audio quality of the recording was excellent.
She prefers audio books over printed ones.
examples.turkish: Baskılı kitaplar yerine sesli kitapları tercih ediyor.

english_meaning: an official inspection of an organization's accounts, typically by an independent body

examples.english: The company underwent a thorough audit last year.
examples.turkish: Şirket geçen yıl kapsamlı bir denetime tabi tutuldu.

examples.english: Audits are essential to ensure financial transparency.
examples.turkish: Finansal şeffaflık sağlamak için denetimler şarttır.

examples.english: The audit report highlighted several discrepancies.
examples.turkish: Denetim raporu, birkaç uyumsuzluğu ortaya çıkardı.

english_meaning: genuine; real; not false or copied

examples.english: They serve authentic Italian cuisine at the restaurant.
examples.turkish: Restoranda otantik İtalyan mutfağı servis ediliyor.

examples.english: The museum displayed authentic artifacts from ancient times.
examples.turkish: Müze, antik dönemlere ait otantik eserleri sergiledi.

examples.english: He prefers authentic experiences over touristy attractions.
examples.turkish: Turistik yerler yerine otantik deneyimleri tercih eder.

english_meaning: to give official permission for or approval to (an undertaking or agent)

examples.english: The manager authorized the expenditure.
They were authorized to access the confidential files.
The government authorized the construction of a new highway.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, yeni bir otoyol inşaatına izin verdi.

english_meaning: an automobile; a car

examples.english: He bought a new auto last month.
examples.turkish: Geçen ay yeni bir araba aldı.

examples.english: The auto industry is facing significant changes.
examples.turkish: Otomobil sektörü önemli değişikliklerle karşı karşıya.

examples.english: She prefers driving an auto rather than taking public transportation.
examples.turkish: Toplu taşıma yerine araba kullanmayı tercih ediyor.

english_meaning: the right or condition of self-government; independence

examples.english: The region has been granted political autonomy.
Many students value the autonomy of university life.
examples.turkish: Birçok öğrenci, üniversite yaşamının özerkliğine değer verir.

examples.english: The company operates with a high degree of autonomy.

english_meaning: the season between summer and winter; fall

examples.english: The trees change color in autumn.
Autumn is the perfect season for scenic walks.
examples.turkish: Sonbahar, manzaralı yürüyüşler için mükemmel bir mevsimdir.

examples.english: He loves the crisp air of autumn.

english_meaning: the state of being able to be used or obtained; accessibility

examples.english: The availability of fresh water is a major concern.
examples.turkish: Taze suyun mevcudiyeti büyük bir endişedir.

examples.english: They checked the availability of rooms before booking.
examples.turkish: Rezervasyon yapmadan önce odaların mevcudiyetini kontrol ettiler.

examples.english: High availability of resources ensures smooth operations.
examples.turkish: Kaynakların yüksek mevcudiyeti, sorunsuz çalışmayı sağlar.

english_meaning: to wait for; to be in store for

examples.english: We await the final decision with anticipation.
examples.turkish: Son kararı büyük bir beklentiyle bekliyoruz.

examples.english: A challenging task awaits you.
They await the arrival of the guests.

english_meaning: knowledge or perception of a situation or fact

examples.english: Raising awareness about environmental issues is crucial.
examples.turkish: Çevre sorunları hakkında farkındalık oluşturmak çok önemlidir.

examples.english: He has a high level of awareness about current events.
examples.turkish: Güncel olaylar hakkında yüksek bir farkındalığı var.

examples.english: The campaign aims to increase awareness of health risks.
examples.turkish: Kampanya, sağlık riskleri konusunda farkındalığı artırmayı amaçlıyor.

english_meaning: causing difficulty, embarrassment, or inconvenience

examples.english: The silence during the meeting was awkward.
He felt awkward introducing himself to the group.
The hug turned out to be awkward and brief.

english_meaning: the setting or background for an event or scene

examples.english: The mountains provided a dramatic backdrop for the wedding.
examples.turkish: Dağlar düğün için dramatik bir arka plan oluşturdu.

examples.english: A beautiful backdrop of trees made the photo memorable.
examples.turkish: Ağaçların oluşturduğu güzel arka plan fotoğrafı unutulmaz kıldı.

examples.english: The play was set against the backdrop of a historic city.
examples.turkish: Oyun, tarihi bir şehrin arka planında geçti.

english_meaning: support or help, especially in financial terms

examples.english: The project received strong backing from investors.
Her campaign has the backing of several prominent figures.
examples.turkish: Kampanyası, birkaç önde gelen kişinin desteğini alıyor.

examples.english: The backing of the community was essential to the success of the initiative.
examples.turkish: Toplumun desteği girişimin başarısı için hayatiydi.

english_meaning: a reserve or extra supply; an alternative plan

examples.english: Always keep a backup of your important files.
examples.turkish: Önemli dosyalarınızın her zaman yedeğini saklayın.

examples.english: They prepared a backup plan in case of emergencies.
examples.turkish: Acil durumlar için yedek bir plan hazırladılar.

examples.english: The server failed, but the backup saved all the data.
examples.turkish: Sunucu arızalandı, ancak yedek tüm verileri kurtardı.

english_meaning: a small emblem or token worn to signify membership, achievement, or authority

examples.english: He proudly wore his badge during the ceremony.
The police officer's badge was shiny and new.
examples.turkish: Polis memurunun rozeti parlak ve yeniydi.

examples.english: At the conference, each participant received a badge.
examples.turkish: Konferansta, her katılımcıya bir rozet verildi.

english_meaning: the temporary release of an arrested person awaiting trial, often on the condition of a monetary guarantee

examples.english: He was released on bail while his trial was pending.
examples.turkish: Davanın beklemede olması nedeniyle kefaletle serbest bırakıldı.

examples.english: The judge set a high bail to ensure his appearance in court.
examples.turkish: Hakim, mahkemeye çıkmasını garanti altına almak için yüksek bir kefalet belirledi.

examples.english: Family and friends helped raise money for his bail.
examples.turkish: Ailesi ve arkadaşları onun kefaleti için para topladı.

english_meaning: being in a state of proper proportion or equilibrium

examples.english: A balanced diet is essential for good health.
examples.turkish: Dengeli bir diyet, iyi sağlık için gereklidir.

examples.english: She maintained a balanced lifestyle despite her busy schedule.
examples.turkish: Yoğun programına rağmen dengeli bir yaşam sürdürdü.

examples.english: The balanced approach to the problem yielded positive results.
examples.turkish: Probleme dengeli yaklaşmak olumlu sonuçlar verdi.

english_meaning: a highly technical form of dance with its own vocabulary based on French terminology

examples.english: She has been studying ballet since childhood.
The ballet performance was both graceful and precise.
They attended a ballet class at the community center.
examples.turkish: Toplum merkezinde bir bale dersine katıldılar.

english_meaning: a flexible bag that can be inflated with air or gas, used for decoration or as a toy

examples.english: Children love playing with colorful balloons.
examples.turkish: Çocuklar renkli balonlarla oynamayı çok sever.

examples.english: A giant balloon floated over the festival.
examples.turkish: Dev bir balon festivalin üzerinde süzüldü.

examples.english: He tied a balloon to his wrist so it wouldn’t float away.

english_meaning: a process of voting in writing in secret; the paper on which a vote is recorded

examples.english: The election was decided by a secret ballot.
Each voter received a ballot to cast their vote.
examples.turkish: Her seçmene oy kullanması için bir oy pusulası verildi.

examples.english: The ballot count took several hours to complete.
examples.turkish: Oy sayımı tamamlanması birkaç saat sürdü.

english_meaning: the state of being unable to pay one's debts; a legal process for declaring insolvent

examples.english: The company declared bankruptcy after years of financial struggles.
examples.turkish: Yıllarca süren mali sıkıntılardan sonra şirket iflas etti.

examples.english: Bankruptcy often leads to significant restructuring of the business.
examples.turkish: İflas, genellikle işletmenin önemli ölçüde yeniden yapılandırılmasına yol açar.

examples.english: He filed for bankruptcy to resolve his debts.
examples.turkish: Borçlarını çözmek için iflas başvurusunda bulundu.

english_meaning: a long strip of cloth bearing a slogan or design, used for advertising or decoration

examples.english: A large banner was displayed at the entrance of the fair.
examples.turkish: Fuarın girişinde büyük bir afiş sergilendi.

examples.english: The campaign banner caught everyone's attention.
They hung a banner across the street to promote the event.
examples.turkish: Etkinliği tanıtmak için sokağa bir afiş astılar.

english_meaning: without covering or clothing; minimal or basic

examples.english: The room was bare except for a single chair.
examples.turkish: Oda, tek bir sandalye dışında çıplaktı.

examples.english: He walked on the bare ground without shoes.
She gave a bare explanation of the facts.

english_meaning: only just; scarcely

examples.english: She barely managed to finish the race.
There was barely any food left after the party.
examples.turkish: Partiden sonra neredeyse hiç yiyecek kalmadı.

examples.english: He could barely hear what she was saying.

english_meaning: an agreement between parties as to what each will do for the other; a good deal

examples.english: I found a great bargain at the flea market.
examples.turkish: Hurda pazarında harika bir pazarlık buldum.

examples.english: They reached a bargain after long negotiations.
examples.turkish: Uzun pazarlıklar sonrasında bir anlaşmaya vardılar.

examples.english: This laptop is a bargain at its current price.
examples.turkish: Bu dizüstü bilgisayar mevcut fiyatıyla ucuz bir alışveriştir.

english_meaning: a cylindrical container, typically made of wood, used for storage or transport

examples.english: They stored wine in large oak barrels.
He rolled the barrel across the yard.
The factory produces barrels for shipping goods.
examples.turkish: Fabrika, mal taşımak için variller üretiyor.

english_meaning: the floor of a building that is partly or entirely below ground level

examples.english: They renovated the basement to create a home theater.
examples.turkish: Bodrumu ev sineması yapmak için yenilediler.

examples.english: The basement is used for storage and laundry.
examples.turkish: Bodrum, depolama ve çamaşırhane olarak kullanılıyor.

examples.english: He spent the weekend cleaning the basement.

english_meaning: a container used to hold or carry things, usually made of interwoven materials

examples.english: She carried fresh fruits in a wicker basket.
He put his laundry in the basket.
The market stall displayed a variety of baskets.

english_meaning: a type of fish, typically large and popular for sport fishing; also, a low-frequency sound

examples.english: He went fishing hoping to catch a big bass.
examples.turkish: Büyük bir bas yakalamak umuduyla balığa çıktı.

examples.english: The music had a deep, resonant bass.
examples.turkish: Müzikte derin, yankılı bir bas vardı.

examples.english: They studied the habits of bass in the lake.

english_meaning: a nocturnal flying mammal; a solid club used in sports; to hit with a bat

examples.english: A bat flew silently in the dark cave.
examples.turkish: Karanlık mağarada sessizce bir yarasa uçtu.

examples.english: He swung the bat and hit the ball.
The team practiced batting drills every day.
examples.turkish: Takım her gün batma antrenmanı yaptı.

english_meaning: a piece of ground where a battle is or was fought

examples.english: The soldiers returned to the historic battlefield.
examples.turkish: Askerler, tarihi savaş alanına geri döndü.

examples.english: The battlefield was marked by the scars of war.
They visited the battlefield to pay their respects.
examples.turkish: Saygılarını sunmak için savaş alanını ziyaret ettiler.

english_meaning: a broad inlet of the sea where the land curves inward

examples.english: The boat sailed into the calm bay.
examples.turkish: Tekne, sakin bir koya doğru yelken açtı.

examples.english: A small fishing village lies along the bay.
examples.turkish: Koy boyunca küçük bir balıkçı köyü bulunuyor.

examples.english: The bay is known for its clear blue waters.

english_meaning: a long, sturdy piece of squared timber or metal used in construction; a ray or shaft of light

examples.english: The old house had exposed wooden beams.
examples.turkish: Eski ev, açıkta kalan ahşap kirişlere sahipti.

examples.english: A beam of sunlight broke through the clouds.
examples.turkish: Güneş ışığının bir ışını bulutların arasından geçti.

examples.english: The engineer reinforced the structure with steel beams.

english_meaning: a large or dangerous animal; a cruel or brutish person

examples.english: The documentary showcased a rare beast in the wild.
examples.turkish: Belgesel, vahşi doğada nadir bir hayvanı gösterdi.

examples.english: The legend tells of a beast that roams the forest at night.
examples.turkish: Efsaneye göre, ormanda gece dolaşan bir canavar vardır.

examples.english: He was described as a beast on the battlefield.
examples.turkish: Savaş alanında, onu vahşi biri olarak tanımladılar.

english_meaning: in the interest or support of someone; on someone’s account

examples.english: She spoke on behalf of the entire community.
They acted on behalf of the company during the negotiations.
examples.turkish: Müzakereler sırasında şirket adına hareket ettiler.

examples.english: I will represent you on behalf of our team.

english_meaning: relating to the study of human or animal behavior

examples.english: The study focused on behavioral patterns in adolescents.
Behavioral therapy can help in treating anxiety.
examples.turkish: Davranışsal terapi, anksiyete tedavisinde yardımcı olabilir.

examples.english: He published a paper on behavioral economics.
examples.turkish: Davranışsal ekonomi üzerine bir makale yayımladı.

english_meaning: dearly loved or cherished

examples.english: She is the beloved daughter of the family.
The actor was beloved by millions of fans.
examples.turkish: Oyuncu, milyonlarca hayran tarafından çok sevildi.

examples.english: His beloved pet provided him with great comfort.
examples.turkish: Çok sevdiği evcil hayvanı ona büyük huzur verdi.

english_meaning: a long seat for several people, typically made of wood or metal

examples.english: They sat on a wooden bench in the park.
The judge sat on the bench during the trial.
He rested on the bench after a long walk.
examples.turkish: Uzun bir yürüyüşten sonra bankta dinlendi.

english_meaning: a standard or point of reference against which things may be compared

examples.english: The new model set a benchmark for quality in the industry.
examples.turkish: Yeni model, sektörde kalite için bir ölçüt oluşturdu.

examples.english: Her performance became a benchmark for others.
examples.turkish: Onun performansı, başkaları için bir kıstas haline geldi.

examples.english: They used last year's results as a benchmark for this year's targets.
examples.turkish: Bu yılın hedefleri için geçen yılın sonuçlarını kıstas olarak kullandılar.

english_meaning: at a lower level or layer than; underneath

examples.english: The valley lies beneath the towering mountains.
examples.turkish: Vadi, heybetli dağların altında yer alır.

examples.english: She found her lost keys beneath the sofa.
The temperature dropped beneath freezing point.

english_meaning: resulting in good; favorable or advantageous

examples.english: Regular exercise is beneficial for your health.
The new policy is expected to be beneficial for small businesses.
examples.turkish: Yeni politikanın küçük işletmeler için faydalı olması bekleniyor.

examples.english: She found the training program highly beneficial.
examples.turkish: Eğitim programını son derece faydalı buldu.

english_meaning: a person who receives help, benefits, or profits from something

examples.english: She is the sole beneficiary of her grandmother's estate.
examples.turkish: O, büyükannesinin mal varlığının tek yararlanıcısıdır.

examples.english: The charity became the beneficiary of a large donation.
examples.turkish: Hayır kurumu büyük bir bağışın yararlanıcısı oldu.

examples.english: Beneficiaries must provide proper documentation to receive the funds.
examples.turkish: Yararlanıcıların fonları almak için uygun belgeler sunması gerekir.

english_meaning: next to; at the side of

examples.english: She sat beside her best friend during the movie.
examples.turkish: Filmde en iyi arkadaşıyla yan yana oturdu.

examples.english: The lamp is placed beside the bed.
He stood beside his colleague during the presentation.

english_meaning: in addition to; apart from

examples.english: Besides coffee, she also drinks tea.
examples.turkish: Kahvenin yanı sıra çay da içer.

examples.english: There is nothing to do besides wait.
examples.turkish: Beklemekten başka yapılacak hiçbir şey yok.

examples.english: Besides being a great singer, he is also a talented dancer.
examples.turkish: Harika bir şarkıcı olmasının yanı sıra yetenekli bir dansçı da.

english_meaning: to be disloyal to someone; to reveal a secret or confidence

examples.english: He vowed never to betray his friends.
examples.turkish: Arkadaşlarına asla ihanet etmeyeceğine yemin etti.

examples.english: She felt hurt when her colleague betrayed her trust.
examples.turkish: Meslektaşının güvenini ihanet etmesi onu incitti.

examples.english: History is full of leaders who betrayed their people.
examples.turkish: Tarih, halkına ihanet eden liderlerle doludur.

english_meaning: a drink, especially one other than water

examples.english: The restaurant offers a variety of refreshing beverages.
He ordered a cold beverage on a hot day.
examples.turkish: Sıcak bir günde soğuk bir içecek sipariş etti.

examples.english: Beverages are served free during the event.
examples.turkish: Etkinlik sırasında içecekler ücretsiz servis ediliyor.

english_meaning: a tendency to prefer or favor one person or group, often in an unfair way

examples.english: The study revealed a bias in the recruitment process.
examples.turkish: Çalışma, işe alım sürecinde bir önyargı olduğunu ortaya koydu.

examples.english: He tried to overcome his bias against unfamiliar cultures.
examples.turkish: Tanımadığı kültürlere karşı önyargısını aşmaya çalıştı.

examples.english: Media bias can affect public opinion.

english_meaning: an offer of a price, especially at an auction; to offer a price for something

examples.english: She placed a high bid on the antique vase.
examples.turkish: Antika vazoya yüksek bir teklif verdi.

examples.english: The company bid for the contract last month.
examples.turkish: Şirket geçen ay sözleşme için teklif verdi.

examples.english: At the auction, several bidders competed for the item.
examples.turkish: Müzayedede, birkaç teklif veren eşya için yarıştı.

english_meaning: to tie or fasten something tightly; to obligate by a contract or promise

examples.english: They used rope to bind the packages securely.
examples.turkish: Paketleri güvenli bir şekilde bağlamak için ip kullandılar.

examples.english: The contract binds both parties to its terms.
examples.turkish: Sözleşme, her iki tarafı da şartlarına bağlar.

examples.english: She bound her hair with a ribbon.

english_meaning: an account of someone's life written by someone else

examples.english: She wrote a biography of the famous author.
The biography detailed his rise to fame.
examples.turkish: Biyografi, onun şöhrete yükselişini ayrıntılarıyla anlattı.

examples.english: I read an inspiring biography about a great leader.
examples.turkish: Büyük bir lider hakkında ilham verici bir biyografi okudum.

english_meaning: relating to biology or living organisms

examples.english: The course covers biological systems in depth.
examples.turkish: Kurs, biyolojik sistemleri derinlemesine ele alır.

examples.english: They studied the biological processes of plants.
Biological research has led to many medical breakthroughs.
examples.turkish: Biyolojik araştırmalar birçok tıbbi atılımı beraberinde getirdi.

english_meaning: a senior member of the Christian clergy, in charge of a diocese

examples.english: The bishop led the service with great dignity.
examples.turkish: Piskopos, büyük bir asaletle ayini yönetti.

examples.english: He was appointed as the new bishop of the region.
The bishop's sermon was both inspiring and thoughtful.
examples.turkish: Piskoposun vaazı hem ilham verici hem de düşünceliydi.

english_meaning: extremely strange or unusual

examples.english: The movie was filled with bizarre characters and scenes.
examples.turkish: Film, tuhaf karakterler ve sahnelerle doluydu.

examples.english: It was a bizarre coincidence that they met at the same place twice.
examples.turkish: İki kez aynı yerde karşılaşmaları tuhaf bir tesadüftü.

examples.english: Her behavior at the party was rather bizarre.

english_meaning: the flat, sharp-edged part of a tool or weapon

examples.english: The knife's blade was razor-sharp.
examples.turkish: Bıçağın ucu bıçak gibi keskin idi.

examples.english: He replaced the dull blade on his saw.
A stray blade of grass swayed in the wind.
examples.turkish: Rüzgarda bir ot bıçağı gibi ince bir sap sallandı.

english_meaning: a large piece of fabric used for warmth

examples.english: She wrapped a warm blanket around her shoulders.
They bought a soft blanket for the baby.
examples.turkish: Bebek için yumuşak bir battaniye aldılar.

examples.english: A thick blanket covered the entire bed.
examples.turkish: Kalın bir battaniye tüm yatağı örttü.

english_meaning: an explosion or a sudden strong gust; to explode or strike with force

examples.english: A huge blast rocked the construction site.
examples.turkish: Büyük bir patlama inşaat alanını sarstı.

examples.english: The engine blasted a loud noise as it started.
examples.turkish: Motor çalışmaya başladığında yüksek bir ses patlattı.

examples.english: They blasted the old building to make way for new construction.
examples.turkish: Yeni inşaat için eski binayı havaya uçurdular.

english_meaning: to lose blood as a result of injury

examples.english: He began to bleed after cutting his hand.
The wound continued to bleed despite applying pressure.
examples.turkish: Yara baskı uygulanmasına rağmen kanamaya devam etti.

examples.english: If you bleed heavily, seek medical help immediately.
examples.turkish: Çok kanıyorsanız hemen tıbbi yardım isteyin.

english_meaning: to mix together thoroughly; a mixture of different elements

examples.english: She blended the fruits to make a smoothie.
The blend of spices gave the dish a unique flavor.
examples.turkish: Baharatların karışımı yemeğe benzersiz bir tat verdi.

examples.english: They enjoyed a blend of classical and modern music.
examples.turkish: Klasik ve modern müziğin karışımının keyfini çıkardılar.

english_meaning: to confer or invoke divine favor upon; to express wishes of happiness

examples.english: The priest blessed the congregation before the service.
She blessed her guests with a warm welcome.
examples.turkish: Misafirlerine sıcak bir karşılama ile kutsadı.

examples.english: May you be blessed with good health and happiness.

english_meaning: a beneficial thing for which one is grateful; an act of blessing

examples.english: Having supportive friends is a true blessing.
examples.turkish: Destekleyici arkadaşlara sahip olmak gerçek bir berekettir.

examples.english: She counted her blessings every night.
The community saw the relief as a blessing.
examples.turkish: Topluluk, bu yardımı bir bereket olarak gördü.

english_meaning: an impact or strike; a strong wind or gust

examples.english: The strong blow of the wind knocked over the tree.
He suffered a blow to the head during the accident.
The boxer delivered a powerful blow to his opponent.
examples.turkish: Boksör rakibine güçlü bir yumruk attı.

english_meaning: to talk with excessive pride about one's achievements or possessions

examples.english: He likes to boast about his academic achievements.
She boasted that her team won the championship.
They boasted about their luxurious new car.

english_meaning: showing an ability to take risks; confident and courageous

examples.english: Her bold decision surprised everyone.
He made a bold move in the negotiation.
The bold colors in the painting attracted many viewers.
examples.turkish: Tablodaki canlı renkler çok dikkat çekti.

english_meaning: the act of attacking a place with bombs

examples.english: The bombing of the city caused widespread destruction.
examples.turkish: Şehrin bombardımanı yaygın yıkıma yol açtı.

examples.english: The documentary focused on the effects of bombing during the war.
examples.turkish: Belgesel, savaş sırasında bombardımanın etkilerine odaklandı.

examples.english: Many lives were lost during the bombing.
examples.turkish: Bombalama sırasında birçok insan hayatını kaybetti.

english_meaning: an extra payment or reward given in addition to what is usual

examples.english: Employees received a bonus at the end of the year.
examples.turkish: Çalışanlar yıl sonunda ek ödeme aldılar.

examples.english: The bonus improved his overall compensation package.
She was surprised to get a bonus for her outstanding performance.
examples.turkish: Olağanüstü performansı için bonus aldığını görünce şaşırdı.

english_meaning: the act of reserving accommodations, tickets, etc.

examples.english: I made a booking for a table at the restaurant.
The booking for the flight was confirmed.
They handled the booking for the conference meticulously.
examples.turkish: Konferans için rezervasyon işlemlerini titizlikle yürüttüler.

english_meaning: a period of rapid economic growth or expansion; a loud, deep sound
turkish_meaning: patlama, ekonomik patlama; gürültülü patlama sesi

examples.english: The tech boom led to a surge in start-up companies.
examples.turkish: Teknoloji patlaması, start-up şirketlerinde büyük artışa neden oldu.

examples.english: There was a loud boom as the firework exploded.
examples.turkish: Havai fişek patladığında gür bir patlama sesi duyuldu.

examples.english: Economic boom can transform a nation's prospects.
examples.turkish: Ekonomik patlama, bir ülkenin geleceğini dönüştürebilir.

english_meaning: to increase or improve something; an increase or improvement

examples.english: The new campaign helped boost sales.
He received a boost of confidence after the meeting.
The boost in funding enabled the project to expand.

english_meaning: to rebound repeatedly off a surface

examples.english: The ball bounced off the wall.
Her energy seemed to bounce back after the break.
examples.turkish: Mola sonrası enerjisi tekrar yerine geldi.

examples.english: The child loved to bounce on the trampoline.

english_meaning: certain or destined; obligated to

examples.english: He is bound to succeed with his talent.
The team is bound by a strict code of conduct.
examples.turkish: Takım sıkı bir davranış kurallarıyla bağlıdır.

examples.english: She felt bound to help her friend in need.
examples.turkish: İhtiyacı olan arkadaşına yardım etmek zorunda hissetti.

english_meaning: a line that marks the limits of an area; a dividing line

examples.english: The river forms the natural boundary between the two countries.
examples.turkish: Nehir, iki ülke arasındaki doğal sınırı oluşturur.

examples.english: We must respect the boundaries of other people’s property.
The boundary between work and personal life is blurred.
examples.turkish: İş ve özel hayat arasındaki sınır belirsizleşti.

english_meaning: to bend the head or upper body in respect, greeting, or submission; a curved weapon for shooting arrows

examples.english: He bowed before the queen.
The actor took a bow after the performance.
Archers used a bow to shoot arrows.
examples.turkish: Okçular, ok atmak için yay kullandı.

english_meaning: an act of breaking or failing to observe a law, agreement, or code of conduct; to break through

examples.english: The company was fined for a breach of contract.
examples.turkish: Şirket, sözleşmeyi ihlal ettiği için para cezası aldı.

examples.english: There was a breach in security at the facility.
examples.turkish: Tesisin güvenliğinde bir ihlal meydana geldi.

examples.english: The wall was breached by the attackers.

english_meaning: a failure in functioning; a collapse or disintegration

examples.english: The car experienced a breakdown on the highway.
She had a nervous breakdown after months of stress.
examples.turkish: Aylar süren stresin ardından sinir krizi geçirdi.

examples.english: A breakdown in communication led to the problem.

english_meaning: a significant and dramatic discovery or development

examples.english: The scientist's breakthrough changed the course of medicine.
examples.turkish: Bilim insanının atılımı, tıbbın seyrini değiştirdi.

examples.english: A breakthrough in technology can revolutionize industries.
examples.turkish: Teknolojideki bir atılım, endüstrileri devrim niteliğinde değiştirebilir.

examples.english: They celebrated the breakthrough with a press conference.

english_meaning: to produce offspring; a stock of animals or plants within a species

examples.english: Farmers breed cattle for milk and meat.
examples.turkish: Çiftçiler süt ve et için sığır yetiştirir.

examples.english: The new breed of dog is known for its intelligence.
He specializes in breeding exotic fish.

english_meaning: a small rectangular block typically made of fired or sun-dried clay, used in building

examples.english: They used red bricks to build the house.
examples.turkish: Evi inşa etmek için kırmızı tuğlalar kullandılar.

examples.english: The wall was constructed with thousands of bricks.
examples.turkish: Duvar, binlerce tuğla ile inşa edildi.

examples.english: A brick is a fundamental unit in construction.

english_meaning: for a short time; in a few words

examples.english: She explained the procedure briefly.
He paused briefly before answering.
The meeting was briefly interrupted by a phone call.
examples.turkish: Toplantı, bir telefon görüşmesi yüzünden kısaca kesildi.

english_meaning: a high-capacity transmission technique using a wide range of frequencies, which enables a large number of messages to be communicated simultaneously

examples.english: The city has recently upgraded its broadband infrastructure.
examples.turkish: Şehir, yakın zamanda geniş bant altyapısını yeniledi.

examples.english: Broadband access is essential for modern businesses.
examples.turkish: Geniş bant erişimi, modern işletmeler için esastır.

examples.english: He subscribed to a new broadband service.
examples.turkish: Yeni bir geniş bant servisine abone oldu.

english_meaning: a person or organization that transmits radio or television programs

examples.english: The broadcaster covered the live event extensively.
examples.turkish: Yayıncı, canlı etkinliği ayrıntılı olarak haberledi.

examples.english: She is a well-known broadcaster in the news industry.
The broadcaster received several awards for her work.
examples.turkish: Yayıncı, çalışmaları için birkaç ödül aldı.

english_meaning: in general; widely

examples.english: Broadly speaking, the project was a success.
examples.turkish: Genel olarak bakıldığında proje başarılı oldu.

examples.english: The rules apply broadly to all employees.
examples.turkish: Kurallar tüm çalışanlar için geniş anlamda geçerlidir.

examples.english: He is broadly familiar with the subject.
examples.turkish: Konu hakkında genel olarak bilgi sahibidir.

english_meaning: a software application for accessing information on the World Wide Web

examples.english: I use a fast browser to surf the internet.
examples.turkish: İnternette gezinmek için hızlı bir tarayıcı kullanıyorum.

examples.english: The browser crashed unexpectedly.
Update your browser to improve security.

english_meaning: savagely violent; harsh or cruel

examples.english: The film depicted brutal scenes of war.
He received brutal criticism for his actions.
The dictator was known for his brutal regime.

english_meaning: a male animal, especially a deer or antelope; a dollar (informal)

examples.english: A buck was spotted in the forest.
It cost fifty bucks.
The buck fought for dominance during the rut.
examples.turkish: Erkek hayvan, çiftleşme döneminde üstünlük için savaştı.

english_meaning: a close friend or companion

examples.english: He is my best buddy since childhood.
Let's go out, buddy!
My buddy helped me move last weekend.
examples.turkish: Geçen hafta sonu taşınmama dostum yardım etti.

english_meaning: a person or thing that prevents incompatible or antagonistic people or things from coming into contact with or harming each other; a protective barrier

examples.english: They built a buffer zone between the factories and the residential area.
examples.turkish: Fabrika ile yerleşim bölgesi arasında bir tampon bölge inşa ettiler.

examples.english: Her calm nature acted as a buffer in the heated debate.
examples.turkish: Onun sakin doğası, hararetli tartışmada bir tampon görevi gördü.

examples.english: The software uses a buffer to manage data flow.
examples.turkish: Yazılım, veri akışını yönetmek için bir tampon kullanır.

english_meaning: an insect; a flaw or error in a computer program or system

examples.english: A bug flew into the room.

He reported a bug in the new application.

english_meaning: the mass or magnitude of something large; in large quantities

examples.english: The bulk of the shipment arrived in the morning.
examples.turkish: Gönderinin büyük kısmı sabah saatlerinde geldi.

examples.english: They buy products in bulk to reduce costs.
examples.turkish: Maliyetleri düşürmek için ürünleri toplu alırlar.

examples.english: The bulk of his work was completed last year.
examples.turkish: İşinin büyük kısmı geçen yıl tamamlandı.

english_meaning: a heavy load that is difficult to carry; a duty or misfortune that causes worry or hardship

examples.english: The financial burden of the project was enormous.
She felt the burden of responsibility.
They shared the burden equally.

english_meaning: a system of government in which most of the important decisions are made by state officials rather than by elected representatives

examples.english: The bureaucracy in the organization slowed decision-making.
examples.turkish: Kuruluş içindeki bürokrasi karar almayı yavaşlattı.

examples.english: Many people complain about excessive bureaucracy in government.
examples.turkish: Birçok kişi, hükümetteki aşırı bürokrasi şikayetinde bulunur.

examples.english: Reforming the bureaucracy is necessary for efficiency.
examples.turkish: Verimlilik için bürokrasinin reforme edilmesi gereklidir.

english_meaning: the act or ceremony of burying a dead body; the place where a dead body is buried

examples.english: The burial was held with great solemnity.
examples.turkish: Defin töreni büyük bir ciddiyetle gerçekleştirildi.

examples.english: Family and friends attended the burial.
examples.turkish: Aile ve arkadaşlar definde hazır bulundu.

examples.english: They visited the burial site to pay their respects.
examples.turkish: Saygı göstermek için defin alanını ziyaret ettiler.

english_meaning: to break open or apart suddenly and violently; to come or break out suddenly

examples.english: The balloon burst suddenly during the party.

The dam burst after the heavy rain.

english_meaning: a small, simple dwelling, usually in a rural or isolated area

examples.english: They rented a cozy cabin in the mountains.
The cabin was built of wood and stone.
He spent the weekend in a remote cabin.
examples.turkish: Hafta sonunu ıssız bir kabinde geçirdi.

english_meaning: a cupboard with shelves or drawers for storing or displaying items; also, a body of high-ranking state officials

examples.english: The kitchen cabinet was filled with dishes.
The cabinet met to discuss the new policy.
examples.turkish: Bakanlar kurulu yeni politikayı görüşmek için toplandı.

examples.english: She opened the cabinet to retrieve a glass.
examples.turkish: Bir bardak almak için dolabı açtı.

english_meaning: the process of using mathematics to determine something

examples.english: Accurate calculation is crucial in engineering.

They used a computer for complex calculations.

english_meaning: an artificial waterway constructed to allow the passage of boats or ships or to convey water for irrigation

examples.english: The canal connected the two lakes.
They built a canal for irrigation purposes.
examples.turkish: Sulama amacıyla bir kanal inşa ettiler.

examples.english: Boats regularly pass through the canal.
examples.turkish: Tekneler düzenli olarak kanal üzerinden geçer.

english_meaning: a block of wax with an embedded wick that is lit to produce light as it burns

examples.english: She lit a candle to create a romantic atmosphere.
examples.turkish: Romantik bir atmosfer yaratmak için mum yaktı.

examples.english: The candle flickered in the dark room.

english_meaning: a strong, heavy cloth used as a surface for painting

examples.english: The artist stretched a fresh canvas for his new painting.
examples.turkish: Sanatçı, yeni resmi için taze bir tuval gerdi.

examples.english: She bought a large canvas for her artwork.
examples.turkish: Sanat eseri için büyük bir kanvas satın aldı.

examples.english: The painting was done on a canvas.

english_meaning: the ability or power to do something

examples.english: The new software has great capability for data analysis.
examples.turkish: Yeni yazılım, veri analizi için büyük bir kapasiteye sahiptir.

examples.english: Her capability in managing projects is impressive.

english_meaning: an economic system characterized by private or corporate ownership of capital goods

examples.english: Capitalism encourages innovation through competition.
examples.turkish: Kapitalizm, rekabet yoluyla yeniliği teşvik eder.

examples.english: Many believe that capitalism leads to economic growth.
examples.turkish: Birçok kişi, kapitalizmin ekonomik büyümeye yol açtığına inanır.

examples.english: Debates about capitalism and its effects are common.
examples.turkish: Kapitalizm ve etkileri hakkında tartışmalar yaygındır.

english_meaning: relating to or characteristic of capitalism; a person who supports capitalism

examples.english: The country's capitalist economy has driven its growth.
He is a well-known capitalist investor.
Capitalist policies have shaped modern business practices.
examples.turkish: Kapitalist politikalar modern iş uygulamalarını şekillendirmiştir.

english_meaning: a chemical element (symbol C) that is the basis of all known life on Earth

examples.english: Carbon emissions are a major contributor to climate change.
examples.turkish: Karbon emisyonları iklim değişikliğinin önemli bir nedenidir.

examples.english: The substance is primarily made of carbon.
Scientists study carbon compounds to understand life.
examples.turkish: Bilim insanları, yaşamı anlamak için karbon bileşiklerini inceler.

english_meaning: goods carried on a ship, aircraft, or motor vehicle

examples.english: The ship was loaded with valuable cargo.
Cargo flights transport goods internationally.
They inspected the cargo before it was shipped.

english_meaning: a vehicle with four wheels, usually drawn by horses, used in the past; the manner in which something is carried

examples.english: They rode in a horse-drawn carriage.
Her graceful carriage impressed everyone.
The old carriage has been restored as a museum piece.
examples.turkish: Eski vagon müze parçası olarak restore edildi.

english_meaning: to cut (a hard material) in order to produce an object, design, or inscription

examples.english: He carved his initials into the tree.
The sculptor carved a beautiful statue from marble.
examples.turkish: Heykeltraş, mermerden güzel bir heykel oydu.

examples.english: They carved pumpkins for the Halloween celebration.

english_meaning: a facility for certain types of gambling

examples.english: They spent the evening at a luxurious casino.
The casino is known for its high-stakes poker games.
examples.turkish: Kumarhane, yüksek bahisli poker oyunlarıyla tanınır.

examples.english: Many tourists visit the casino to try their luck.
examples.turkish: Birçok turist, şansını denemek için kumarhaneyi ziyaret eder.

english_meaning: a large building, typically of the medieval period, fortified against attack

examples.english: They visited an ancient castle on their tour.
examples.turkish: Tur sırasında antik bir şatoyu ziyaret ettiler.

examples.english: The castle was surrounded by a moat.
Legends of ghosts haunt the old castle.
examples.turkish: Eski şato, hayalet efsanelerine konu olur.

english_meaning: relaxed and unconcerned; not formal or serious

examples.english: He prefers a casual style of dress.
They had a casual meeting over coffee.
examples.turkish: Kahve eşliğinde samimi bir toplantı yaptılar.

examples.english: The event had a casual atmosphere.
examples.turkish: Etkinlik resmi olmayan bir atmosfere sahipti.

english_meaning: a person killed or injured in a war or accident

examples.english: The accident resulted in several casualties.
examples.turkish: Kaza, birkaç can kaybına yol açtı.

examples.english: Many casualties were reported during the conflict.
Emergency services rushed to assist the casualties.
examples.turkish: Acil servisler mağdurlara yardım etmek için koştu.

english_meaning: a complete list of items, typically in alphabetical or other systematic order

examples.english: The museum published a catalog of its collections.

examples.turkish: Yeni bir kitap seçmek için kataloğa göz attı.

examples.english: The online catalog offers thousands of products.

english_meaning: to provide food and drink, typically at social events; to provide what is needed or required
turkish_meaning: hizmet vermek, karşılamak; yiyecek servisi yapmak

examples.english: The restaurant caters for large parties.
They cater to the needs of their customers.
The firm was hired to cater the wedding reception.
examples.turkish: Düğün resepsiyonu için firma, yiyecek servisi yapmak üzere tutuldu.

english_meaning: large ruminant animals, especially cows or bulls, kept for milk or meat

examples.english: The farm raised cattle for dairy products.
examples.turkish: Çiftlik, süt ürünleri için sığır yetiştirdi.

examples.english: Cattle were grazing in the vast fields.
The cattle industry is an important part of the economy.
examples.turkish: Sığır sektörü, ekonominin önemli bir parçasıdır.

english_meaning: care taken to avoid danger or mistakes; a warning

examples.english: He proceeded with caution on the icy road.
The sign warned drivers to exercise caution.
Caution is advised when handling chemicals.

english_meaning: careful to avoid potential problems or dangers

examples.english: She is very cautious when making investments.
He drove in a cautious manner through the city.
examples.turkish: Şehir içinde dikkatli bir şekilde sürdü.

examples.english: The cautious approach paid off in the end.

english_meaning: a large natural underground chamber typically of limestone

examples.english: They explored a dark cave in the mountains.
The cave was filled with ancient paintings.
Stalactites and stalagmites adorned the cave.

english_meaning: to come to an end; to stop

examples.english: The rain finally ceased after several hours.
examples.turkish: Birkaç saatten sonra yağmur nihayet durdu.

examples.english: They were ordered to cease all operations immediately.

english_meaning: a place where the dead are buried

examples.english: They visited the cemetery to pay their respects.
examples.turkish: Saygılarını sunmak için mezarlığı ziyaret ettiler.

examples.english: The old cemetery is full of historical graves.

examples.turkish: Sessiz bir mezarlık, düşünmek için huzurlu bir ortam sağladı.

english_meaning: the state of being sure or confident about something

examples.english: There is no certainty in predicting the future.

Despite the challenges, he maintained a sense of certainty.
examples.turkish: Zorluklara rağmen bir kesinlik duygusunu korudu.

english_meaning: an official document attesting a fact, such as a qualification, achievement, or completion

examples.english: She received a certificate for completing the course.
examples.turkish: Kursu tamamladığına dair bir sertifika aldı.

examples.english: The certificate is required to prove your qualification.

english_meaning: testing one's abilities; demanding

examples.english: The exam was challenging but fair.
She enjoys challenging projects at work.
Learning a new language can be challenging.
examples.turkish: Yeni bir dil öğrenmek zorlayıcı olabilir.

english_meaning: a room used for a specific purpose, often private

examples.english: The royal chamber was decorated with exquisite furnishings.
examples.turkish: Kraliyet odası, muhteşem mobilyalarla dekore edilmişti.

examples.english: They held a meeting in a private chamber.
The chamber echoed with the sound of music.

english_meaning: a contest for a title, typically in sports

examples.english: The team won the championship after a tough season.
examples.turkish: Takım, zorlu bir sezonun ardından şampiyon oldu.

examples.english: He dreams of winning a world championship someday.
examples.turkish: Bir gün dünya şampiyonu olmayı hayal ediyor.

examples.english: The championship game was thrilling.

english_meaning: complete disorder and confusion

examples.english: The streets were in chaos after the storm.

examples.turkish: Siyasi istikrarsızlık genellikle kaosa yol açar.

examples.english: There was chaos at the airport during the strike.

english_meaning: to describe the distinctive nature or features of something

examples.english: The novel is characterized by its vivid descriptions.

examples.turkish: Onun tarzı sadelik ve zarafetle öne çıkar.

examples.english: This period is characterized by rapid technological change.
examples.turkish: Bu dönem, hızlı teknolojik değişimle tanımlanır.

english_meaning: the quality of being pleasant or attractive

examples.english: Her smile has a unique charm.
The old town has a certain charm that attracts visitors.
examples.turkish: Eski kasabanın ziyaretçileri çeken belli bir cazibesi vardır.

examples.english: He won her heart with his charm.

english_meaning: delightfully pleasing or attractive

examples.english: The small village is charming in its simplicity.
examples.turkish: Küçük köy, sadeliğiyle hoş bir yer.

examples.english: She has a charming personality.

examples.turkish: Eski, çekici bina güzelce restore edildi.

english_meaning: a written grant by a country's legislative or sovereign power, by which an institution is created and its rights and privileges defined; a document of this kind

examples.english: The school was established under a royal charter.

english_meaning: covering completely or broadly; inclusive

examples.english: The report provides a comprehensive analysis of the market trends.
examples.turkish: Rapor, piyasa trendlerinin kapsamlı bir analizini sunuyor.

examples.english: They conducted a comprehensive survey on consumer behavior.
examples.turkish: Tüketici davranışları üzerine kapsamlı bir anket gerçekleştirdiler.

examples.english: Her comprehensive approach to the problem was impressive.

english_meaning: to consist of; to be made up of

examples.english: The committee comprises experts from various fields.
The collection comprises several rare paintings.
These chapters comprise the entire book.

english_meaning: an agreement reached by mutual concession; to settle a dispute by making concessions

examples.english: After long negotiations, they reached a compromise.

The compromise helped resolve the conflict amicably.
examples.turkish: Uzlaşma, çatışmayı dostane bir şekilde çözmeye yardımcı oldu.

english_meaning: required by law or a rule; obligatory

examples.english: Education is compulsory for children up to the age of 16.

examples.turkish: Birçok ülkede emniyet kemeri takmak zorunludur.

examples.english: Attendance at the meeting is compulsory.

english_meaning: to calculate or reckon a figure or amount

We need to compute the total cost before making a decision.
examples.turkish: Karar vermeden önce toplam maliyeti hesaplamamız gerekiyor.

examples.english: Scientists compute data to support their hypotheses.
examples.turkish: Bilim insanları hipotezlerini desteklemek için verileri hesaplar.

english_meaning: to hide or keep secret

english_meaning: to admit that something is true or valid, often unwillingly

examples.english: After much debate, he conceded that he was mistaken.
examples.turkish: Uzun tartışmalardan sonra hatalı olduğunu itiraf etti.

examples.english: She finally conceded that her approach was flawed.

english_meaning: to form or devise (a plan or idea) in the mind

examples.english: It is difficult to conceive of a world without music.

examples.turkish: Yurtdışında seyahat ederken fikri aklına geldi.

english_meaning: the forming or devising of a plan or idea; the beginning of something

examples.turkish: Yeni projenin düşünülmesi birkaç ay sürdü.

examples.english: Her conception of art is very modern.

english_meaning: a thing that is granted in response to demands; a compromise

examples.turkish: Onun yaptığı taviz, anlaşmazlığın çözülmesine yardımcı oldu.

examples.english: The company offered a concession on the price.
examples.turkish: Şirket, fiyat konusunda bir indirim teklif etti.

english_meaning: existing in a material or physical form; a building material made from cement and aggregates

examples.english: They provided concrete evidence to support their claim.
examples.turkish: İddialarını desteklemek için somut kanıtlar sundular.

examples.english: The walls were constructed of reinforced concrete.
examples.turkish: Duvarlar, takviye edilmiş beton kullanılarak inşa edildi.

examples.english: She prefers concrete details over abstract ideas.
examples.turkish: Soyut fikirler yerine somut ayrıntıları tercih eder.

english_meaning: to express strong disapproval of something, typically in public

examples.english: The government condemned the terrorist attack in the strongest terms.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, terör saldırısını en sert ifadelerle kınadı.

english_meaning: to grant or bestow (a title, degree, benefit, or right); to have a discussion

examples.english: The university will confer an honorary degree on the scientist.
examples.turkish: Üniversite, bilim insanına onursal bir derece verecek.

examples.english: The board conferred with experts before making the decision.
examples.turkish: Yönetim kurulu karar vermeden önce uzmanlarla görüştü.

examples.english: They conferred about the future of the company.

english_meaning: to admit or state that one has committed a crime or wrongdoing

examples.turkish: Uzun sorgulamanın ardından suçu sonunda itiraf etti.

english_meaning: an arrangement of elements in a particular form or structure

english_meaning: the act of confirming or the state of being confirmed

english_meaning: to face a challenge or difficult situation directly

english_meaning: to express praise or approval for an achievement

english_meaning: to overcome and take control of by force

examples.english: The contention between the two groups escalated quickly.

examples.turkish: Onun tartışmalı sözleri, hararetli bir tartışmaya yol açtı.

examples.english: The issue remains controversial among experts.
examples.turkish: Konu, uzmanlar arasında tartışmalı olmaya devam ediyor.

examples.turkish: Uygulamayı, kullanıcı kolaylığı en üst düzeyde olacak şekilde tasarladılar.

examples.turkish: Merkezi konumu, işe gidenler için büyük kolaylık sağlar.

english_meaning: a formal meeting or assembly; a generally accepted practice or custom

examples.turkish: Yıllık konferans, dünyanın dört bir yanından profesyonelleri çekti.

examples.turkish: Yeni biriyle tanışırken el sıkışmak gelenektir.

examples.turkish: Deneysel yöntemler yerine geleneksel yöntemleri tercih eder.

examples.english: He has a conventional outlook on life.
examples.turkish: Hayata alışılmış bir bakış açısıyla yaklaşıyor.

english_meaning: the process of changing or causing something to change from one form to another

english_meaning: to transport or carry to a place; to communicate or make known

examples.turkish: Uzun ve zorlu bir davadan sonra suçlu bulundu.

examples.turkish: Deliller, mahkemede onun suçlu bulunmasına yol açtı.

english_meaning: capable of causing someone to believe that something is true or real

examples.english: Her argument was so convincing that everyone agreed.

examples.english: They discussed the dimensions of the new product.

english_meaning: to make or become less; to reduce in size, importance, or intensity

examples.english: The rain diminished as the storm passed.
His influence in the company has diminished over the years.
They worked to diminish the noise from the construction site.
examples.turkish: İnşaat alanından gelen gürültüyü azaltmaya çalıştılar.

english_meaning: to put or let something down briefly or partially in or into a liquid; to lower or reduce

examples.english: She dipped the brush into the paint.
The airplane dipped before taking off.
He dipped his hand into the water to cool off.

english_meaning: an official representing a country abroad

examples.english: The diplomat negotiated the treaty successfully.
She worked as a diplomat for many years.
Diplomats are trained in negotiation and communication.
examples.turkish: Diplomatlar müzakere ve iletişim konularında eğitilir.

english_meaning: relating to diplomats or diplomacy; tactful

examples.english: Her diplomatic approach helped resolve the conflict.
examples.turkish: Diplomatik yaklaşımı çatışmayı çözmeye yardımcı oldu.

examples.english: The ambassador is known for his diplomatic skills.
They engaged in diplomatic negotiations to settle the dispute.
examples.turkish: Anlaşmazlığı çözmek için diplomatik müzakerelere girdiler.

english_meaning: a book or listing of individuals or organizations, typically in alphabetical order with details such as addresses and telephone numbers

examples.english: She found his contact information in the directory.
The company published an online directory of its employees.
examples.turkish: Şirket, çalışanlarının çevrimiçi bir dizinini yayımladı.

examples.english: The telephone directory is updated annually.

english_meaning: a physical or mental condition that limits a person's movements, senses, or activities

examples.english: He has a disability that affects his mobility.
The organization supports people with disabilities.
Awareness about disability rights is growing.

english_meaning: having a physical or mental condition that limits movements, senses, or activities

examples.english: The building has facilities for disabled people.
examples.turkish: Bina, engelli insanlar için uygun olanaklara sahiptir.

examples.english: She is a disabled athlete competing in the Paralympics.
examples.turkish: O, Paralimpiklerde yarışan engelli bir sporcudur.

examples.english: Disabled veterans receive special benefits from the government.
examples.turkish: Engelli gaziler, hükümetten özel yardımlar alırlar.

english_meaning: a lack of consensus or harmony; a difference in opinion

examples.english: They had a serious disagreement about the project.
examples.turkish: Proje hakkında ciddi bir anlaşmazlık yaşadılar.

examples.english: Disagreements can often lead to productive debates.
examples.turkish: Anlaşmazlıklar sık sık verimli tartışmalara yol açar.

examples.english: The disagreement was resolved after a long discussion.
examples.turkish: Uzun bir tartışmanın ardından anlaşmazlık çözüldü.

english_meaning: to fail to fulfill the hopes or expectations of someone

examples.english: She did not want to disappoint her fans.
The movie disappointed many who had high expectations.
examples.turkish: Yüksek beklentileri olan birçok kişiyi hayal kırıklığına uğrattı.

examples.english: He was disappointed with the results of the test.

english_meaning: the feeling of sadness or displeasure caused by the non-fulfillment of one's hopes or expectations

examples.english: The cancellation of the event was a huge disappointment.
examples.turkish: Etkinliğin iptali büyük bir hayal kırıklığıydı.

examples.english: He expressed his disappointment in the final report.
examples.turkish: Son raporda hayal kırıklığını dile getirdi.

examples.english: Her disappointment was evident from her expression.
examples.turkish: Yüz ifadesinden hayal kırıklığı belli oluyordu.

english_meaning: causing great damage or harm; extremely unfortunate

examples.english: The fire had disastrous consequences for the community.
examples.turkish: Yangın, toplum için yıkıcı sonuçlara yol açtı.

examples.english: Their plan proved to be disastrous.

examples.turkish: Ekonomik kriz, birçok işletme için yıkıcı oldu.

english_meaning: to get rid of something that is no longer useful or desirable

examples.english: She decided to discard the old clothes.
They discarded outdated equipment.
The company discarded its previous marketing strategy.
examples.turkish: Şirket, önceki pazarlama stratejisini terk etti.

english_meaning: to release or let go (a person) from a duty or responsibility; to emit or release (a substance)

examples.english: The patient was discharged from the hospital.
The factory discharges waste into the river.
They discharged him from his duties after the incident.

english_meaning: to make (secret or new information) known

examples.english: The company refused to disclose its financial records.
He disclosed the details of the plan during the meeting.
The investigation forced him to disclose the truth.
examples.turkish: Soruşturma, gerçeği ifşa etmesine neden oldu.

english_meaning: the action of making new or secret information known

examples.english: The disclosure of the documents shocked everyone.
Full disclosure is required by law.
There was a major disclosure during the trial.
examples.turkish: Dava sırasında büyük bir açıklama yapıldı.

english_meaning: to cause someone to lose confidence or enthusiasm

examples.english: Negative feedback can discourage creative efforts.

english_meaning: written or spoken communication or debate

examples.english: The professor's discourse on modern art was enlightening.
examples.turkish: Profesörün modern sanat üzerine söylemi aydınlatıcıydı.

examples.english: Political discourse has become increasingly polarized.

examples.turkish: Konu hakkında canlı bir tartışmaya girdiler.

english_meaning: the quality of behaving or speaking in such a way as to avoid causing offense or revealing private information

examples.english: The matter was handled with great discretion.
examples.turkish: Konu çok ihtiyatlı bir şekilde ele alındı.

examples.english: She trusted him with the information due to his discretion.
examples.turkish: Onun saklı davranışından dolayı bilgileri ona emanet etti.

examples.english: Discretion is important when dealing with sensitive topics.

english_meaning: the unjust or prejudicial treatment of different categories of people, especially on the grounds of race, age, or sex

examples.english: Discrimination in the workplace is a serious issue.
examples.turkish: İş yerinde ayrımcılık ciddi bir sorundur.

examples.english: They fought against racial discrimination.

examples.turkish: Ayrımcılığı önlemek için yasal önlemler alındı.

english_meaning: the act of removing someone from employment or office; the rejection of an idea or suggestion

examples.english: His dismissal from the company was unexpected.

She felt the dismissal was unfair.

english_meaning: a state of confusion; a disruption of normal physical or mental functions

examples.english: The sudden noise created disorder in the classroom.
examples.turkish: Ani ses sınıfta düzensizliğe yol açtı.

examples.english: He suffers from an anxiety disorder.

examples.turkish: Protestodan sonra şehir tam anlamıyla düzensizdi.

english_meaning: to take over the place, position, or role of (someone or something)

examples.english: The natural disaster displaced thousands of residents.
examples.turkish: Doğal afet, binlerce sakini yerinden etti.

examples.english: New technologies may displace traditional methods.
examples.turkish: Yeni teknolojiler, geleneksel yöntemlerin yerini alabilir.

examples.english: The invasion displaced many people from their homes.

english_meaning: the action or process of getting rid of something; the control of waste

examples.english: Proper disposal of hazardous waste is essential.
examples.turkish: Tehlikeli atıkların uygun şekilde bertarafı gereklidir.

examples.english: They improved the disposal system for recycling.
examples.turkish: Geri dönüşüm için atık bertaraf sistemini geliştirdiler.

examples.english: The disposal of old electronics is regulated by law.

english_meaning: to get rid of by throwing away or giving or selling to someone else

examples.english: They decided to dispose of the old furniture.
Dispose of the waste properly.
He disposed of his collection at the auction.

english_meaning: a disagreement or argument; to argue about something

examples.english: There was a dispute over the contract terms.
The two neighbors disputed the property line.
They disputed the accuracy of the report.

english_meaning: to interrupt an event, activity, or process by causing a disturbance or problem

examples.english: The protest disrupted the meeting.
Technical problems disrupted the live broadcast.
The strike disrupted production at the factory.

english_meaning: a disturbance or problem that interrupts an event, activity, or process

examples.english: The power outage caused major disruption in the city.
examples.turkish: Elektrik kesintisi şehirde büyük aksaklığa neden oldu.

examples.english: There was a disruption in the supply chain.

examples.turkish: Protesto, hizmetlerin geçici olarak aksamasına yol açtı.

english_meaning: to become incorporated into a liquid so as to form a solution; to bring to an end

examples.english: Sugar quickly dissolves in hot water.
The board decided to dissolve the committee.
The dispute was eventually dissolved.

english_meaning: far away in space or time; not close in relationship

examples.english: The distant mountains were visible on the horizon.

They moved to a distant country for a new start.

english_meaning: recognizably different in nature from something else of a similar type

examples.english: Her accent is distinct and easily recognizable.

examples.turkish: İki teori arasında açık bir fark var.

examples.turkish: En iyi öğrenci olarak ayırt edildi.

examples.english: The distinction in style sets her work apart from others.
examples.turkish: Stildeki fark, onun eserlerini diğerlerinden ayırır.

examples.english: The building's distinctive architecture attracts many tourists.

examples.english: Her distinctive style makes her a trendsetter.

examples.english: They used distinctive colors to brand the product.
examples.turkish: Ürünü markalaştırmak için kendine has renkler kullandılar.

english_meaning: to recognize or treat (someone or something) as different; to set apart from others

examples.english: It is hard to distinguish between identical twins.
examples.turkish: Aynı ikizler arasında fark etmek zordur.

examples.english: The unique style distinguishes her work from others.
examples.turkish: Benzersiz stili, onun eserlerini diğerlerinden ayırır.

examples.english: They were distinguished by their remarkable talent.

english_meaning: to change the shape, appearance, or sound of something so that it seems strange or inaccurate

examples.english: The funhouse mirrors distort the reflection.

english_meaning: to divert attention from something

examples.english: The noise distracted him from his work.

examples.turkish: Kesintilerin onu dikkatini dağıtmasına izin vermemeye çalıştı.

examples.english: A bright light can distract drivers on the road.
examples.turkish: Parlak bir ışık, yoldaki sürücülerin dikkatini dağıtabilir.

english_meaning: extreme anxiety, sorrow, or pain; to cause such feelings

examples.english: The news brought great distress to the community.

english_meaning: to interrupt the quiet, peace, or order of something

examples.english: Please do not disturb me while I'm working.

examples.turkish: Yüksek sesli müzik, komşuları rahatsız etti.

examples.english: He was disturbed by the strange noise.

examples.english: The documentary contained some disturbing images.

examples.turkish: Herkesi şok eden rahatsız edici bir sahneydi.

english_meaning: to plunge headfirst into water; an act of diving

examples.english: He took a dive off the diving board.

examples.english: Cultural diversity enriches our society.

english_meaning: to cause (someone or something) to change course or turn from one direction to another

examples.english: The road works diverted traffic to a different route.

english_meaning: of, from, or like God or a god; extremely good or pleasing

examples.english: After years of conflict, they finally decided to divorce.

examples.english: The church's doctrine has evolved over time.

english_meaning: material that provides official information or evidence or that serves as a record

english_meaning: an area of territory owned or controlled by a particular ruler or government; a specified sphere of activity or knowledge

english_meaning: most important, powerful, or influential

examples.english: The doctor prescribed a small dose for the treatment.

examples.turkish: İlacın aşırı dozajı çok tehlikeli olabilir.

english_meaning: in a way that is sudden and striking; significantly

examples.english: Her performance improved dramatically over the season.

examples.english: The situation changed dramatically in a few hours.

english_meaning: relating to operating a vehicle; powerful and forceful

examples.turkish: Sürücü becerilerini geliştirmek için bir kurs aldı.

examples.english: The driving force behind the project was innovation.

examples.english: The region suffered from a severe drought last summer.
examples.turkish: Bölge, geçen yaz şiddetli bir kuraklık yaşadı.

examples.english: Farmers are struggling due to the ongoing drought.
examples.turkish: Çiftçiler, devam eden kuraklık yüzünden zor durumda.

examples.english: Efforts are underway to alleviate the effects of the drought.
examples.turkish: Kuraklığın etkilerini hafifletmek için çalışmalar yapılıyor.

examples.turkish: Şiddetli yağmur nehrin taşmasına ve birkaç hayvanın boğulmasına neden oldu.

examples.english: The car features a dual airbag system for extra safety.

examples.turkish: Hem danışman hem de eğitmen olarak çift görevde çalışıyorlar.

english_meaning: to give a name or title to; to record (a soundtrack) over the original dialogue

examples.turkish: Başarısının ardından ona 'Pop Kralı' ismini verdiler.

examples.english: He finds the color gray rather dull.

english_meaning: lacking intelligence or the ability to speak

examples.english: The instructions were so dumb that even a child could understand them.

examples.english: He felt dumb for not realizing the obvious solution.
examples.turkish: Açık olan çözümü fark edemediği için kendini aptal hissetti.

english_meaning: to get rid of something unwanted; to drop or let fall in a careless or hurried way

examples.turkish: Kamyon, yol kenarına bir yük çakıl döktü.

examples.english: She dumped her boyfriend after months of unhappiness.
examples.turkish: Aylar süren mutsuzluktan sonra erkek arkadaşını bıraktı.

english_meaning: a pair of people or things considered as a unit

examples.english: They formed a duo to perform at the festival.
examples.turkish: Festivalde sahne almak için bir ikili oluşturdular.

examples.english: The comedy duo is known for their humorous sketches.

english_meaning: the length of time that something lasts

examples.english: The duration of the meeting was two hours.

examples.turkish: Kaliteyi sağlamak için projenin süresini uzattılar.

english_meaning: characterized by constant change, activity, or progress; a force that stimulates change or progress

examples.english: The team is known for its dynamic approach to problem solving.
examples.turkish: Takım, problem çözmede dinamik yaklaşımıyla bilinir.

examples.english: Her dynamic personality makes her a great leader.
examples.turkish: Onun enerjik kişiliği onu harika bir lider yapar.

examples.english: The dynamic of the group changed after the new member joined.
examples.turkish: Yeni üyenin katılımıyla grubun dinamiği değişti.

english_meaning: feeling or showing keen interest, enthusiasm, or desire

examples.english: She was eager to start her new job.

examples.turkish: Çocuklar hediyelerini açmak için çok istekliydi.

english_meaning: money obtained in return for labor or services

examples.english: Her earnings increased significantly after the promotion.
examples.turkish: Terfi sonrası kazançları önemli ölçüde arttı.

examples.english: The company's earnings were reported last quarter.

examples.turkish: Gelecek için kazancının büyük bir kısmını biriktirdi.

english_meaning: the absence of difficulty or effort; to make something less difficult or painful

examples.turkish: Yeni yazılım, iş yükünü hafifletmek için tasarlandı.

examples.english: The ecological impact of deforestation is severe.

english_meaning: the branch of knowledge concerned with the production, consumption, and transfer of wealth

examples.english: He majored in economics at university.
