examples.english: The film features a touching story about lesbian love.
examples.turkish: Film, lezbiyen aşkını konu alan dokunaklı bir hikayeye sahip.

examples.english: Lesbian literature has grown in prominence over the years.
examples.turkish: Lezbiyen edebiyatı, yıllar içinde önem kazandı.

english_meaning: smaller in size or importance; not as great

examples.english: A lethal dose of the drug can be fatal.

english_meaning: open to new behavior or opinions and willing to discard traditional values; a person who advocates for liberal principles

examples.turkish: O, özgür düşünceli biri olarak bilinir ve sık sık insan hakları hakkında konuşur.

examples.english: Liberal ideas continue to shape the modern political landscape.

english_meaning: lasting or remaining in a person's life for a long time

english_meaning: the duration of a person’s life; a period of time in which something lasts

english_meaning: the arrangement or effect of lights in a space

english_meaning: an arrangement or list of people or things; the group of performers scheduled for a show

english_meaning: a corridor or entrance hall; to seek to influence (a politician or public official) on an issue

english_meaning: a document, book, or piece of music written by hand rather than typed or printed; an author's written work before publication

examples.english: The manuscript was discovered in the author's personal archives.

examples.english: Completing a marathon is a remarkable achievement.

examples.english: They decided to march to the government building in protest.

examples.english: Traffic markers help guide drivers on the road.

examples.english: He wore a mask to conceal his identity.
The actor's mask added mystery to his performance.

english_meaning: an event in which a large number of people are killed violently

examples.english: The historical massacre remains a dark chapter in the nation’s history.
examples.turkish: Tarihi katliam, ulusun karanlık bir dönemi olarak kalmıştır.

examples.english: Survivors of the massacre told harrowing stories.
International outrage followed the brutal massacre.
examples.turkish: Zalim katliamın ardından uluslararası öfke patlak verdi.

english_meaning: a friend or companion; to pair or join

examples.english: He is my best mate from school.
Birds mate during the spring season.
They mated the new software with the existing system.
examples.turkish: Yeni yazılımı mevcut sistemle entegre ettiler.

english_meaning: relating to mathematics; using mathematical methods

examples.english: He presented a mathematical solution to the problem.
The paper offers a mathematical analysis of the data.
Her approach is both artistic and mathematical.
examples.turkish: Onun yaklaşımı hem sanatsal hem de matematiksel.

english_meaning: fully developed physically or emotionally; to develop fully

examples.english: The fruit is mature and ready to be harvested.
examples.turkish: Meyve olgunlaştı ve hasat edilmeye hazır.

examples.english: He has become a mature and responsible adult.
examples.turkish: O, olgun ve sorumlu bir yetişkin haline geldi.

examples.english: The ideas in his essay mature as he explains them.

english_meaning: to increase something as much as possible
turkish_meaning: maksimuma çıkarmak, en üst düzeye çıkarmak

examples.english: They worked to maximize profits by reducing costs.
examples.turkish: Maliyetleri azaltarak kârı maksimuma çıkarmaya çalıştılar.

examples.english: The new strategy aims to maximize efficiency.
examples.turkish: Yeni strateji, verimliliği en üst düzeye çıkarmayı hedefliyor.

examples.english: She maximized her study time by eliminating distractions.
examples.turkish: Dikkat dağıtıcı unsurları ortadan kaldırarak çalışma zamanını maksimuma çıkardı.

english_meaning: having a serious, important, or useful quality or purpose

examples.english: They had a long and meaningful conversation.
examples.turkish: Uzun ve anlamlı bir sohbet ettiler.

examples.english: The project aims to create meaningful change in the community.
examples.turkish: Proje, toplulukta anlamlı değişiklikler yaratmayı amaçlıyor.

examples.english: She always tries to make her work meaningful.
examples.turkish: İşlerini her zaman anlamlı kılmaya çalışır.

english_meaning: the intervening time; meanwhile

examples.english: In the meantime, please prepare the documents.
He completed his work; in the meantime, his colleagues finished theirs.
examples.turkish: O işini bitirdi; bu arada, meslektaşları kendi işlerini tamamladı.

examples.english: We will reconvene in the meantime.

english_meaning: a person who repairs and maintains machinery, especially cars

examples.english: The mechanic fixed the car's engine.
She took her vehicle to a reliable mechanic.
A good mechanic can save you a lot of money in repairs.
examples.turkish: İyi bir tamirci, tamiratlarda size çok para kazandırabilir.

english_meaning: relating to machines or machinery; done in a routine or automatic way

examples.english: The factory uses mechanical equipment to speed up production.
examples.turkish: Fabrika, üretimi hızlandırmak için mekanik ekipman kullanır.

examples.english: His responses were mechanical and lacked emotion.
The clock operates on a purely mechanical system.
examples.turkish: Saat tamamen mekanik bir sistemle çalışır.

english_meaning: a system of parts working together in a machine; a process or technique

examples.english: The mechanism of the clock is very intricate.
They studied the mechanism behind the chemical reaction.
Understanding the mechanism is key to solving the problem.
examples.turkish: Mekaniizmayı anlamak, sorunu çözmek için anahtardır.

english_meaning: a flat piece of metal, typically in the form of a coin, awarded for achievement

examples.english: She won a gold medal in the competition.
The athlete proudly displayed his medal.
Medals are awarded for excellence in various fields.
examples.turkish: Çeşitli alanlarda mükemmellik için madalyalar verilir.

english_meaning: a substance used for medical treatment, especially a medicine or drug

examples.english: She took her medication every morning.
The doctor adjusted his medication dosage.
Proper medication is essential for recovery.
examples.turkish: Doğru ilaç kullanımı iyileşme için şarttır.

english_meaning: relating to the Middle Ages

examples.english: The castle is a fine example of medieval architecture.
examples.turkish: Şato, ortaçağ mimarisinin güzel bir örneğidir.

examples.english: They visited a medieval village during their trip.
examples.turkish: Seyahatleri sırasında ortaçağ köyünü ziyaret ettiler.

examples.english: Medieval literature offers a glimpse into the past.
examples.turkish: Ortaçağ edebiyatı geçmişe dair ipuçları sunar.

english_meaning: the action or practice of meditating; a period of reflection or thought

examples.english: She practices meditation every morning to reduce stress.
examples.turkish: Stresi azaltmak için her sabah meditasyon yapar.

examples.english: Meditation can help improve concentration and clarity.
examples.turkish: Meditasyon, konsantrasyon ve netlik geliştirmeye yardımcı olabilir.

examples.english: The retreat offered guided meditation sessions.

english_meaning: a sequence of single notes that is musically satisfying

examples.english: The song's melody was simple yet captivating.
She hummed a familiar melody as she worked.
The composer created a beautiful melody for the orchestra.
examples.turkish: Besteci, orkestra için güzel bir melodi besteledi.

english_meaning: the state of being a member of a group or organization

examples.english: Her membership in the club gives her access to exclusive events.
examples.turkish: Kulüpteki üyeliği, ona özel etkinliklere erişim sağlar.

examples.english: Membership fees are due annually.
examples.turkish: Üyelik aidatları yılda bir kez ödenir.

examples.english: They celebrated his long-standing membership.

english_meaning: a written message, especially in business or diplomacy

examples.english: She sent a memo to update the staff on the changes.
examples.turkish: Değişiklikler hakkında personeli bilgilendirmek için bir not gönderdi.

examples.english: The memo outlined the new company policy.
They distributed memos to all employees.

english_meaning: a historical account or biography written from personal knowledge or special sources

examples.english: Her memoir details her experiences during the war.
He published a memoir of his years in the industry.
examples.turkish: Sektörde geçirdiği yılları anlatan bir anı yayımladı.

examples.english: The memoir was both moving and insightful.
examples.turkish: Anı hem duygusal hem de aydınlatıcıydı.

english_meaning: worth remembering; easily remembered, especially because of being special or unusual

examples.english: The concert was a memorable experience.
She had a memorable performance at the festival.
Their trip to the mountains was truly memorable.
examples.turkish: Dağlara yaptıkları gezi gerçekten akılda kalıcıydı.

english_meaning: an object or structure commemorating a person or event; a ceremony in remembrance of the dead

examples.english: They visited the memorial to honor the fallen heroes.
examples.turkish: Düşen kahramanları anmak için anıtı ziyaret ettiler.

examples.english: The memorial was built to commemorate the victims.
examples.turkish: Anıt, kurbanları anmak için inşa edildi.

examples.english: A moment of silence was held at the memorial.
examples.turkish: Anıtta bir dakikalık saygı duruşu yapıldı.

english_meaning: an experienced and trusted advisor

examples.english: She relied on her mentor for career advice.
The mentor guided him through the challenges of his new job.
examples.turkish: Mentoru, yeni işindeki zorluklarda ona rehberlik etti.

examples.english: A good mentor can make a significant difference in one's life.
examples.turkish: İyi bir rehber, bir kişinin hayatında önemli farklar yaratabilir.

english_meaning: a person or company involved in wholesale trade, especially one dealing with foreign countries or supplying merchandise to a particular trade

examples.english: The merchant sold exotic spices from faraway lands.
examples.turkish: Tüccar, uzak diyarların egzotik baharatlarını sattı.

examples.english: He worked as a merchant in the bustling market.
examples.turkish: Kalabalık pazarda bir tüccar olarak çalıştı.

examples.english: Merchants played a key role in the development of trade routes.
examples.turkish: Tüccarlar, ticaret yollarının gelişiminde önemli rol oynadı.

english_meaning: compassion or forgiveness shown toward someone whom it is within one's power to punish or harm

examples.english: The judge showed mercy by giving a lighter sentence.
examples.turkish: Hakim, daha hafif bir ceza vererek merhamet gösterdi.

examples.english: They pleaded for mercy from the captors.
Her act of mercy saved his life.

english_meaning: being nothing more than; unimportant (used to emphasize how small or insignificant someone or something is)

examples.english: It was a mere coincidence that they met.
examples.turkish: Onların karşılaşması sadece bir tesadüf oldu.

examples.english: He dismissed her comments as mere noise.
examples.turkish: Onun yorumlarını sadece gereksiz gürültü olarak reddetti.

examples.english: The project is a mere fraction of what we expected.
examples.turkish: Proje, beklediğimizin sadece küçük bir kısmı.

english_meaning: just; only

examples.english: She is merely a student, not an expert.
examples.turkish: O, sadece bir öğrenci, uzman değil.

examples.english: The issue was merely a misunderstanding.
He merely nodded in agreement.

english_meaning: to combine or cause to combine to form a single entity

examples.english: The two companies decided to merge to increase efficiency.
examples.turkish: Verimliliği artırmak için iki şirket birleşmeye karar verdi.

examples.english: They merged their ideas to create a new project.
examples.turkish: Yeni bir proje oluşturmak için fikirlerini birleştirdiler.

examples.english: The lanes merge into one after the construction zone.
examples.turkish: İnşaat alanından sonra şeritler tek bir yöne birleşir.

english_meaning: the combining of two or more companies into a single entity

examples.english: The merger of the two firms created a market giant.
examples.turkish: İki şirketin birleşmesi, piyasada dev bir oyuncu yarattı.

examples.english: They announced the merger after months of negotiations.
examples.turkish: Aylar süren müzakerelerin ardından birleşmeyi duyurdular.

examples.english: The merger was approved by the regulatory authorities.

english_meaning: the quality of being particularly good or worthy, especially so as to deserve praise or reward

examples.english: The proposal has considerable merit.
He was awarded a medal on merit.
Their work was recognized on its own merit.

english_meaning: a figure of speech in which a word or phrase is applied to an object or action to which it is not literally applicable

examples.english: Life is a journey is a common metaphor.
examples.turkish: Hayat bir yolculuktur ifadesi yaygın bir metafordur.

examples.english: The poem is full of rich metaphors.
He used a metaphor to describe the complex situation.
examples.turkish: Karmaşık durumu tanımlamak için bir metafor kullandı.

english_meaning: a system of methods used in a particular area of study or activity

examples.english: The study's methodology was rigorous and detailed.
They explained the methodology used in the research.
A sound methodology is key to reliable results.
examples.turkish: Güvenilir sonuçlar için sağlam bir metodoloji şarttır.

english_meaning: the middle or central part

examples.english: In the midst of chaos, she remained calm.
They found themselves in the midst of a celebration.
examples.turkish: Kendilerini bir kutlamanın tam ortasında buldular.

examples.english: Amidst the crowd, he stood out clearly.
examples.turkish: Kalabalığın ortasında, o belirgin bir şekilde öne çıktı.

english_meaning: the movement of people or animals from one region to another

examples.english: Bird migration patterns are studied by scientists.
examples.turkish: Kuş göçü desenleri bilim insanları tarafından incelenir.

examples.english: The migration of workers has reshaped the urban landscape.
examples.turkish: İşçilerin göçü, kentsel yapıyı yeniden şekillendirdi.

examples.english: Migration has always been a part of human history.
examples.turkish: Göç, her zaman insanlık tarihinin bir parçası olmuştur.

english_meaning: aggressively active, especially in support of a cause; combative

examples.english: The militant protesters clashed with the police.
He holds militant views on environmental issues.
Militant groups have been active in the region.

english_meaning: a military force that is raised from the civil population to supplement a regular army in an emergency

examples.english: The local militia was called up during the crisis.
examples.turkish: Yerel milis kriz sırasında seferber edildi.

examples.english: Militia groups often form in times of conflict.
The militia was responsible for protecting the town.

english_meaning: a building equipped with machinery for grinding grain into flour; a factory

examples.english: The old mill has been converted into a museum.
They visited a working mill during the tour.
examples.turkish: Gezi sırasında çalışan bir değirmeni ziyaret ettiler.

examples.english: The mill produces high-quality flour.

english_meaning: a person who works in a mine

examples.english: The miner spent long hours underground.
Miners work in challenging and hazardous conditions.
examples.turkish: Madenciler zorlu ve tehlikeli koşullarda çalışırlar.

examples.english: The union fought for better conditions for miners.
examples.turkish: Sendika, madenciler için daha iyi koşullar talep etti.

english_meaning: of a minimum amount, quantity, or degree; very small

examples.english: The software requires minimal memory to run.
examples.turkish: Yazılımın çalışması için çok az bellek yeterlidir.

examples.english: He made minimal changes to the document.
The risk was minimal due to the safety measures in place.
examples.turkish: Uygulanan güvenlik önlemleri nedeniyle risk minimumdu.

english_meaning: to reduce something to the smallest possible amount or degree

examples.english: They worked hard to minimize the risks involved.
examples.turkish: İlgili riskleri en aza indirmek için çok çalıştılar.

examples.english: The new design minimizes energy consumption.
examples.turkish: Yeni tasarım, enerji tüketimini en aza indirir.

examples.english: He tried to minimize the impact of the mistake.
examples.turkish: Hatanın etkisini en aza indirmeye çalıştı.

english_meaning: the process or industry of extracting minerals from the earth

examples.english: Mining operations have a significant impact on the environment.
examples.turkish: Madencilik faaliyetleri çevre üzerinde önemli etkilere sahiptir.

examples.english: The mining industry is a major part of the economy in that region.
examples.turkish: Madencilik, o bölgenin ekonomisinin önemli bir parçasıdır.

examples.english: They implemented new technologies to improve mining efficiency.
examples.turkish: Madenciliğin verimliliğini artırmak için yeni teknolojiler uyguladılar.

english_meaning: a government department headed by a minister

examples.english: The Ministry of Education announced new reforms.
She works for the Ministry of Health.
The ministry is responsible for implementing government policies.

english_meaning: extremely small; very detailed or precise

examples.english: They examined the minute details of the painting.
The scientist focused on minute measurements.
examples.turkish: Bilim insanı, çok küçük ölçümlere odaklandı.

examples.english: Her explanation was filled with minute observations.

english_meaning: an extraordinary and welcome event that is not explicable by natural or scientific laws

examples.english: It was a miracle that he survived the accident.
examples.turkish: Kaza sonrası hayatta kalması bir mucizeydi.

examples.english: Many consider the discovery a miracle of modern science.
examples.turkish: Birçok kişi bu keşfi modern bilimin mucizesi olarak görüyor.

examples.english: They prayed for a miracle during their time of need.
examples.turkish: Zor zamanlarında bir mucize için dua ettiler.

english_meaning: extremely unhappy or uncomfortable

examples.english: He felt miserable after losing his job.
examples.turkish: İşini kaybettikten sonra kendini perişan hissetti.

examples.english: The weather made everyone feel miserable.
She looked miserable during the long, rainy day.
examples.turkish: Uzun, yağmurlu gün boyunca perişan görünüyordu.

english_meaning: a state of great distress or discomfort of mind or body

examples.english: The novel depicted the misery of war.
They lived in misery after the natural disaster.
examples.turkish: Doğal afet sonrası sefalet içinde yaşadılar.

examples.english: Her eyes reflected deep misery.

english_meaning: giving the wrong idea or impression; deceptive

examples.english: The advertisement was misleading and exaggerated the benefits.
His statement was misleading and confused the audience.
examples.turkish: Onun ifadesi yanıltıcıydı ve izleyicileri karıştırdı.

examples.english: Misleading statistics can distort public opinion.

english_meaning: an object that is forcibly propelled at a target, either by hand or from a weapon

examples.english: The military test fired a new type of missile.
examples.turkish: Askeri test, yeni bir füze denemesi yaptı.

examples.english: The missile was launched with precision.
There is growing concern about missile proliferation.
examples.turkish: Füze yayılımı konusunda artan bir endişe var.

english_meaning: a large and disorderly crowd of people, especially one that is violent

examples.english: A mob gathered outside the courthouse.
The mob became increasingly violent during the protest.
Authorities struggled to control the unruly mob.
examples.turkish: Yetkililer, asi kalabalığı kontrol altına almaya çalıştı.

english_meaning: capable of moving or being moved; also, relating to mobile phones
turkish_meaning: hareketli, mobil; cep telefonu ile ilgili

examples.english: He uses a mobile phone for all his communications.
examples.turkish: Tüm iletişimleri için cep telefonu kullanır.

examples.english: The mobile robot can navigate through tight spaces.
examples.turkish: Mobil robot, dar alanlarda hareket edebilir.

examples.english: Her ideas were mobile and innovative.

english_meaning: the ability to move or be moved freely and easily; the capacity for social or economic movement

examples.english: Urban planning aims to improve mobility in the city.
examples.turkish: Kentsel planlama, şehirde hareketliliği artırmayı hedefler.

examples.english: The company's policy promotes employee mobility.
examples.turkish: Şirket politikası, çalışanların hareketliliğini teşvik eder.

examples.english: Physical mobility is essential for an active lifestyle.
examples.turkish: Fiziksel hareketlilik aktif yaşam tarzı için gereklidir.

english_meaning: to prepare and organize (troops, people, or resources) for active service or use

examples.english: The government mobilized the army to respond to the crisis.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, krize müdahale etmek için orduyu seferber etti.

examples.english: They mobilized volunteers for the relief effort.
The campaign mobilized thousands of supporters.

english_meaning: a way or manner in which something occurs or is experienced, expressed, or done

examples.english: The new mode of transportation is both efficient and eco-friendly.
examples.turkish: Yeni ulaşım yöntemi hem verimli hem de çevre dostudur.

examples.english: She switched to a more modern mode of communication.
examples.turkish: Daha modern bir iletişim tarzına geçti.

examples.english: The computer offers several different operating modes.

english_meaning: average in amount, intensity, quality, or degree; not excessive

examples.english: She has a moderate opinion on the issue.
examples.turkish: Konu hakkında ılımlı bir görüşe sahip.

examples.english: They live in a moderate climate.
The government adopted a moderate approach to the problem.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, soruna ılımlı bir yaklaşım benimsedi.

english_meaning: unassuming or moderate in the estimation of one's abilities or achievements

examples.english: She gave a modest performance despite her talent.
examples.turkish: Yeteneğine rağmen mütevazı bir performans sergiledi.

examples.english: He is modest about his achievements.
The modest proposal was well-received.

english_meaning: a change made to something, usually to improve it or to make it less extreme

examples.english: The car underwent several modifications before it was sold.
examples.turkish: Araba, satılmadan önce birkaç değişiklikten geçirildi.

examples.english: They made modifications to the design to enhance functionality.
examples.turkish: Fonksiyonelliği artırmak için tasarımda değişiklikler yaptılar.

examples.english: The software update includes important modifications.

english_meaning: a separate component of a system, which can be combined with others to form a complex structure

examples.english: The course is divided into several modules.
Each module focuses on a specific aspect of the subject.
examples.turkish: Her modül, konunun belirli bir yönüne odaklanır.

examples.english: The new software has a user-friendly module for reporting.
examples.turkish: Yeni yazılım, raporlama için kullanıcı dostu bir modüle sahiptir.

english_meaning: the force or speed of movement; the driving force gained by motion or by a series of events

examples.english: The project gained momentum after the initial success.
examples.turkish: İlk başarıdan sonra proje ivme kazandı.

examples.english: Her speech gave momentum to the movement.
They built momentum for change through persistent efforts.
examples.turkish: Sürekli çabalarla değişim için ivme oluşturdu.

english_meaning: a member of a religious community of men typically living under vows of poverty, chastity, and obedience

examples.english: The monk devoted his life to spiritual practice.
Monks live in monasteries and follow strict routines.
examples.turkish: Keşişler, manastırlarda yaşar ve sıkı bir rutin izler.

examples.english: The serene life of a monk contrasts with modern urban living.
examples.turkish: Keşişlerin sakin yaşamı, modern şehir yaşamıyla tezat oluşturur.

english_meaning: exclusive control of a commodity or service in a particular market, or a control that makes possible the manipulation of prices

examples.english: The company gained a monopoly over the region's water supply.
examples.turkish: Şirket, bölgenin su tedarikinde tekel kurdu.

examples.english: Monopolies can lead to higher prices for consumers.
examples.turkish: Tekeller, tüketiciler için daha yüksek fiyatlara yol açabilir.

examples.english: The government is investigating allegations of monopoly practices.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, tekel uygulamalarıyla ilgili iddiaları araştırıyor.

english_meaning: an imaginary creature that is typically large, ugly, and frightening; something of extraordinary size or strength

examples.english: The movie featured a terrifying monster from the deep.
examples.turkish: Film, derinliklerden gelen korkunç bir canavar içeriyordu.

examples.english: He built a monster out of recycled materials.
examples.turkish: Geri dönüştürülmüş malzemelerden devasa bir yapı yaptı.

examples.english: The storm was a monster in its intensity.

english_meaning: occurring or produced every month

examples.english: The magazine is published on a monthly basis.
They hold monthly meetings to discuss progress.
examples.turkish: İlerlemeyi tartışmak için aylık toplantılar yaparlar.

examples.english: Her monthly report provides detailed analysis.
examples.turkish: Onun aylık raporu detaylı analiz sunar.

english_meaning: a structure or building erected to commemorate a famous or notable person or event

examples.english: They visited the monument dedicated to the war heroes.
examples.turkish: Savaş kahramanlarına adanmış anıtı ziyaret ettiler.

examples.english: The monument stands as a reminder of the past.
examples.turkish: Anıt, geçmişin bir hatırlatıcısı olarak duruyor.

examples.english: Many tourists come to see the famous monument.
examples.turkish: Birçok turist ünlü anıtı görmek için gelir.

english_meaning: principles concerning the distinction between right and wrong or good and bad behavior

examples.english: The debate centered on issues of morality and ethics.
examples.turkish: Tartışma, ahlak ve etik konuları etrafında döndü.

examples.english: He has a strong sense of morality.
Morality plays a crucial role in shaping society.
examples.turkish: Ahlak, toplumu şekillendirmede önemli bir rol oynar.

english_meaning: besides; in addition to what has been said

examples.english: The project is cost-effective; moreover, it is environmentally friendly.
examples.turkish: Proje maliyet açısından etkili; üstelik çevre dostu.

examples.english: She is talented and hardworking; moreover, she is very creative.
examples.turkish: O yetenekli ve çalışkandır; dahası, çok yaratıcıdır.

examples.english: The study is well-researched; moreover, its findings are groundbreaking.
examples.turkish: Çalışma iyi araştırılmış; üstelik bulguları çığır açıcıdır.

english_meaning: a legal agreement by which a bank lends money at interest in exchange for taking title of the debtor's property

examples.english: They applied for a mortgage to buy their first home.
examples.turkish: İlk evlerini almak için ipotek başvurusunda bulundular.

examples.english: The mortgage rate has dropped significantly this year.
examples.turkish: Bu yıl ipotek faiz oranı önemli ölçüde düştü.

examples.english: Managing a mortgage can be challenging for new homeowners.
examples.turkish: Yeni ev sahipleri için ipotek yönetimi zorlu olabilir.

english_meaning: a Muslim place of worship

examples.english: They visited the historic mosque during their trip.
examples.turkish: Seyahatleri sırasında tarihi camiyi ziyaret ettiler.

examples.english: The mosque is an important center of community life.
examples.turkish: Cami, topluluk yaşamının önemli bir merkezidir.

examples.english: Architectural details of the mosque were breathtaking.

english_meaning: a small flying insect that bites and can transmit diseases

examples.english: Mosquitoes are most active during the summer months.
examples.turkish: Sivrisinekler, yaz aylarında en aktif olanlardır.

examples.english: The area is known for its high mosquito population.
examples.turkish: Bölge, yüksek sivrisinek nüfusu ile bilinir.

examples.english: They used repellent to protect themselves from mosquitoes.

english_meaning: the action or process of moving or being moved

examples.english: There was a slight motion in the water.
The motion of the train was soothing.
They presented a motion to change the meeting time.
examples.turkish: Toplantı saatini değiştirmek için bir öneri sundular.

english_meaning: to provide (someone) with a reason for doing something; to stimulate interest or enthusiasm

examples.english: Her speech motivated everyone to work harder.
examples.turkish: Konuşması herkesi daha çok çalışmaya motive etti.

examples.english: The coach motivated the team before the match.
examples.turkish: Antrenör, maçtan önce takımı motive etti.

examples.english: They used incentives to motivate their employees.
examples.turkish: Çalışanlarını motive etmek için teşvikler kullandılar.

english_meaning: the reason or reasons one has for acting or behaving in a particular way

examples.english: Her motivation to succeed is truly inspiring.
They discussed their motivation for starting the project.
Understanding your motivation can lead to better results.
examples.turkish: Motivasyonunuzu anlamak daha iyi sonuçlara yol açabilir.

english_meaning: a reason for doing something, especially one that is hidden or not obvious

examples.english: The detective questioned the suspect about his motive.
There is no clear motive for the crime.
Understanding his motive helped explain his actions.
examples.turkish: Onun nedenini anlamak, davranışlarını açıklamaya yardımcı oldu.

english_meaning: causing strong feelings of sadness or sympathy; emotionally touching

examples.english: The movie was very moving and left many in tears.
examples.turkish: Film çok duygusaldı ve birçok kişiyi ağlattı.

examples.english: Her moving speech resonated with the audience.
examples.turkish: Onun etkileyici konuşması, izleyiciler üzerinde derin iz bıraktı.

examples.english: It was a moving tribute to the victims of the tragedy.
examples.turkish: Bu, trajedi mağdurlarına yönelik dokunaklı bir anıttı.

english_meaning: relating to a city or town or its governing body

examples.english: The municipal government approved the new park project.
They attended a municipal meeting to discuss local issues.
examples.turkish: Yerel sorunları tartışmak için belediye toplantısına katıldılar.

examples.english: Municipal services include waste management and public safety.
examples.turkish: Belediye hizmetleri, atık yönetimi ve kamu güvenliğini içerir.

english_meaning: held in common by two or more parties; shared

examples.english: They developed a mutual understanding over time.
The two companies have a mutual interest in the project.
examples.turkish: İki şirketin proje konusunda ortak bir çıkarı var.

examples.english: Mutual respect is essential in any relationship.

english_meaning: a traditional story, especially one concerning the early history of a people, that may or may not be based on fact

examples.english: The myth of the phoenix symbolizes rebirth.
examples.turkish: Anka kuşu efsanesi yeniden doğuşu simgeler.

examples.english: Many cultures have myths about the creation of the world.
examples.turkish: Birçok kültür, dünyanın yaratılışı hakkında efsanelere sahiptir.

examples.english: The myth was passed down through generations.

english_meaning: without covering; exposed

examples.english: He walked naked on the beach at dawn.
The artist painted a portrait of a naked figure.
examples.turkish: Sanatçı, çıplak bir figürün portresini yaptı.

examples.english: The truth was laid bare, naked and unadorned.
examples.turkish: Gerçek, süslenmemiş bir şekilde çıplak olarak ortaya çıktı.

english_meaning: that is to say; used to introduce specific details or examples

examples.english: Several fruits, namely apples, oranges, and bananas, were on sale.
examples.turkish: Satışta birkaç meyve vardı, yani elma, portakal ve muz.

examples.english: He specializes in European history, namely the Renaissance period.
examples.turkish: O, Avrupa tarihi üzerine uzmanlaşmıştır, yani Rönesans dönemi.

examples.english: The company focuses on renewable energy, namely solar and wind power.
examples.turkish: Şirket, yenilenebilir enerjiye odaklanmaktadır, yani güneş ve rüzgar enerjisi.

english_meaning: highly unpleasant, especially to the senses; very disagreeable

examples.english: The weather was nasty, with heavy rain and strong winds.
examples.turkish: Hava çok kötüydü, şiddetli yağmur ve kuvvetli rüzgarlarla.

examples.english: He made a nasty remark that upset everyone.
examples.turkish: Herkesi üzen pis bir yorum yaptı.

examples.english: The food tasted nasty and spoiled.
examples.turkish: Yemek iğrenç ve bozuk tat veriyordu.

english_meaning: extending throughout a whole nation; across the country

examples.english: The campaign was launched on a nationwide scale.
They conducted a nationwide survey to gather opinions.
examples.turkish: Fikirleri toplamak için ülke çapında bir anket yaptılar.

examples.english: Nationwide coverage ensured the news reached every corner of the country.
examples.turkish: Ülke genelinde yayın, haberin her köşeye ulaşmasını sağladı.

english_meaning: relating to a country's navy or navies

examples.english: The naval fleet was deployed in the Atlantic Ocean.
Naval strategy plays a crucial role in national defense.
examples.turkish: Deniz stratejisi, ulusal savunmada hayati bir rol oynar.

examples.english: He joined the naval academy after high school.

english_meaning: the process or activity of accurately ascertaining one’s position and planning and following a route

examples.english: Good navigation is essential for a successful voyage.
examples.turkish: İyi navigasyon, başarılı bir yolculuk için gereklidir.

examples.english: The ship’s navigation system helped it avoid dangerous reefs.
examples.turkish: Geminin navigasyon sistemi, tehlikeli resiflerden kaçınmasını sağladı.

examples.english: Modern navigation techniques have revolutionized air travel.
examples.turkish: Modern yön bulma teknikleri, hava yolculuğunu devrim niteliğinde değiştirdi.

english_meaning: close at hand; not far away

examples.english: There is a supermarket nearby.

examples.turkish: O, civarda yaşıyor, bu yüzden hafta sonları sık sık ziyaret ediyor.

examples.english: The school is nearby, within walking distance.

english_meaning: something that is essential or indispensable

examples.english: Water is a necessity for life.
Education is a necessity in today's world.
They provided all the necessities for the homeless shelter.

english_meaning: to fail to care for properly; lack of proper care

examples.english: Parents should never neglect the needs of their children.
examples.turkish: Ebeveynler, çocuklarının ihtiyaçlarını asla ihmal etmemelidir.

examples.english: The garden suffered from years of neglect.
examples.turkish: Bahçe yıllarca ihmal nedeniyle zarar gördü.

examples.english: Neglect of maintenance can lead to serious problems.
examples.turkish: Bakımın ihmal edilmesi ciddi sorunlara yol açabilir.

english_meaning: to try to reach an agreement or compromise by discussion

examples.english: They will negotiate a new contract next week.
examples.turkish: Gelecek hafta yeni bir sözleşme için pazarlık yapacaklar.

examples.english: It is important to negotiate fair terms in any agreement.
examples.turkish: Herhangi bir anlaşmada adil şartlar için pazarlık yapmak önemlidir.

examples.english: The union is negotiating with management over wages.
examples.turkish: Sendika, ücretler konusunda yönetimle pazarlık yapıyor.

english_meaning: discussion aimed at reaching an agreement

examples.english: The negotiation lasted for several hours.
They reached an agreement at the end of the negotiation.
Successful negotiation requires compromise from both sides.
examples.turkish: Başarılı müzakere, her iki tarafın da ödün vermesini gerektirir.

english_meaning: situated next to or very near

examples.turkish: Seyahatleri sırasında birkaç komşu ülkeyi ziyaret ettiler.

examples.english: The neighboring towns share many cultural events.
examples.turkish: Komşu kasabalar pek çok kültürel etkinliği paylaşır.

examples.english: A neighboring village offered them shelter during the storm.
examples.turkish: Komşu bir köy fırtına sırasında onlara sığınak sundu.

english_meaning: a structure or place made or chosen by a bird for laying eggs and sheltering its young

examples.english: The bird built its nest in the tall tree.
examples.turkish: Kuş, uzun bir ağacın tepesinde yuva yaptı.

examples.english: We spotted a nest filled with baby birds in the garden.
examples.turkish: Bahçede, yavru kuşlarla dolu bir yuva fark ettik.

examples.english: A cozy nest provided the perfect shelter during the storm.
examples.turkish: Sıcak bir yuva, fırtına sırasında mükemmel bir sığınak sağladı.

english_meaning: remaining after all deductions have been made

examples.english: After expenses, the company’s net profit increased.
examples.turkish: Giderlerden sonra şirketin net kârı arttı.

examples.english: He calculated the net weight of the shipment.

english_meaning: not supporting or helping either side in a conflict; impartial

examples.english: The country remained neutral during the war.

examples.turkish: Tartışmalı konuda tarafsız bir tutum sergiledi.

examples.english: The mediator played a neutral role in the negotiations.
examples.turkish: Arabulucu, müzakerelerde tarafsız bir rol oynadı.

english_meaning: recently; not long ago

examples.turkish: Yeni çıkan kitap övgü dolu eleştiriler aldı.

examples.english: He moved into a newly built apartment.
examples.turkish: Yeni inşa edilmiş bir daireye taşındı.

english_meaning: a printed or electronic report containing news and information

examples.english: The company sends out a monthly newsletter to its subscribers.
examples.turkish: Şirket, abonelerine aylık bir haber bülteni gönderir.

examples.english: She read the newsletter to stay updated on community events.
examples.turkish: Toplum etkinliklerinden haberdar olmak için haber bültenini okudu.

examples.english: The newsletter featured an interview with a local artist.

english_meaning: a specialized segment of the market for a particular kind of product or service

examples.english: They found a profitable niche in the market for eco-friendly products.

examples.english: The company specializes in a niche area of technology.
examples.turkish: Şirket, teknolojinin niş bir alanında uzmanlaşmıştır.

examples.english: Her blog caters to a niche audience interested in vintage fashion.
examples.turkish: Onun blogu, vintage modaya ilgi duyan niş bir kitleye hitap ediyor.

examples.english: Nickel is often used to make stainless steel.

examples.english: The coin is made primarily of nickel and copper.
examples.turkish: Madeni para, esas olarak nikel ve bakırdan yapılmıştır.

examples.english: They discovered a rich deposit of nickel in the mine.
examples.turkish: Maden ocağında zengin bir nikel yatağı keşfettiler.

english_meaning: having or showing fine personal qualities or high moral principles

examples.english: He comes from a noble family with a long history of public service.

english_meaning: to lower and raise one's head slightly and briefly, especially in greeting, agreement, or recognition

english_meaning: to propose or formally enter as a candidate for an honor or position

examples.english: The nomination process is highly competitive.

examples.english: Several nominees were considered for the prestigious award.

examples.english: He was tired; nonetheless, he agreed to help.

examples.turkish: Kâr amacı gütmeyen kurumlar genellikle gönüllülere güvenir.

english_meaning: a standard or pattern, especially of social behavior, that is typical or expected

english_meaning: a book of blank pages for writing notes

examples.english: The student wrote all his assignments in a notebook.
examples.turkish: Öğrenci tüm ödevlerini bir deftere yazdı.

examples.english: I bought a new notebook for my travel journal.

examples.turkish: O bölge yüksek suç oranlarıyla ünlüdür.

english_meaning: new and not resembling something formerly known or used

examples.turkish: Bilim insanları, plastiğin geri dönüşümü için yeni bir yöntem geliştirdiler.

examples.english: Her novel approach to the problem surprised everyone.
examples.turkish: Soruna getirdiği alışılmadık yaklaşım herkesi şaşırttı.

examples.english: The novel design of the building attracted much attention.
examples.turkish: Binanın yeni tasarımı büyük ilgi çekti.

english_meaning: a writer of novels

examples.turkish: Roman yazarı, eserleriyle birçok ödül kazandı.

examples.english: He aspires to become a famous novelist.
examples.turkish: Ünlü bir roman yazarı olmayı hedefliyor.

examples.english: The novelist’s latest book has become a bestseller.
examples.turkish: Roman yazarının son kitabı çok satanlar listesine girdi.

english_meaning: at the present time; nowadays

english_meaning: a place where young children are cared for, typically while their parents are at work

examples.turkish: Anaokulu, küçük çocuklar için güvenli bir ortam sağlar.

examples.english: Parents appreciate the nurturing atmosphere of the nursery.
examples.turkish: Ebeveynler, anaokulunun şefkatli atmosferini takdir eder.

english_meaning: relating to the care of the sick or infirm, typically by nurses

examples.english: She chose a career in nursing to help others.
examples.turkish: Başkalarına yardım etmek için hemşirelik kariyerini seçti.

examples.english: Nursing homes provide care for the elderly.

examples.turkish: Hastanede kaldığı süre boyunca mükemmel hemşirelik bakımı aldı.

english_meaning: the process of providing or obtaining the food necessary for health and growth

examples.english: Good nutrition is essential for a healthy life.
examples.turkish: İyi beslenme, sağlıklı bir yaşam için gereklidir.

examples.english: The nutrition of the child improved after dietary changes.
examples.turkish: Diyet değişikliklerinden sonra çocuğun beslenmesi iyileşti.

examples.english: They organized a seminar on nutrition and wellness.
examples.turkish: Beslenme ve sağlıklı yaşam üzerine bir seminer düzenlediler.

english_meaning: the condition of being grossly fat or overweight

examples.english: Obesity is a growing health problem in many countries.
examples.turkish: Obezite, birçok ülkede artan bir sağlık sorunudur.

examples.english: Doctors warn that obesity can lead to serious diseases.
examples.turkish: Doktorlar, obezitenin ciddi hastalıklara yol açabileceği konusunda uyarıyor.

examples.english: The government launched a campaign to reduce obesity rates.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, obezite oranlarını düşürmek için bir kampanya başlattı.

english_meaning: an expression of disapproval or opposition

examples.turkish: Önerilen değişikliklere karşı çok az itiraz vardı.

examples.english: The lawyer filed an objection during the trial.

english_meaning: to do as someone asks or desires in order to help or please them

examples.english: I am always happy to oblige my friends when they need help.
examples.turkish: Arkadaşlarımın yardımına ihtiyaç duyduğunda onlara yardımcı olmaktan her zaman mutluyum.

examples.english: The company is obliged to provide a safe working environment.
examples.turkish: Şirket, güvenli bir çalışma ortamı sağlamak zorundadır.

examples.english: He felt obliged to assist her with the heavy bags.

english_meaning: a person who watches or notices something, especially in order to report it

examples.english: The observer noted several unusual behaviors in the study.

examples.english: A trained observer monitored the wildlife in the forest.
examples.turkish: Eğitimli bir gözlemci ormandaki yaban hayatını izledi.

examples.english: The event was covered by several independent observers.
examples.turkish: Etkinlik, bağımsız gözlemciler tarafından takip edildi.

english_meaning: to preoccupy or fill the mind of someone continually, intrusively, and to a troubling extent

examples.english: He tends to obsess over minor details.
examples.turkish: Küçük detaylar üzerinde takıntı yapmaya eğilimlidir.

examples.english: She became obsessed with the idea of starting her own business.
examples.turkish: Kendi işini kurma fikrine takıntılı hale geldi.

examples.english: Obsessing over past mistakes can hinder progress.

english_meaning: an idea or thought that continually preoccupies or intrudes on a person's mind

examples.english: Her obsession with perfection made her a perfectionist.
examples.turkish: Mükemmelliğe olan takıntısı onu bir mükemmeliyetçi yaptı.

examples.english: He has an unhealthy obsession with video games.
examples.turkish: Video oyunlarına sağlıksız bir takıntısı var.

examples.english: Obsessions can sometimes lead to stress and anxiety.
examples.turkish: Takıntılar bazen stres ve anksiyeteye yol açabilir.

english_meaning: a thing that blocks one's way or prevents progress

examples.english: Lack of funding was a major obstacle to the project.
examples.turkish: Yetersiz finansman, proje için büyük bir engeldi.

examples.english: They overcame every obstacle in their path.

examples.turkish: İletişim bazen müzakerelerde bir engel olabilir.

english_meaning: occurring, appearing, or done infrequently and irregularly

examples.english: They met on an occasional basis to discuss their work.
examples.turkish: İşlerini tartışmak için ara sıra buluşurlardı.

examples.english: An occasional break during work can boost productivity.
examples.turkish: İş arasında ara vermek verimliliği artırabilir.

examples.english: She enjoys the occasional treat on weekends.
examples.turkish: Hafta sonları ara sıra tatlı bir şeyler yemekten hoşlanır.

english_meaning: a job or profession

examples.english: Her occupation as a teacher requires patience and dedication.
examples.turkish: Öğretmen olarak mesleği, sabır ve adanmışlık gerektirir.

examples.english: He listed his occupation as an engineer on the form.

english_meaning: to reside or be present in a place; to take up space or time

examples.english: The protesters occupied the main square for hours.
examples.turkish: Protestocular, ana meydanı saatlerce işgal etti.

examples.english: Students occupy the campus library during exam periods.
examples.turkish: Öğrenciler, sınav dönemlerinde kampüs kütüphanesini kullanırlar.

examples.english: Heavy furniture can occupy a lot of space in a small room.
examples.turkish: Ağır mobilyalar, küçük bir odada çok yer kaplayabilir.

english_meaning: an incident or event

examples.english: The occurrence of earthquakes in this region is rare.
examples.turkish: Bu bölgede depremlerin meydana gelmesi nadirdir.

examples.english: They recorded the occurrence of a strange phenomenon.
examples.turkish: Garip bir olayın meydana gelişini kaydettiler.

examples.english: Such occurrences are usually well-documented.

english_meaning: the ratio of the probability of an event occurring to it not occurring

examples.english: The odds of winning the lottery are very low.
Despite the odds, they managed to succeed.
He defied the odds and achieved his goal.

english_meaning: a person who commits an illegal or immoral act

examples.english: The offender was arrested by the police.
Repeat offenders may face harsher penalties.
examples.turkish: Tekrarlayan suçlular daha sert cezalara çarptırılabilir.

examples.english: The community demanded that the offender be punished.

english_meaning: something presented or offered, such as a product, service, or contribution

examples.english: The company made an attractive offering to its customers.
examples.turkish: Şirket, müşterilerine cazip bir teklif sundu.

examples.english: Religious offerings are made during the festival.
Her latest offering in the art world received critical acclaim.
examples.turkish: Sanat dünyasındaki son eseri eleştirmenlerden övgü aldı.

english_meaning: a person's child or children; the young of an animal

examples.english: The lion's offspring stayed close to the pride.
examples.turkish: Aslanın yavruları gurup içinde yakında kaldı.

examples.english: Her offspring are studying at various universities.
examples.turkish: Onun çocukları çeşitli üniversitelerde öğrenim görüyor.

examples.english: The tree produces a large amount of offspring each season.
examples.turkish: Ağaç, her mevsim çok sayıda yavru verir.

english_meaning: continuing; still in progress

examples.english: They are working on an ongoing project to improve the system.
examples.turkish: Sistemi geliştirmek için devam eden bir proje üzerinde çalışıyorlar.

examples.english: Ongoing research is needed to address the issue.
examples.turkish: Sorunu çözmek için devam eden araştırmalara ihtiyaç var.

examples.english: The ongoing discussion lasted for several hours.
examples.turkish: Devam eden tartışma birkaç saat sürdü.

english_meaning: in an honest and direct manner; without concealment

examples.english: He spoke openly about his struggles.
They openly expressed their opinions during the meeting.
The company openly shared its future plans with the employees.
examples.turkish: Şirket, geleceğe dair planlarını çalışanlarıyla açıkça paylaştı.

english_meaning: a dramatic work in one or more acts, set to music for singers and instrumentalists

examples.english: They went to the opera to see a famous performance.
examples.turkish: Ünlü bir gösteriyi izlemek için operaya gittiler.

examples.english: Opera requires a combination of singing and acting skills.
examples.turkish: Opera, şarkı söyleme ve oyunculuk becerilerinin birleşimini gerektirir.

examples.english: The opera house was beautifully decorated for the evening performance.
examples.turkish: Opera binası, akşam gösterisi için güzelce dekore edilmişti.

english_meaning: relating to the routine functioning of an organization or system

examples.english: The new software made the business more operationally efficient.
examples.turkish: Yeni yazılım, işletmenin operasyonel verimliliğini artırdı.

examples.english: Operational procedures must be strictly followed.
The operational costs of the project were higher than expected.

english_meaning: a person who operates equipment or a machine

examples.english: The crane operator skillfully moved the heavy load.
examples.turkish: Vinç operatörü ağır yükü ustaca taşıdı.

examples.english: An experienced operator is essential for running complex machinery.
examples.turkish: Karmaşık makineleri çalıştırmak için deneyimli bir operatör gereklidir.

examples.english: The telephone operator connected the call promptly.

english_meaning: to make a choice from a range of possibilities

examples.english: They opted to travel by train instead of flying.
examples.turkish: Uçmak yerine trenle seyahat etmeyi tercih ettiler.

examples.english: She opted for the vegetarian meal.
When given a choice, I usually opt for quality over quantity.
examples.turkish: Seçenek verildiğinde, genellikle miktar yerine kaliteyi tercih ederim.

english_meaning: relating to sight or the science of light

examples.english: The optical illusion made the image appear to move.
examples.turkish: Optik illüzyon, görüntünün hareket ediyormuş gibi görünmesini sağladı.

examples.english: He studied optical physics in college.
They installed an optical fiber network to improve connectivity.
examples.turkish: Bağlantıyı artırmak için optik fiber ağı kurdular.

english_meaning: a tendency to be hopeful and confident about the future

examples.english: Her optimism in the face of adversity was inspiring.
examples.turkish: Zorluklar karşısında gösterdiği iyimserlik ilham vericiydi.

examples.english: Optimism can lead to better problem-solving.
examples.turkish: İyimserlik, daha iyi problem çözümüne yol açabilir.

examples.english: They maintained optimism despite the challenges.

english_meaning: expecting the best in all possible ways; hopeful

examples.english: She remains optimistic about the future.
examples.turkish: Gelecek hakkında iyimser kalmaya devam ediyor.

examples.english: Despite the setbacks, he was optimistic that things would improve.
An optimistic outlook can make difficult times more bearable.
examples.turkish: İyimser bir bakış açısı, zorlu zamanları daha katlanılabilir hale getirebilir.

english_meaning: spoken rather than written

examples.english: She gave an oral presentation at the conference.
Oral exams are sometimes more challenging than written ones.
examples.turkish: Sözlü sınavlar bazen yazılı olanlardan daha zor olabilir.

examples.english: He prefers oral communication over emails.
examples.turkish: E-postalardan ziyade sözlü iletişimi tercih eder.

english_meaning: a large group of musicians who play together on various instruments

examples.english: The orchestra performed a symphony by Beethoven.
She dreams of joining a famous orchestra.
examples.turkish: Ünlü bir orkestra'ya katılmayı hayal ediyor.

examples.english: The conductor led the orchestra with great passion.
examples.turkish: Şef, orkestrayı büyük bir tutkuyla yönetti.

english_meaning: derived from living matter; produced without the use of chemical fertilizers or pesticides

examples.english: They prefer to buy organic fruits and vegetables.
examples.turkish: Organik meyve ve sebzeleri satın almayı tercih ederler.

examples.english: Organic farming avoids the use of synthetic chemicals.
examples.turkish: Organik tarım, sentetik kimyasalların kullanımından kaçınır.

examples.english: The restaurant offers a variety of organic dishes.

english_meaning: relating to the structure or functioning of an organization

examples.english: Organizational skills are essential for managing a business.
examples.turkish: Kurumsal beceriler, bir işletmeyi yönetmek için esastır.

examples.english: They underwent training in organizational behavior.
The organizational structure was redesigned for efficiency.
examples.turkish: Verimliliği artırmak için organizasyon yapısı yeniden düzenlendi.

english_meaning: the determination of the relative position of something or someone; the act of introducing someone to a new environment or situation

examples.english: The new employees attended an orientation session on their first day.
examples.turkish: Yeni çalışanlar ilk günlerinde bir oryantasyon oturumuna katıldılar.

examples.english: Geographical orientation is important for navigation.
The orientation of the building was designed to maximize natural light.
examples.turkish: Binanın konumu, doğal ışığı en üst düzeye çıkarmak için tasarlandı.

english_meaning: to begin, arise, or derive from a source

examples.english: The custom originated in ancient times.
Many modern ideas originate from classical philosophy.
examples.turkish: Pek çok modern fikir, klasik felsefeden kaynaklanır.

examples.english: This tradition originated from rural communities.
examples.turkish: Bu gelenek, kırsal topluluklardan ortaya çıktı.

english_meaning: a sudden start or increase of something unwelcome, such as a disease

examples.english: An outbreak of the flu has been reported in the city.
There was an outbreak of protests after the announcement.
Authorities worked quickly to contain the outbreak.
examples.turkish: Yetkililer salgını kontrol altına almak için hızlıca çalıştı.

english_meaning: a set of clothes worn together, typically for a particular occasion or purpose

examples.english: She bought a new outfit for the party.
examples.turkish: Parti için yeni bir takım elbise aldı.

examples.english: The athlete’s outfit was designed for maximum performance.
examples.turkish: Sporcunun kıyafeti maksimum performans için tasarlandı.

examples.english: He changed his outfit before heading out.

english_meaning: a short trip or excursion, especially one engaged in as a leisure activity

examples.english: They planned a family outing to the park.
examples.turkish: Ailece parka kısa bir gezi planladılar.

examples.english: The school organized an outing for the students.
examples.turkish: Okul, öğrenciler için bir gezinti düzenledi.

examples.english: An outing to the countryside is refreshing after a busy week.
examples.turkish: Yoğun bir haftadan sonra kırsala yapılan gezi ferahlatıcıdır.

english_meaning: a means of expressing or releasing energy, or a store selling goods at reduced prices

examples.english: The artist used painting as an outlet for her emotions.
examples.turkish: Sanatçı, duygularını ifade etmek için resim yapmayı bir çıkış yolu olarak kullandı.

examples.english: They shopped at an outlet mall for discounted designer clothes.
examples.turkish: İndirimli tasarımcı kıyafetleri için bir outlet alışveriş merkezinde alışveriş yaptılar.

examples.english: The new outlet store offers a wide range of products.
examples.turkish: Yeni outlet mağazası geniş bir ürün yelpazesi sunuyor.

english_meaning: a person's point of view or general attitude toward life

examples.english: Her positive outlook on life is truly inspiring.
examples.turkish: Hayata karşı olumlu bakış açısı gerçekten ilham verici.

examples.english: The economic outlook for the coming year is promising.
examples.turkish: Gelecek yıl için ekonomik görünüm umut verici.

examples.english: He maintained a realistic outlook despite the challenges.
examples.turkish: Zorluklara rağmen gerçekçi bir bakış açısını korudu.

english_meaning: the amount of something produced by a person, machine, or industry

examples.english: The factory increased its output by 20% this year.
High output is a sign of efficient operations.
The computer's output was displayed on the monitor.

english_meaning: an extremely strong reaction of anger, shock, or indignation; to cause such a reaction

examples.english: The scandal caused public outrage.
He was outraged by the unfair treatment.
The decision outraged many people in the community.
examples.turkish: Karar, toplulukta pek çok kişiyi öfkelendirdi.

english_meaning: a person who does not belong to a particular group

examples.english: He felt like an outsider in the exclusive club.
The outsider provided a fresh perspective on the problem.
examples.turkish: Yabancı, soruna taze bir bakış açısı getirdi.

examples.english: As an outsider, she was able to notice details others missed.
examples.turkish: Bir yabancı olarak, başkalarının kaçırdığı detayları fark edebildi.

english_meaning: exceptionally good; clearly superior to others

examples.english: Her performance was outstanding and received a standing ovation.
The student produced outstanding work on the project.
examples.turkish: Öğrenci projede seçkin bir çalışma ortaya koydu.

examples.english: He is recognized as an outstanding leader in his field.
examples.turkish: Alanında olağanüstü bir lider olarak tanınıyor.

english_meaning: to succeed in dealing with a problem or difficulty

examples.english: She managed to overcome her fear of public speaking.
examples.turkish: Toplum önünde konuşma korkusunun üstesinden geldi.

examples.english: They worked together to overcome the obstacles.
examples.turkish: Engellerin üstesinden gelmek için birlikte çalıştılar.

examples.english: He overcame a difficult childhood to become successful.
examples.turkish: Zorlu bir çocukluğun üstesinden gelerek başarılı oldu.

english_meaning: to fail to notice something; to disregard

examples.english: Don't overlook the details in the report.
She overlooked a mistake in the calculations.
The manager tends to overlook minor errors.
examples.turkish: Yönetici, küçük hataları görmezden gelmeye eğilimlidir.

english_meaning: to an excessive degree; too

examples.english: He was overly critical of the new policy.
The instructions were overly complicated.
She was overly excited about the opportunity.

english_meaning: during or in the course of the night; very quickly

examples.english: The city changed dramatically overnight.
examples.turkish: Şehir bir gecede dramatik şekilde değişti.

examples.english: He became famous almost overnight.
The new policy was implemented overnight.
examples.turkish: Yeni politika bir gecede uygulamaya kondu.

english_meaning: to supervise or manage a project, operation, or activity

examples.english: The project manager will oversee the construction work.
She was hired to oversee the day-to-day operations of the store.
examples.turkish: Mağazanın günlük işleyişini denetlemek için işe alındı.

examples.english: They appointed an expert to oversee the implementation of the new system.
examples.turkish: Yeni sistemin uygulanmasını denetlemek için bir uzman atadılar.

english_meaning: to turn something upside down or cause it to collapse; to reverse a decision

examples.english: The court overturned the previous ruling.
Strong winds can overturn a boat in rough waters.
examples.turkish: Şiddetli rüzgarlar, dalgalı sularda bir tekneyi devirebilir.

examples.english: They worked to overturn the unfair regulation.

english_meaning: to bury or drown beneath a huge mass; to defeat completely

examples.english: The flood overwhelmed the small town.
She was overwhelmed by the generosity of her friends.
The army was overwhelmed by the enemy forces.
examples.turkish: Ordu, düşman kuvvetleri tarafından altına alındı.

english_meaning: very great in amount; overpowering

examples.english: The overwhelming majority of voters supported the initiative.
There was an overwhelming response to the charity event.
examples.turkish: Hayır etkinliğine ezici bir ilgi gösterildi.

examples.english: She felt an overwhelming sense of gratitude.

english_meaning: the state or fact of owning something

examples.english: He took pride in the ownership of his new car.
The company has full ownership of its patents.
Home ownership is a dream for many people.
examples.turkish: Ev sahibi olmak birçok kişinin hayalidir.

english_meaning: a colorless, odorless reactive gas, the life-supporting component of the air

examples.english: Oxygen is essential for human life.
The patient was given supplemental oxygen.
Plants produce oxygen during photosynthesis.

english_meaning: a small package or collection of items

examples.english: He bought a packet of seeds to plant in his garden.
examples.turkish: Bahçesine dikmek için bir paket tohum aldı.

examples.english: The teacher distributed a packet of worksheets to the students.
examples.turkish: Öğretmen öğrencilere bir paket çalışma kağıdı dağıttı.

examples.english: She opened a packet of tissues when she started crying.
examples.turkish: Ağlamaya başladığında bir paket mendil açtı.

english_meaning: a cushion-like mass or a protective cover

examples.english: She placed a pad under the vase to protect the table.
examples.turkish: Masayı korumak için vazonun altına bir ped koydu.

examples.english: The athlete used knee pads during the game.
examples.turkish: Sporcu maç sırasında diz pedleri kullandı.

examples.english: He bought a new notepad for his meetings.
examples.turkish: Toplantılar için yeni bir not defteri aldı.

english_meaning: the inner surface of the hand between the wrist and fingers

examples.english: He held the coin in the palm of his hand.
examples.turkish: Madeni parayı elinin avuç içinde tuttu.

examples.english: Sweat gathered on the palm of her hand during the interview.
examples.turkish: Röportaj sırasında elinin avuç kısmında ter birikti.

examples.english: The fortune teller read his future by examining his palm.
examples.turkish: Fal baktıran, geleceğini elinin avuç içini inceleyerek yorumladı.

english_meaning: sudden uncontrollable fear or anxiety, often causing wildly unthinking behavior

examples.english: A sense of panic spread throughout the crowd.
She felt a sudden panic when she realized she had lost her keys.
examples.turkish: Anahtarlarını kaybettiğini fark ettiğinde ani bir panik hissetti.

examples.english: The fire alarm triggered panic among the building occupants.
examples.turkish: Yangın alarmı, bina sakinleri arasında panik yarattı.

english_meaning: a public procession, especially one celebrating a special day or event

examples.english: The city organized a parade to celebrate the national holiday.
examples.turkish: Şehir, ulusal bayramı kutlamak için bir geçit töreni düzenledi.

examples.english: The colorful parade attracted large crowds.
examples.turkish: Renkli geçit töreni büyük kalabalıkları çekti.

examples.english: They watched the parade with great excitement.
examples.turkish: Geçit törenini büyük bir heyecanla izlediler.

english_meaning: side by side and having the same distance continuously between them; a similarity or analogy

examples.english: The roads run parallel to each other.
There are many parallels between the two stories.
examples.turkish: İki hikaye arasında pek çok benzerlik vardır.

examples.english: He drew a parallel between modern technology and art.
examples.turkish: Modern teknoloji ile sanat arasında bir paralellik kurdu.

english_meaning: a numerical or other measurable factor forming one of a set that defines a system or sets the conditions of its operation

examples.english: The engineer adjusted the parameters to optimize performance.
examples.turkish: Mühendis, performansı optimize etmek için parametreleri ayarladı.

examples.english: Understanding the parameters is crucial for accurate analysis.
examples.turkish: Doğru analiz için parametrelerin anlaşılması çok önemlidir.

examples.english: They set strict parameters for the experiment.

english_meaning: relating to parents or the responsibilities of parents

examples.english: Parental guidance is recommended for this movie.
examples.turkish: Bu film için ebeveyn denetimi önerilir.

examples.english: They organized a workshop on parental responsibilities.
examples.turkish: Ebeveyn sorumlulukları hakkında bir atölye düzenlediler.

examples.english: Parental leave policies vary from country to country.
examples.turkish: Ebeveyn izni politikaları ülkeden ülkeye değişir.

english_meaning: the highest legislative authority in a country

examples.english: The bill was debated in parliament for several days.
Members of parliament voted on the new law.
examples.turkish: Parlamento üyeleri yeni yasa üzerinde oy kullandı.

examples.english: The parliament passed the motion unanimously.

english_meaning: incomplete; biased

examples.english: Her report was criticized for being partial and biased.
examples.turkish: Raporu, kısmi ve önyargılı olduğu için eleştirildi.

examples.english: He only gave a partial explanation of the situation.
examples.turkish: Durum hakkında yalnızca kısmi bir açıklama yaptı.

examples.english: Partial payment was made for the services rendered.
examples.turkish: Verilen hizmetler için kısmi ödeme yapıldı.

english_meaning: to a limited extent; not completely

examples.english: The system was partially automated.
He was partially responsible for the mistake.
The project was partially funded by the government.
examples.turkish: Proje, kısmen hükümet tarafından finanse edildi.

english_meaning: the action of taking part in something

examples.english: Active participation in class can improve learning.
They encouraged community participation in the project.
Her participation in the debate was impressive.

english_meaning: an association of two or more people as partners

examples.english: They formed a successful business partnership.
The partnership between the companies proved profitable.
A strong partnership is key to long-term success.
examples.turkish: Güçlü bir ortaklık, uzun vadeli başarının anahtarıdır.

english_meaning: involving work or study on a part-time basis

examples.english: She works part-time while studying at university.
They hired part-time employees for the weekend shift.
examples.turkish: Hafta sonu vardiyası için yarı zamanlı çalışanlar işe aldılar.

examples.english: Part-time jobs can offer flexibility to students.
examples.turkish: Yarı zamanlı işler, öğrencilere esneklik sunabilir.

english_meaning: the act of going by or the passage of time

examples.english: The passing of time can heal old wounds.
He made a passing comment about the weather.
examples.turkish: Hava hakkında kısa bir yorum yaptı.

examples.english: The passing of the seasons is a natural process.

english_meaning: having, showing, or caused by strong feelings or beliefs

examples.english: She is passionate about environmental conservation.
His passionate speech moved the audience.
They are passionate supporters of the arts.

english_meaning: accepting or allowing what happens or what others do without active response or resistance

examples.english: He remained passive during the debate, rarely offering his opinion.
examples.turkish: Tartışma sırasında pasif kaldı, nadiren fikrini belirtti.

examples.english: Her passive attitude made it difficult for her to assert herself.
examples.turkish: Pasif tutumu, kendini ifade etmesini zorlaştırdı.

examples.english: The passive approach sometimes prevents conflict but may also slow progress.
examples.turkish: Pasif yaklaşım bazen çatışmayı önler ama ilerlemeyi de yavaşlatabilir.

english_meaning: a secret word or phrase that must be used to gain admission to something

examples.english: Make sure your password is strong and unique.
examples.turkish: Parolanızın güçlü ve benzersiz olduğundan emin olun.

examples.english: She forgot her password and had to reset it.
examples.turkish: Parolasını unuttu ve sıfırlamak zorunda kaldı.

examples.english: Always change your password regularly for security reasons.
examples.turkish: Güvenlik nedeniyle parolanızı düzenli olarak değiştirin.

english_meaning: a minister in charge of a Christian church or congregation

examples.english: The pastor delivered an inspiring sermon on forgiveness.
examples.turkish: Papaz, affedicilik üzerine ilham verici bir vaaz verdi.

examples.english: She consulted the pastor for guidance during difficult times.
examples.turkish: Zor zamanlarda rehberlik için papaza danıştı.

examples.english: The pastor is well-respected in his community for his compassion.

english_meaning: a small piece of material used to mend or cover a hole or weak spot

examples.english: He sewed a patch onto the torn jacket.
The software update included a patch for security issues.
examples.turkish: Yazılım güncellemesi, güvenlik sorunları için bir yama içeriyordu.

examples.english: She applied a patch to the scraped knee.
examples.turkish: Sürtünmeden oluşan yaraya bir yama uyguladı.

english_meaning: a government authority or license conferring a right or title for a set period, especially the sole right to exclude others from making, using, or selling an invention

examples.english: She obtained a patent for her innovative design.
The patent prevents other companies from copying the invention.
examples.turkish: Patent, diğer şirketlerin buluşu kopyalamasını engeller.

examples.english: Securing a patent is crucial for protecting intellectual property.
examples.turkish: Fikri mülkiyeti korumak için patent almak çok önemlidir.

english_meaning: a route or track between places

examples.english: The garden features a stone pathway that winds through the flowers.
examples.turkish: Bahçede, çiçeklerin arasında dolanan taş bir patika var.

examples.english: Education is often seen as a pathway to success.
examples.turkish: Eğitim, sıklıkla başarıya giden bir yol olarak görülür.

examples.english: They built a pathway along the river for walking and cycling.
examples.turkish: Yürüyüş ve bisiklet için nehir boyunca bir yol inşa ettiler.

english_meaning: the capacity to accept or tolerate delay, trouble, or suffering without getting angry or upset

examples.english: She showed remarkable patience while teaching the children.
Patience is key when learning a new skill.
examples.turkish: Yeni bir beceri öğrenirken sabır anahtardır.

examples.english: He waited with great patience for his turn.

english_meaning: the act of keeping watch over an area by regularly walking or driving around it; to monitor or guard an area

examples.english: The police patrol the neighborhood every night.
examples.turkish: Polis her gece mahalleyi devriye gezer.

examples.english: They patrolled the perimeter of the facility to ensure security.
examples.turkish: Güvenliği sağlamak için tesisin çevresini devriye gezdiler.

examples.english: A patrol of soldiers was deployed to the border.
examples.turkish: Sınırda devriye gezmek üzere bir asker grubu konuşlandırıldı.

english_meaning: a person who gives financial or other support to a person, organization, or cause; a customer

examples.english: The restaurant’s loyal patrons appreciate the friendly service.
examples.turkish: Restoranın sadık müşterileri, samimi hizmeti takdir ediyor.

examples.english: He is a generous patron of the arts.
examples.turkish: Sanata cömertçe destek veren bir patron.

examples.english: The patron left a generous tip after the meal.
examples.turkish: Yemekten sonra müşteri cömertçe bahşiş bıraktı.

english_meaning: to temporarily stop an action or activity; a temporary stop

examples.english: She paused the movie to answer the phone.
There was a brief pause in the music during the transition.
examples.turkish: Geçiş sırasında müzikte kısa bir ara oldu.

examples.english: After a long pause, he continued with his speech.
examples.turkish: Uzun bir aradan sonra konuşmasına devam etti.

english_meaning: the highest point, either of a mountain or in a figurative sense, the most intense point

examples.english: They reached the peak of the mountain just before sunset.
examples.turkish: Gün batımından hemen önce dağın zirvesine ulaştılar.

examples.english: The debate reached its peak during the final argument.
examples.turkish: Tartışma son argüman sırasında zirveye ulaştı.

examples.english: Peak performance is expected from the athletes at the championship.

english_meaning: a poor smallholder or agricultural laborer of low social status

examples.english: The peasants worked hard in the fields from sunrise to sunset.
examples.turkish: Köylüler, gün doğumundan gün batımına kadar tarlada çok çalıştılar.

examples.english: Historical novels often portray the life of a peasant in medieval times.
examples.turkish: Tarihi romanlar, ortaçağ köylüsünün yaşamını sık sık betimler.

examples.english: The peasant community maintained its traditions despite hardships.
examples.turkish: Köylü topluluğu, zorluklara rağmen geleneklerini sürdürdü.

english_meaning: strange or odd; unusual

examples.english: He has a peculiar habit of talking to himself.
examples.turkish: Kendisiyle konuşma gibi tuhaf bir alışkanlığı var.

examples.english: The painting has a peculiar style that sets it apart.
examples.turkish: Tablonun onu diğerlerinden ayıran garip bir tarzı var.

examples.english: There is something peculiar about the way she smiles.
examples.turkish: Onun gülüşünde tuhaf bir şey var.

english_meaning: a person of the same age, status, or ability as another; an equal

examples.english: She enjoys spending time with her peers at school.
The research was conducted among peers in the industry.
examples.turkish: Araştırma, sektördeki eşit düzeydeki kişiler arasında yapıldı.

examples.english: His peers respected him for his expertise.

english_meaning: a punishment imposed for breaking a law, rule, or contract

examples.english: The player received a penalty for committing a foul.
examples.turkish: Oyuncu, kural ihlali yaptığı için ceza aldı.

examples.english: Late payment may result in a financial penalty.
examples.turkish: Geç ödeme, maddi cezaya neden olabilir.

examples.english: The contract includes a penalty clause for delays.
examples.turkish: Sözleşme, gecikmeler için ceza maddesi içerir.

english_meaning: a regular payment made during a person's retirement from an investment fund to which that person or their employer has contributed during their working life

examples.english: After decades of work, he finally began to receive his pension.
examples.turkish: On yıllarca çalıştıktan sonra nihayet emeklilik maaşı almaya başladı.

examples.english: The pension scheme provides financial security for retirees.
examples.turkish: Emeklilik planı, emekliler için maddi güvence sağlar.

examples.english: She contributed regularly to her pension fund throughout her career.
examples.turkish: Kariyeri boyunca emeklilik fonuna düzenli olarak katkıda bulundu.

english_meaning: to become aware of or understand something through the senses

examples.english: People perceive colors differently based on lighting.
examples.turkish: İnsanlar renkleri, aydınlatmaya bağlı olarak farklı algılar.

examples.english: She could perceive a hint of sadness in his voice.
It is important to perceive the underlying message in his words.

english_meaning: the ability to see, hear, or become aware of something through the senses; a way of understanding or interpreting something

examples.english: Cultural background plays an important role in perception.
examples.turkish: Kültürel geçmiş, algıda önemli bir rol oynar.

examples.english: Her perception of the issue changed after further discussion.
examples.turkish: Konu hakkındaki algısı, daha fazla tartışmadan sonra değişti.

examples.english: The perception of risk varies among individuals.
examples.turkish: Risk algısı kişiler arasında farklılık gösterir.

english_meaning: in a way that lasts or is intended to last indefinitely

examples.english: The building was permanently closed due to safety concerns.
examples.turkish: Güvenlik endişeleri nedeniyle bina kalıcı olarak kapatıldı.

examples.english: Her artwork will be permanently displayed in the gallery.
examples.turkish: Onun sanatı galeride kalıcı olarak sergilenecek.

examples.english: The decision to move was permanent.

english_meaning: to continue firmly or obstinately in an opinion or course of action in spite of difficulty or opposition

examples.english: Despite the challenges, she persisted in her studies.
He persisted in his efforts to improve the system.
examples.turkish: Sistemi geliştirmek için çabalarına devam etti.

examples.english: The symptoms persisted even after treatment began.
examples.turkish: Tedavi başladıktan sonra bile semptomlar devam etti.

english_meaning: continuing firmly or obstinately in a course of action in spite of difficulty; enduring

examples.english: Her persistent efforts eventually paid off.
The persistent noise from the construction site was annoying.
examples.turkish: İnşaat alanından gelen sürekli gürültü rahatsız ediciydi.

examples.english: He is known for his persistent determination in overcoming obstacles.

english_meaning: people employed in an organization or engaged in an organized undertaking such as military service

examples.english: The company has a dedicated personnel team to handle customer service.
examples.turkish: Şirketin, müşteri hizmetlerini yönetmek için adanmış bir personel ekibi var.

examples.english: All personnel must attend the safety briefing.
The personnel department is responsible for recruitment and training.
examples.turkish: İnsan kaynakları departmanı, işe alım ve eğitimden sorumludur.

english_meaning: a formal written request, typically one signed by many people, appealing to authority concerning a particular cause

examples.english: They submitted a petition demanding better working conditions.
