examples.turkish: Daha iyi çalışma koşulları talep eden bir dilekçe sundular.

examples.english: Hundreds of citizens signed the petition for environmental protection.
examples.turkish: Yüzlerce vatandaş çevre koruması için dilekçeye imza attı.

examples.english: The petition was forwarded to the city council for consideration.
examples.turkish: Dilekçe, değerlendirilmek üzere şehir meclisine gönderildi.

english_meaning: a store where medicinal drugs are dispensed and sold

examples.english: She went to the pharmacy to pick up her prescription.
The pharmacy is open 24 hours for emergencies.
examples.turkish: Eczane, acil durumlar için 24 saat açıktır.

examples.english: Local pharmacies offer a wide range of over-the-counter medications.
examples.turkish: Yerel eczaneler, reçetesiz satılan çok çeşitli ilaçlar sunar.

english_meaning: a person engaged or learned in philosophy, especially as an academic discipline

examples.english: The philosopher spent years contemplating the meaning of life.
examples.turkish: Filozof, hayatın anlamı üzerine yıllarca düşündü.

examples.english: He is regarded as one of the greatest philosophers of the modern era.
examples.turkish: Modern çağın en büyük filozoflarından biri olarak kabul edilir.

examples.english: Philosophers often challenge the established ways of thinking.
examples.turkish: Filozoflar, yerleşik düşünce biçimlerine sıklıkla meydan okurlar.

english_meaning: relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence

examples.english: They engaged in a deep philosophical discussion about ethics.
examples.turkish: Etik üzerine derin bir felsefi tartışmaya girdiler.

examples.english: Her approach to life is very philosophical.
The novel offers a rich philosophical perspective on human existence.
examples.turkish: Roman, insan varoluşuna zengin bir felsefi bakış sunuyor.

english_meaning: a person qualified to practice medicine; a doctor

examples.english: The physician examined the patient thoroughly.
She consulted a physician about her persistent cough.
examples.turkish: Sürekli öksürüğü hakkında bir doktora danıştı.

examples.english: Physicians are trained to diagnose and treat illnesses.
examples.turkish: Doktorlar, hastalıkları teşhis edip tedavi etmek üzere eğitilmiştir.

english_meaning: a small round mass of solid medicine for swallowing

examples.english: He took a pill to relieve his headache.
examples.turkish: Baş ağrısını hafifletmek için bir hap aldı.

examples.english: The doctor prescribed a pill to be taken daily.
examples.turkish: Doktor, her gün alınması gereken bir hap reçete etti.

examples.english: She kept a bottle of vitamins and pills on her bedside table.
examples.turkish: Yatak başı masasında vitamin ve hap dolu bir şişe vardı.

english_meaning: a person who is among the first to explore or settle a new country or area; to develop or be the first to use or apply a new method, area of knowledge, or activity

examples.english: She is a pioneer in the field of renewable energy.
They pioneered a new technique in cancer research.
examples.turkish: Kanser araştırmalarında yeni bir teknik öncülüğünü yaptı.

examples.english: The pioneers settled in the wilderness and built a community.
examples.turkish: Öncüler, vahşi doğada yerleşip bir topluluk kurdular.

english_meaning: a long pipe, typically underground, for conveying oil, gas, etc.; a system or channel for transporting something

examples.english: The new pipeline will transport natural gas across the country.
examples.turkish: Yeni boru hattı, ülke genelinde doğal gaz taşıyacak.

examples.english: They are investing heavily in pipeline infrastructure.
examples.turkish: Boru hattı altyapısına büyük yatırımlar yapıyorlar.

examples.english: The pipeline project faced numerous environmental challenges.
examples.turkish: Boru hattı projesi birçok çevresel zorlukla karşılaştı.

english_meaning: a person who attacks and robs ships at sea; one who illegally copies or distributes copyrighted materials

examples.english: The movie depicted pirates attacking a merchant ship.
examples.turkish: Film, korsanların bir ticaret gemisine saldırısını konu aldı.

examples.english: Digital piracy has become a major issue for the entertainment industry.
examples.turkish: Dijital korsanlık, eğlence sektörü için büyük bir sorun haline geldi.

examples.english: He was arrested for pirating movies online.

english_meaning: a large hole in the ground; a deep hole or cavity

examples.english: The construction workers dug a pit for the foundation.
examples.turkish: İnşaat işçileri temel için bir çukur kazdı.

examples.english: He fell into a pit while hiking in the mountains.
examples.turkish: Dağlarda yürüyüş yaparken bir çukura düştü.

examples.english: The orchard had a pit that needed to be filled for safety.
examples.turkish: Meyve bahçesinde güvenlik için doldurulması gereken bir çukur vardı.

english_meaning: a feeling of sorrow and compassion caused by the suffering and misfortunes of others

examples.english: She felt deep pity for the homeless people on the street.
examples.turkish: Sokaktaki evsizlere karşı derin bir acıma hissetti.

examples.english: It is important not to confuse pity with compassion.
His heart went out to her, and he expressed pity for her situation.
examples.turkish: Kalbi onun için kırıldı ve durumuna acıma duydu.

english_meaning: the act of placing something in a particular position or location; an assignment or job opportunity

examples.english: The placement of the furniture created a warm and inviting room.
examples.turkish: Mobilyaların yerleştirilmesi, sıcak ve davetkâr bir oda yarattı.

examples.english: She secured a placement with a prestigious law firm.
examples.turkish: Saygın bir hukuk bürosunda staj yeri buldu.

examples.english: Proper placement of advertisements can boost sales.

english_meaning: a request made in an urgent and emotional manner; a formal statement by or on behalf of a defendant

examples.english: The defendant entered a plea of not guilty.
Her heartfelt plea for help moved the audience.
examples.turkish: İçten yardım talebi, izleyicileri derinden etkiledi.

examples.english: The lawyer argued that the plea was justified under the circumstances.
examples.turkish: Avukat, durum göz önüne alındığında savunmanın haklı olduğunu savundu.

english_meaning: to make an emotional appeal or request; to present or assert a claim or defense in a court of law

examples.english: He pleaded with the judge for leniency.
She pleaded her case passionately during the hearing.
The defendant pleaded not guilty to all charges.
examples.turkish: Sanık tüm suçlamalara karşı suçsuz olduğunu savundu.

english_meaning: to commit oneself to a course of action or to guarantee a payment or promise; a solemn promise or agreement
turkish_meaning: söz vermek, taahhüt etmek; söz, taahhüt

examples.english: They pledged to reduce carbon emissions over the next decade.
examples.turkish: Önümüzdeki on yıl içinde karbon emisyonlarını azaltacaklarına söz verdiler.

examples.english: The charity received a generous pledge from a local businessman.
examples.turkish: Hayır kurumu, yerel bir iş adamından cömert bir taahhüt aldı.

examples.english: He made a pledge to always support his family.
examples.turkish: Her zaman ailesini destekleyeceğine söz verdi.

english_meaning: to insert or connect (a plug) into an outlet; an advertisement or public promotion

examples.english: She plugged the charger into the socket.
The radio show included a plug for the new product.
examples.turkish: Radyo programı, yeni ürün için tanıtım yaptı.

examples.english: They decided to plug the leak in the boat immediately.
examples.turkish: Teknedeki sızıntıyı hemen kapatmaya karar verdiler.

english_meaning: to jump or dive quickly and energetically; to decrease or fall suddenly

examples.english: The diver plunged into the crystal clear water.
examples.turkish: Dalgıç, kristal berraklığındaki suya dalış yaptı.

examples.english: Stock prices plunged after the unexpected announcement.
examples.turkish: Beklenmedik açıklamadan sonra hisse senetleri ani düşüş yaşadı.

examples.english: She decided to plunge into the new project with enthusiasm.
examples.turkish: Yeni projeye büyük bir hevesle dalmaya karar verdi.

english_meaning: a long, slender, rounded piece of wood or metal, typically used as a support or for other purposes

examples.english: The flag was hoisted on a tall pole.
They used a pole to measure the depth of the river.
examples.turkish: Nehirin derinliğini ölçmek için bir çubuk kullandılar.

examples.english: The pole supports the overhead power lines.

english_meaning: a survey of public opinion; to record votes in an election or survey

examples.english: The latest poll showed a surge in support for the candidate.
examples.turkish: Son anket, aday için destekte bir artış gösterdi.

examples.english: They will poll the voters before the final decision is made.
examples.turkish: Son karar verilmeden önce seçmenleri anketleyecekler.

examples.english: The organization conducted a poll on consumer preferences.
examples.turkish: Kuruluş, tüketici tercihlerine dair bir anket yaptı.

english_meaning: a small body of still water, typically smaller than a lake

examples.english: They fed the ducks at the small pond in the park.
The pond reflected the clear blue sky.
Children enjoy skipping stones across the pond.
examples.turkish: Çocuklar, göletin üzerinden taş atlamaktan keyif alır.

english_meaning: to make a short, sharp, explosive sound; to burst suddenly; also, to become popular

examples.english: The balloon popped when it touched a sharp object.
examples.turkish: Balon, keskin bir nesneye değince patladı.

examples.english: The music video quickly popped and became a hit.
examples.turkish: Müzik videosu hızla popüler oldu ve hit yaptı.

examples.english: She popped her gum loudly during the movie.
examples.turkish: Film sırasında sakızını yüksek sesle patlattı.

english_meaning: a range of investments held by a person or organization; a collection of work or documents

examples.english: He showcased his graphic design portfolio during the interview.
examples.turkish: Mülakat sırasında grafik tasarım portföyünü sergiledi.

examples.english: Her investment portfolio is well diversified.
The artist’s portfolio contains some of his best works.
examples.turkish: Sanatçının portföyü, en iyi eserlerinden bazılarını içerir.

english_meaning: a part of a whole; an amount or share of something

examples.english: She ate a small portion of the meal.
Only a portion of the students attended the lecture.
examples.turkish: Öğrencilerin sadece bir kısmı derse katıldı.

examples.english: They divided the cake into equal portions.

english_meaning: to depict or represent someone or something in a work of art or literature

examples.english: The film portrays the struggles of everyday life.
examples.turkish: Film, günlük yaşamın zorluklarını tasvir ediyor.

examples.english: The painting beautifully portrays the natural landscape.
examples.turkish: Tablo, doğal manzarayı çok güzel bir şekilde betimliyor.

examples.english: She is known for her ability to portray complex emotions.
examples.turkish: Karmaşık duyguları tasvir etme yeteneğiyle tanınır.

english_meaning: to cause or arrange for (an event or activity) to take place at a time later than that originally scheduled

examples.english: They decided to postpone the meeting until next week.
examples.turkish: Toplantıyı gelecek haftaya ertelemeye karar verdiler.

examples.english: The event was postponed due to unforeseen circumstances.
He requested to postpone his exam because of illness.

english_meaning: occurring or existing after a war

examples.english: The postwar era saw significant economic growth.
examples.turkish: Savaş sonrası dönem önemli ekonomik büyüme gördü.

examples.english: Many changes occurred in the postwar society.
examples.turkish: Savaş sonrası toplumda birçok değişiklik oldu.

examples.english: The film is set in the postwar years.

english_meaning: possibly but not yet actually; capable of becoming

examples.english: The new drug could potentially cure the disease.
examples.turkish: Yeni ilaç hastalığı potansiyel olarak tedavi edebilir.

examples.english: This investment is potentially very profitable.
examples.turkish: Bu yatırım potansiyel olarak çok karlı olabilir.

examples.english: The project is potentially risky but offers high rewards.
examples.turkish: Proje potansiyel olarak riskli ama yüksek kazanç vaat ediyor.

english_meaning: a person actively engaged in an art, discipline, or profession, especially medicine

examples.english: The medical practitioner diagnosed the patient accurately.
examples.turkish: Hekim, hastayı doğru bir şekilde teşhis etti.

examples.english: He is a skilled practitioner of traditional Chinese medicine.
examples.turkish: O, geleneksel Çin tıbbı uygulamalarında yetenekli bir uzmandır.

examples.english: Many practitioners attended the conference to share their insights.
examples.turkish: Pek çok uygulayıcı, görüşlerini paylaşmak için konferansa katıldı.

english_meaning: to deliver a sermon or religious address to an assembled group of people

examples.english: The priest preached about love and forgiveness.
examples.turkish: Rahip, sevgi ve affedicilik üzerine vaaz verdi.

examples.english: She often preaches the importance of community service.
examples.turkish: Toplum hizmetinin önemini sık sık öğütler.

examples.english: He was invited to preach at the national conference.
examples.turkish: Ulusal konferansta vaaz vermesi için davet edildi.

english_meaning: to come before something in time, order, or position

examples.english: The opening ceremony will precede the main event.
examples.turkish: Açılış töreni ana etkinlikten önce gelecek.

examples.english: A brief introduction preceded the lecture.
examples.turkish: Kısa bir tanıtım, dersin öncesinde yapıldı.

examples.english: Traditions that precede modern customs still exist in some cultures.
examples.turkish: Modern geleneklerden önce gelen adetler bazı kültürlerde hala vardır.

english_meaning: an earlier event or action that is regarded as an example or guide to be considered in subsequent similar circumstances

examples.english: The court's decision set an important precedent for future cases.
examples.turkish: Mahkemenin kararı, gelecekteki davalar için önemli bir emsal oluşturdu.

examples.english: There is little precedent for such a decision in our legal system.
examples.turkish: Hukuk sistemimizde böylesine bir karara az emsal vardır.

examples.english: Historical precedents often influence modern legislation.
examples.turkish: Tarihi örnekler, modern yasaları sıklıkla etkiler.

english_meaning: of great value; not to be wasted or treated carelessly

examples.english: Time is precious, so use it wisely.
examples.turkish: Zaman kıymetlidir, bu yüzden onu akıllıca kullanın.

examples.english: She cherishes the precious memories of her childhood.
examples.turkish: Çocukluğunun kıymetli anılarını çok değerli bulur.

examples.english: The precious gemstone sparkled in the sunlight.

english_meaning: marked by exactness and accuracy of expression or detail

examples.english: The instructions were precise and easy to follow.
examples.turkish: Talimatlar kesin ve takip edilmesi kolaydı.

examples.english: He gave a precise measurement of the room.
examples.turkish: Oda hakkında kesin bir ölçüm verdi.

examples.english: A precise definition is needed to avoid misunderstandings.
examples.turkish: Yanlış anlaşılmaları önlemek için kesin bir tanım gereklidir.

english_meaning: in exact terms; exactly

examples.english: She described the location precisely so that everyone could find it.
examples.turkish: Herkesin bulabilmesi için yeri tam olarak tarif etti.

examples.english: The results were measured precisely using advanced instruments.
examples.turkish: Sonuçlar, gelişmiş aletler kullanılarak kesin olarak ölçüldü.

examples.english: He followed the recipe precisely and the dish turned out perfectly.
examples.turkish: Tarifi tam olarak uyguladı ve yemek mükemmel oldu.

english_meaning: the quality of being exact and accurate

examples.english: The surgeon’s precision during the operation was remarkable.
examples.turkish: Cerrahın ameliyat sırasındaki hassasiyeti dikkat çekiciydi.

examples.english: Precision is essential in scientific experiments.
The machine is designed for high precision in manufacturing.
examples.turkish: Makine, üretimde yüksek hassasiyet için tasarlanmıştır.

english_meaning: an animal that naturally preys on others; one that exploits or oppresses

examples.english: The lion is known as the king of predators in the savannah.
examples.turkish: Aslan, savanadaki yırtıcıların kralı olarak bilinir.

examples.english: Many predators rely on camouflage to hunt their prey.
examples.turkish: Pek çok yırtıcı, avını avlamak için kamuflaj kullanır.

examples.english: Corporate predators often take over smaller companies.
examples.turkish: Kurumsal yırtıcılar, küçük şirketleri sık sık ele geçirir.

english_meaning: a person who held a job or office before the current holder; something that came before another of the same kind

examples.english: Her predecessor left behind a legacy of innovation.
examples.turkish: Önceki görevliyi, yenilikçilik dolu bir miras bıraktı.

examples.english: The new model is an improvement over its predecessor.
He was compared to his predecessor in every aspect.

english_meaning: able to be predicted; expected

examples.english: The ending of the movie was predictable.
Due to its repetitive nature, the plot became predictable.
examples.turkish: Tekrarlayan doğası nedeniyle hikaye tahmin edilebilir hale geldi.

examples.english: A predictable outcome allowed them to prepare in advance.
examples.turkish: Tahmin edilebilir bir sonuç, önceden hazırlık yapmalarını sağladı.

english_meaning: mainly; for the most part

examples.english: The population in that region is predominantly rural.
Her work is predominantly focused on social issues.
examples.turkish: Onun çalışmaları çoğunlukla sosyal konulara odaklanmıştır.

examples.english: The music festival featured predominantly local artists.
examples.turkish: Müzik festivali, esasen yerel sanatçılara yer verdi.

english_meaning: a greater liking for one alternative over another or others

examples.english: She has a preference for tea over coffee.
Customer preferences are taken into account when designing new products.
examples.turkish: Yeni ürünler tasarlanırken müşteri tercihleri göz önünde bulundurulur.

examples.english: He expressed a clear preference for classical music.
examples.turkish: Klasik müziğe belirgin bir tercih duyduğunu ifade etti.

english_meaning: the condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body

examples.english: Her pregnancy was announced at the family gathering.
She experienced many changes during her pregnancy.
Proper care during pregnancy is essential for both mother and child.
examples.turkish: Gebelik sırasında uygun bakım, anne ve çocuk için çok önemlidir.

english_meaning: preconceived opinion that is not based on reason or actual experience; bias

examples.english: Prejudice can lead to unfair treatment of individuals.
examples.turkish: Önyargı, bireylere adaletsiz muameleye yol açabilir.

examples.english: They fought against racial prejudice in their community.
examples.turkish: Toplumlarında ırksal önyargıya karşı mücadele ettiler.

examples.english: Her experiences helped her overcome prejudice and embrace diversity.
examples.turkish: Yaşadıkları, önyargıları aşmasına ve çeşitliliği kucaklamasına yardımcı oldu.

english_meaning: denoting an action or event preceding or done in preparation for something fuller or more important

examples.english: They conducted preliminary tests before starting the experiment.
examples.turkish: Deney başlamadan önce ön testler yapıldı.

examples.english: A preliminary report was issued to summarize the findings.
examples.turkish: Bulguları özetleyen bir ön rapor yayımlandı.

examples.english: The preliminary rounds of the competition were highly competitive.

english_meaning: the head of the government in some countries; also, first in importance

examples.english: The premier announced new policies during the press conference.
examples.turkish: Başbakan, basın toplantısında yeni politikaları açıkladı.

examples.english: She is considered the premier expert in her field.
examples.turkish: O, kendi alanında önde gelen uzman olarak kabul edilir.

examples.english: The premier event of the festival will take place tomorrow.
examples.turkish: Festivalin ilk ve en önemli etkinliği yarın gerçekleşecek.

english_meaning: a previous statement or proposition from which another is inferred or follows as a conclusion

examples.english: The argument is based on the premise that all humans are equal.
examples.turkish: Argüman, tüm insanların eşit olduğu varsayımına dayanıyor.

examples.english: Before proceeding, they examined the underlying premises of the proposal.
examples.turkish: İlerlemeye başlamadan önce, teklifin temel öncüllerini incelediler.

examples.english: Her conclusion was drawn logically from the given premise.
examples.turkish: Sonucu, verilen öncüle mantıksal olarak dayandırdı.

english_meaning: an amount to be paid for an insurance policy; something of superior quality

examples.english: She pays a high premium for her comprehensive insurance coverage.
examples.turkish: Kapsamlı sigorta kapsamı için yüksek prim ödüyor.

examples.english: They launched a premium product line targeting affluent customers.
examples.turkish: Zengin müşterilere yönelik üstün kaliteli bir ürün serisi başlattılar.

examples.english: His services come at a premium price due to his expertise.

english_meaning: to advise or authorize the use of (a medicine or treatment) for someone, especially in writing

examples.english: The doctor prescribed a course of antibiotics for the infection.
examples.turkish: Doktor, enfeksiyon için antibiyotik reçete etti.

examples.english: He was prescribed medication to manage his symptoms.
examples.turkish: Semptomlarını yönetmek için ilaç reçete edildi.

examples.english: They prescribe regular exercise as part of a healthy lifestyle.
examples.turkish: Sağlıklı yaşam tarzının bir parçası olarak düzenli egzersiz önerirler.

english_meaning: a written order from a doctor for the preparation and administration of a medicine

examples.english: She filled her prescription at the local pharmacy.
The doctor issued a prescription for pain relief.
examples.turkish: Doktor, ağrı kesici için reçete yazdı.

examples.english: Always follow the instructions on your prescription carefully.

english_meaning: at the present time; currently

examples.english: The committee is presently reviewing the proposals.
examples.turkish: Komite şu anda teklifleri gözden geçiriyor.

examples.english: He is presently working on a new project.
examples.turkish: Şu anda yeni bir proje üzerinde çalışıyor.

examples.english: Presently, the company is expanding its operations internationally.
examples.turkish: Şu anda, şirket uluslararası alanda faaliyetlerini genişletiyor.

english_meaning: the act of preserving something; protection from decay or loss

examples.english: The preservation of historic buildings is vital for cultural heritage.
examples.turkish: Tarihi binaların korunması, kültürel miras için hayati önem taşır.

examples.english: Environmental preservation is essential for sustainable development.
examples.turkish: Çevrenin korunması, sürdürülebilir kalkınma için esastır.

examples.english: They established a fund for the preservation of local art.
examples.turkish: Yerel sanatı korumak için bir fon oluşturdular.

english_meaning: to be in the position of authority in a meeting or gathering; to direct or control proceedings

examples.english: The judge will preside over the trial.
She was chosen to preside at the annual conference.
examples.turkish: Yıllık konferansa başkanlık etmek üzere seçildi.

examples.english: The chairman presided over the meeting with great efficiency.
examples.turkish: Başkan, toplantıya büyük bir verimlilikle liderlik etti.

english_meaning: the office or term of office of a president

examples.english: Her presidency was marked by major reforms.
The presidency is a symbol of the nation's leadership.
During his presidency, many significant policies were introduced.
examples.turkish: Onun başkanlığı döneminde birçok önemli politika tanıtıldı.

english_meaning: relating to a president or presidency

examples.english: The presidential campaign attracted widespread attention.
examples.turkish: Başkanlık kampanyası geniş çapta ilgi çekti.

examples.english: She delivered a powerful presidential address to the nation.
examples.turkish: Ülkeye güçlü bir başkanlık konuşması yaptı.

examples.english: The debate focused on the presidential candidates' policies.

english_meaning: inspiring respect and admiration; having high status

examples.english: He received a prestigious award for his contributions to science.
examples.turkish: Bilime yaptığı katkılar nedeniyle saygın bir ödül aldı.

examples.english: The university is known for its prestigious academic programs.
She was accepted into a prestigious law school.
examples.turkish: Saygın bir hukuk okuluna kabul edildi.

english_meaning: used to convey that what is asserted is very likely though not known for certain

examples.english: Presumably, the meeting will be postponed due to the weather.
He is presumably the most qualified candidate for the job.
examples.turkish: Muhtemelen, iş için en nitelikli aday olandır.

examples.english: The package has not arrived yet, presumably because of shipping delays.
examples.turkish: Paket henüz gelmedi, muhtemelen gönderi gecikmelerinden dolayı.

english_meaning: to suppose something is true based on probability

examples.english: I presume that you have finished your homework.
They presumed that the meeting would start on time.
One should not presume too much without evidence.
examples.turkish: Kanıt olmadan çok fazla varsayımda bulunulmamalıdır.

english_meaning: to prove more powerful or superior; to be widespread or current

examples.english: Justice will eventually prevail over corruption.
Traditional values still prevail in many rural communities.
examples.turkish: Geleneksel değerler, birçok kırsal toplulukta hâkimdir.

examples.english: It is expected that rational thinking will prevail in the debate.
examples.turkish: Tartışmada akılcı düşüncenin üstün geleceği bekleniyor.

english_meaning: the fact or condition of being widespread or common

examples.english: The prevalence of smartphones has changed the way we communicate.
examples.turkish: Akıllı telefonların yaygınlığı, iletişim biçimimizi değiştirdi.

examples.english: There is a high prevalence of obesity in the country.
Prevalence of the disease is higher in urban areas.

english_meaning: the action of stopping something from happening or arising

examples.english: Vaccination is an effective prevention method against diseases.
examples.turkish: Aşı, hastalıklara karşı etkili bir önleme yöntemidir.

examples.english: Early detection is key to the prevention of serious illnesses.
examples.turkish: Erken teşhis, ciddi hastalıkların önlenmesinde anahtardır.

examples.english: They implemented various measures for crime prevention.
examples.turkish: Suç önleme için çeşitli önlemler uyguladılar.

english_meaning: an animal that is hunted or killed by another for food; also, to exploit or make use of someone in a predatory manner

examples.english: Lions hunt their prey with great skill.
examples.turkish: Aslanlar, avlarını büyük bir ustalıkla avlar.

examples.english: The bird swooped down to catch its prey.
examples.turkish: Kuş, avını yakalamak için aşağı süzüldü.

examples.english: The company was accused of preying on vulnerable customers.

english_meaning: a feeling of deep pleasure or satisfaction derived from one's own achievements, qualities, or possessions or those of someone with whom one is closely associated

examples.english: She took great pride in her work.
The team’s pride was evident in their performance.
He swore to protect his country with pride.

english_meaning: for the most part; mainly

examples.english: The course is primarily designed for beginners.
examples.turkish: Kurs, esas olarak yeni başlayanlar için tasarlanmıştır.

examples.english: The company's efforts are primarily focused on innovation.
examples.turkish: Şirketin çabaları öncelikle yenilik üzerine odaklanmıştır.

examples.english: The event was attended primarily by professionals.

english_meaning: first in order of importance; the most important; the head of a school

examples.english: The principal reason for the change was cost reduction.
She met with the school principal to discuss the issue.
examples.turkish: Konuyu görüşmek için okul müdürüyle görüştü.

examples.english: The principal of the project is to enhance customer satisfaction.
examples.turkish: Projenin temel amacı müşteri memnuniyetini artırmaktır.

english_meaning: existing or coming before in time, order, or importance

examples.english: Please complete the prior tasks before moving on.
examples.turkish: Devam etmeden önce önceki görevleri tamamlayın.

examples.english: He had no prior experience in the field.
examples.turkish: Alanda daha önce hiçbir deneyimi yoktu.

examples.english: The decision was made based on events that occurred prior to the meeting.
examples.turkish: Karar, toplantı öncesinde yaşanan olaylara dayanarak verildi.

english_meaning: the transfer of a business, industry, or service from public to private ownership and control

examples.english: The government announced plans for the privatization of several state-owned enterprises.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, birkaç devlet işletmesinin özelleştirilmesi planını duyurdu.

examples.english: Privatization can lead to more efficient management.
The privatization process has been controversial among the public.
examples.turkish: Özelleştirme süreci halk arasında tartışmalı olmuştur.

english_meaning: a special right, advantage, or immunity granted or available only to a particular person or group

examples.english: Access to the VIP lounge is a privilege reserved for loyal customers.
examples.turkish: VIP lounge erişimi, sadık müşterilere ayrılmış bir ayrıcalıktır.

examples.english: He considered it a privilege to work with such talented individuals.
examples.turkish: Böylesine yetenekli insanlarla çalışmayı bir ayrıcalık olarak gördü.

examples.english: The privilege of voting is fundamental in a democracy.

english_meaning: the extent to which something is probable; the likelihood of something happening

examples.english: The probability of rain tomorrow is high.
Scientists calculate the probability of an asteroid hitting Earth.
examples.turkish: Bilim insanları, bir göktaşının Dünya'ya çarpma olasılığını hesaplıyor.

examples.english: They discussed the probability of success before launching the project.
examples.turkish: Projeyi başlatmadan önce başarı olasılığını tartıştılar.

english_meaning: likely to happen or be the case

examples.english: It is probable that the meeting will be postponed.
She is the most probable candidate for the promotion.
examples.turkish: Terfi için en olası aday olandır.

examples.english: Given the evidence, it is probable that he is innocent.
examples.turkish: Deliller göz önüne alındığında, onun masum olması olasıdır.

english_meaning: an investigation into a matter, especially in order to uncover the truth; to physically explore or examine

examples.english: The committee launched a probe into the financial irregularities.
examples.turkish: Komite, mali usulsüzlükleri incelemek için bir soruşturma başlattı.

examples.english: Scientists used instruments to probe the depths of the ocean.
examples.turkish: Bilim insanları, okyanusun derinliklerini incelemek için aletler kullandı.

examples.english: The journalist decided to probe further into the scandal.
examples.turkish: Gazeteci, skandalı daha fazla araştırmaya karar verdi.

english_meaning: constituting or presenting a problem or difficulty

examples.english: The new policy has proven to be problematic in its implementation.
examples.turkish: Yeni politika, uygulanmasında sorunlu olduğu kanıtlandı.

examples.english: There are several problematic aspects in the proposal that need addressing.
examples.turkish: Teklifte ele alınması gereken birkaç sorunlu nokta var.

examples.english: His behavior has become increasingly problematic over time.
examples.turkish: Davranışları zamanla giderek daha problemli hale geldi.

english_meaning: to begin or continue a course of action

examples.english: After a brief discussion, they decided to proceed with the plan.
examples.turkish: Kısa bir tartışmadan sonra plana devam etmeye karar verdiler.

examples.english: Please proceed to the next step of the process.
examples.turkish: Lütfen sürecin bir sonraki adımına geçin.

examples.english: The project will proceed as scheduled despite the setbacks.
examples.turkish: Geri dönüşlere rağmen proje planlandığı gibi devam edecek.

english_meaning: an event or action that is in progress; a legal action

examples.english: The proceedings of the conference were recorded for later review.
examples.turkish: Konferansın işlemleri daha sonra gözden geçirmek için kaydedildi.

examples.english: The legal proceeding lasted for several months.
They observed the proceedings with great interest.

english_meaning: money obtained, especially from an event or venture

examples.english: All proceeds from the charity event will go to disaster relief.
examples.turkish: Hayır etkinliğinden elde edilen tüm gelir afet yardımına gidecek.

examples.english: The proceeds of the sale were donated to a local school.
examples.turkish: Satıştan elde edilen gelir yerel bir okula bağışlandı.

examples.english: They used the proceeds to invest in community development.
examples.turkish: Gelirleri, toplum gelişimine yatırım yapmak için kullandılar.

english_meaning: the series of actions or steps taken to achieve a particular end, especially in computing or manufacturing

examples.english: The processing of the data took several hours.
They improved the processing speed of the computer.
Food processing techniques have advanced significantly over the years.
examples.turkish: Yiyecek işleme teknikleri yıllar içinde önemli ölçüde ilerledi.

english_meaning: the central unit in a computer that carries out the instructions of a program

examples.english: The new computer features a high-speed processor.
examples.turkish: Yeni bilgisayar yüksek hızlı bir işlemciye sahip.

examples.english: A powerful processor is essential for running complex applications.
examples.turkish: Karmaşık uygulamaları çalıştırmak için güçlü bir işlemci gereklidir.

examples.english: The processor managed multiple tasks simultaneously.
examples.turkish: İşlemci, aynı anda birden fazla görevi yönetti.

english_meaning: to announce officially or publicly

examples.english: The king proclaimed a day of national celebration.
examples.turkish: Kral, ulusal bir kutlama günü ilan etti.

examples.english: She proclaimed her innocence in a public statement.
The committee proclaimed the winner at the award ceremony.

english_meaning: yielding favorable or useful results; efficient in producing desired outcomes

examples.english: She had a very productive day at work.
examples.turkish: İş yerinde çok verimli bir gün geçirdi.

examples.english: The team’s productive efforts led to the successful launch of the product.
examples.turkish: Takımın üretken çabaları, ürünün başarılı bir şekilde piyasaya sürülmesini sağladı.

examples.english: A productive meeting is one where all participants contribute meaningfully.
examples.turkish: Verimli bir toplantı, tüm katılımcıların anlamlı katkıda bulunduğu toplantıdır.

english_meaning: the state or quality of producing something, especially crops, manufactured goods, or services

examples.english: Improving productivity is essential for economic growth.
examples.turkish: Üretkenliği artırmak ekonomik büyüme için esastır.

examples.english: They introduced new methods to boost workplace productivity.
examples.turkish: İşyeri üretkenliğini artırmak için yeni yöntemler tanıttılar.

examples.english: The productivity of the factory increased after the upgrade.

english_meaning: yielding financial gain; advantageous or beneficial

examples.english: The new product line proved highly profitable for the company.
examples.turkish: Yeni ürün serisi şirket için son derece karlı çıktı.

examples.english: Investors are always looking for profitable opportunities.
examples.turkish: Yatırımcılar her zaman karlı fırsatlar ararlar.

examples.english: Their business model is designed to be profitable in the long run.
examples.turkish: İş modeli uzun vadede karlı olacak şekilde tasarlandı.

english_meaning: very great or intense; having deep insight or understanding

examples.english: The professor's lecture offered a profound insight into human nature.
examples.turkish: Profesörün dersi insan doğasına dair derin bir anlayış sundu.

examples.english: Her grief was profound after the loss of her friend.
He made a profound impact on his community.
examples.turkish: Topluluğu üzerinde derin bir etki yarattı.

english_meaning: the process of writing computer programs

examples.english: She took a course in computer programming.
Programming requires logical thinking and creativity.
examples.turkish: Programlama, mantıksal düşünme ve yaratıcılık gerektirir.

examples.english: His passion for programming led him to develop innovative software.
examples.turkish: Programlamaya olan tutkusu, onu yenilikçi yazılımlar geliştirmeye yöneltti.

english_meaning: favoring or advocating progress, change, improvement, or reform

examples.english: The progressive policies helped modernize the company.
examples.turkish: İlerici politikalar şirketi modernize etmeye yardımcı oldu.

examples.english: She has a progressive outlook on social issues.
examples.turkish: Sosyal konularda yenilikçi bir bakış açısına sahiptir.

examples.english: Their progressive approach sets them apart from competitors.

english_meaning: to formally forbid something by law, rule, or other authority

examples.english: The new policy will prohibit smoking in all public areas.
examples.turkish: Yeni politika, tüm kamu alanlarında sigara içmeyi yasaklayacak.

examples.english: They are prohibited from entering the restricted zone.
The law prohibits the sale of certain hazardous materials.
examples.turkish: Yasa, bazı tehlikeli maddelerin satışını yasaklıyor.

english_meaning: a forecast or estimate of future trends based on current data

examples.english: The financial projection for next year looks promising.
examples.turkish: Gelecek yıl için finansal projeksiyon umut verici görünüyor.

examples.english: They made a projection of the population growth in the region.
Economic projections indicate steady growth over the next decade.
examples.turkish: Ekonomik projeksiyonlar önümüzdeki on yıl boyunca istikrarlı büyüme öngörüyor.

english_meaning: widely known and important; easily noticeable

examples.english: She is one of the most prominent scientists in her field.
examples.turkish: O, kendi alanının en önemli bilim insanlarından biridir.

examples.english: A prominent landmark stood at the center of the city.
examples.turkish: Şehrin merkezinde önemli bir simge duruyordu.

examples.english: His prominent role in the project was acknowledged by everyone.
examples.turkish: Projede oynadığı önemli rol herkes tarafından takdir edildi.

english_meaning: showing signs of future success; likely to be successful

examples.english: The young athlete shows promising talent.
examples.turkish: Genç sporcu umut verici yetenek sergiliyor.

examples.english: Their research has produced promising results.
The project is promising and expected to grow rapidly.
examples.turkish: Proje gelecek vaat ediyor ve hızla büyümesi bekleniyor.

english_meaning: the act of raising someone to a higher position or rank; advertising or publicizing a product or event

examples.english: She received a promotion after her excellent performance.
The company launched a promotion to boost sales.
examples.turkish: Şirket, satışları artırmak için bir tanıtım kampanyası başlattı.

examples.english: He was well-known for his role in the promotion of new technology.

english_meaning: to cause or bring about an action or feeling; to encourage someone to speak

examples.english: The unexpected question prompted an immediate response.
examples.turkish: Beklenmedik soru hemen bir yanıtı tetikledi.

examples.english: Her curiosity prompted her to ask several questions.
examples.turkish: Merakı, birkaç soru sormasına neden oldu.

examples.english: The teacher's prompt led the student to provide a detailed answer.
examples.turkish: Öğretmenin teşviki, öğrenciyi detaylı bir yanıt vermeye yöneltti.

english_meaning: very noticeable or marked; clearly defined

examples.english: There was a pronounced difference in style between the two artists.
examples.turkish: İki sanatçı arasında belirgin bir tarz farkı vardı.

examples.english: Her accent is pronounced and easy to recognize.
examples.turkish: Onun aksanı belirgindir ve kolayca tanınır.

examples.english: The change in policy was pronounced and had immediate effects.
examples.turkish: Politikadaki değişiklik belirgindi ve hemen etkili oldu.

english_meaning: information, especially of a biased or misleading nature, used to promote a political cause or point of view

examples.english: The government used propaganda to sway public opinion.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, kamuoyunu etkilemek için propaganda kullandı.

examples.english: Propaganda during the war was designed to boost morale.
examples.turkish: Savaş sırasında kullanılan propaganda moral yükseltmek amacıyla düzenlendi.

examples.english: Critics argue that the media is spreading propaganda.
examples.turkish: Eleştirmenler, medyanın propaganda yaydığını iddia ediyor.

english_meaning: a part, share, or number considered in comparative relation to a whole

examples.english: The proportion of renewable energy in the mix is increasing.
examples.turkish: Enerji karmasındaki yenilenebilir enerji oranı artıyor.

examples.english: They studied the proportions of different elements in the sample.
examples.turkish: Örnek içindeki çeşitli elementlerin oranlarını incelediler.

examples.english: A balanced diet should include a proper proportion of nutrients.
examples.turkish: Dengeli bir diyet, uygun oranda besin içermelidir.

english_meaning: a suggested plan or idea, especially one put forward for consideration

examples.english: They presented a new proposition to improve the system.
examples.turkish: Sistemi iyileştirmek için yeni bir öneri sundular.

examples.english: The proposition was met with both support and criticism.
examples.turkish: Öneri, hem destek hem de eleştiri aldı.

examples.english: Her proposition for change was innovative and bold.
examples.turkish: Değişim için sunduğu öneri yenilikçi ve cesurdu.

english_meaning: to institute legal proceedings against someone; to carry out a legal action

examples.english: The authorities decided to prosecute the offender.
examples.turkish: Yetkililer, suçu işleyen kişiyi yargılamaya karar verdi.

examples.english: He was prosecuted for fraud and embezzlement.
examples.turkish: Dolandırıcılık ve zimmete para geçirme suçlarından yargılandı.

examples.english: They promised to prosecute anyone involved in the corruption.
examples.turkish: Yolsuzlukla ilgili herkesin yargılanacağına söz verdiler.

english_meaning: the institution and conducting of legal proceedings against someone

examples.english: The prosecution presented strong evidence against the defendant.
examples.turkish: Savcı, sanığa karşı güçlü kanıtlar sundu.

examples.english: The trial focused on the merits of the prosecution's case.
examples.turkish: Dava, savcının davasının gücü üzerine odaklandı.

examples.english: A lengthy prosecution followed the investigation.
examples.turkish: Soruşturmanın ardından uzun bir kovuşturma süreci yaşandı.

english_meaning: a legal representative who institutes and conducts criminal proceedings

examples.english: The prosecutor argued that the evidence was overwhelming.
A skilled prosecutor can greatly influence the outcome of a trial.
examples.turkish: Usta bir savcı, davanın sonucunu büyük ölçüde etkileyebilir.

examples.english: The prosecutor called several witnesses to testify.
examples.turkish: Savcı, ifade vermeleri için birkaç tanık çağırdı.

english_meaning: expected or likely to happen in the future; potential

examples.english: They interviewed several prospective candidates for the position.
examples.turkish: Pozisyon için birkaç potansiyel adayı mülakat yaptılar.

examples.english: Prospective buyers are invited to tour the property.
examples.turkish: Potansiyel alıcılar, mülkü gezmeye davet edilir.

examples.english: The school held an open day for prospective students.
examples.turkish: Okul, potansiyel öğrenciler için açık gün düzenledi.

english_meaning: the state of being successful or thriving, especially economically

examples.english: Economic reforms led to a period of prosperity in the country.
examples.turkish: Ekonomik reformlar ülkeye refah dönemi getirdi.

examples.english: The region experienced unprecedented prosperity during the boom.
examples.turkish: Bölge, patlama döneminde benzeri görülmemiş bir refah yaşadı.

examples.english: Investments in infrastructure helped ensure long-term prosperity.
examples.turkish: Altyapıya yapılan yatırımlar, uzun vadeli refahı garanti altına aldı.

english_meaning: intended to protect someone or something

examples.english: Parents are naturally protective of their children.
The company implemented protective measures to secure data.
examples.turkish: Şirket, verileri korumak için emniyet önlemleri aldı.

examples.english: She wore a protective helmet while riding her bike.
examples.turkish: Bisiklet sürerken koruyucu bir kask taktı.

english_meaning: a large molecule composed of amino acids, essential for the structure, function, and regulation of the body's tissues and organs

examples.english: Chicken and beans are good sources of protein.
examples.turkish: Tavuk ve fasulye iyi protein kaynaklarıdır.

examples.english: Athletes often increase their protein intake to build muscle.
examples.turkish: Sporcular, kas yapmak için protein alımını artırırlar.

examples.english: The diet is rich in protein to support healthy growth.
examples.turkish: Diyet, sağlıklı büyümeyi desteklemek için protein açısından zengindir.

english_meaning: a person who takes part in a public demonstration against something

examples.english: Hundreds of protesters gathered outside the government building.
examples.turkish: Yüzlerce protestocu hükümet binası önünde toplandı.

examples.english: The protester voiced his concerns loudly.
examples.turkish: Protestocu, endişelerini yüksek sesle dile getirdi.

examples.english: Authorities tried to disperse the group of protesters.

english_meaning: the official procedure or system of rules governing affairs of state or diplomatic occasions

examples.english: The diplomat followed strict protocol during the meeting.
examples.turkish: Diplomat, toplantı sırasında sıkı protokole uydu.

examples.english: They established a new protocol for data security.
examples.turkish: Veri güvenliği için yeni bir protokol oluşturuldu.

examples.english: International protocol was observed at the summit.

english_meaning: a principal administrative division of certain countries or empires

examples.english: The province is known for its beautiful landscapes.
Local traditions vary from one province to another.
examples.turkish: Yerel gelenekler, bir ilden diğerine değişir.

examples.english: The province has a rich cultural heritage.
examples.turkish: Bölgenin zengin bir kültürel mirası vardır.

english_meaning: relating to a province; narrow or unsophisticated

examples.english: Her views were considered provincial by the urban critics.
examples.turkish: Onun görüşleri, kentsel eleştirmenler tarafından dar görüşlü olarak değerlendirildi.

examples.english: The provincial charm of the town attracted many visitors.
examples.turkish: Kasabanın ilksel cazibesi, birçok ziyaretçiyi kendine çekti.

examples.english: He moved from a provincial town to the big city.
examples.turkish: Dar görüşlü bir kasabadan büyük şehre taşındı.

english_meaning: the action of providing or supplying something; an amount or supply of something

examples.english: They made provision for extra meals during the event.
examples.turkish: Etkinlik sırasında ekstra yemekler için tedbir aldılar.

examples.english: The contract includes a provision for annual reviews.
examples.turkish: Sözleşme, yıllık değerlendirmeler için bir madde içeriyor.

examples.english: Emergency provisions were stored in the warehouse.

english_meaning: to stimulate or give rise to (a reaction or emotion, typically a strong or unwelcome one) in someone

examples.english: His remarks provoked anger among the listeners.
examples.turkish: Sözleri, dinleyiciler arasında öfkeye yol açtı.

examples.english: The advertisement was designed to provoke interest in the product.
examples.turkish: Reklam, ürüne ilgi uyandırmak için tasarlandı.

examples.english: She didn't mean to provoke a negative reaction.

english_meaning: relating to the study or treatment of mental illness

examples.english: She was referred to a psychiatric clinic for evaluation.
Psychiatric treatment can be very effective for certain disorders.
examples.turkish: Belirli bozukluklar için psikiyatrik tedavi çok etkili olabilir.

examples.english: The book offers insight into psychiatric practices.
examples.turkish: Kitap, psikiyatrik uygulamalara dair içgörü sunuyor.

english_meaning: relating to the mental and emotional state of a person

examples.english: The movie explores psychological themes of identity.
examples.turkish: Film, kimlik konusundaki psikolojik temaları inceliyor.

examples.english: She sought psychological counseling after the traumatic event.
examples.turkish: Travmatik olay sonrası psikolojik danışmanlık aldı.

examples.english: Psychological factors play a major role in decision-making.
examples.turkish: Karar verme sürecinde psikolojik etkenler büyük rol oynar.

english_meaning: the notice or attention given to someone or something by the media

examples.english: The scandal brought a lot of unwanted publicity.
examples.turkish: Skandal, istenmeyen çok fazla tanıtım getirdi.

examples.english: The film's premiere generated significant publicity.
examples.turkish: Filmin galası, önemli ölçüde tanıtım sağladı.

examples.english: They hired a public relations firm to boost their publicity.
examples.turkish: Tanıtımlarını artırmak için bir halkla ilişkiler firması tuttular.

english_meaning: the business of producing and disseminating literature or information

examples.english: She works in the publishing industry.
Publishing a book requires a lot of effort and coordination.
examples.turkish: Bir kitap yayımlamak, çok çaba ve koordinasyon gerektirir.

examples.english: Digital publishing has transformed the way we read.

english_meaning: the rhythmic throbbing of the arteries resulting from the regular contractions of the heart

examples.english: She checked her pulse after the exercise.
The doctor's stethoscope picked up a steady pulse.
examples.turkish: Doktorun stetoskopu düzenli bir nabız tespit etti.

examples.english: A rapid pulse can be a sign of stress or excitement.
examples.turkish: Hızlı bir nabız, stres veya heyecanın bir işareti olabilir.

english_meaning: to force liquid, gas, etc., to move through a pipe or system; a device used for this purpose

examples.english: They used a pump to move water from the well.
examples.turkish: Kuyudan suyu çekmek için pompa kullandılar.

examples.english: The pump malfunctioned and had to be repaired.
examples.turkish: Pompa arızalandı ve tamir edilmesi gerekti.

examples.english: He felt his heart pump rapidly during the workout.
examples.turkish: Egzersiz sırasında kalbinin hızlı attığını hissetti.

english_meaning: a blow with the fist; to hit with a closed fist

examples.english: He delivered a powerful punch in the boxing match.
examples.turkish: Boks maçında güçlü bir yumruk attı.

examples.english: The boxer was known for his fast punch.
She punched the bag with all her strength.
examples.turkish: Tüm gücüyle kum barabanına yumruk attı.

english_meaning: a person, typically a young person, who is a member of a subculture characterized by a rebellious attitude and distinctive style

examples.english: The punk scene in the city is vibrant and creative.
examples.turkish: Şehirdeki punk kültürü canlı ve yaratıcıdır.

examples.english: He dressed like a punk with his leather jacket and studs.
examples.turkish: Deri ceketi ve zımbalarıyla punk tarzında giyindi.

examples.english: Punks often challenge societal norms with their music and style.
examples.turkish: Punklar, müzikleri ve tarzlarıyla toplumsal normları sorgular.

english_meaning: exclusively; only

examples.english: The decision was made purely on financial grounds.
She is purely focused on her studies.
They visited the museum purely for its art collection.
examples.turkish: Müzeyi sadece sanat koleksiyonu için ziyaret ettiler.

english_meaning: the act of pursuing or striving to accomplish something

examples.english: Her pursuit of excellence is evident in her work.
examples.turkish: Mükemmelliğe olan çabası işinde açıkça görülüyor.

examples.english: The pursuit of knowledge drives many scientists.
examples.turkish: Bilgiye olan uğraş, birçok bilim insanını harekete geçirir.

examples.english: They dedicated their lives to the pursuit of happiness.

english_meaning: a game, toy, or problem designed to test ingenuity or knowledge

examples.english: The intricate puzzle took hours to solve.
She loves to solve puzzles in her free time.
The mystery was a puzzle that needed to be unraveled.

english_meaning: a question, especially one addressed to an official or organization

examples.english: She submitted a query about the product specifications.
examples.turkish: Ürün özellikleri hakkında bir soru gönderdi.

examples.english: The customer query was handled promptly by support staff.
examples.turkish: Müşteri sorusu destek ekibi tarafından hızlıca ele alındı.

examples.english: He raised a query regarding the new policy.
examples.turkish: Yeni politika ile ilgili bir soru sordu.

english_meaning: a long or arduous search for something

examples.english: Their quest for knowledge led them to remote regions.
examples.turkish: Bilgi arayışları, onları uzak bölgelere götürdü.

examples.english: He embarked on a quest to find the lost treasure.
examples.turkish: Kayıp hazinayı bulmak için bir arayışa çıktı.

examples.english: The hero's quest is the central theme of the novel.

english_meaning: a set of printed or written questions with a choice of answers, used for gathering information from respondents

examples.english: Participants were asked to complete a questionnaire.
The questionnaire helped gather valuable feedback.
She designed a detailed questionnaire for the study.
examples.turkish: Çalışma için ayrıntılı bir anket tasarladı.

english_meaning: a fixed share of something that a person or group is entitled to receive or is bound to contribute

examples.english: The company has a sales quota for each employee.
examples.turkish: Şirketin her çalışanı için bir satış kotası vardır.

examples.english: They reached their quota for the month ahead of schedule.
The government set a quota for imported goods.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, ithal ürünler için bir kota belirledi.

english_meaning: relating to race; based on race

examples.english: They organized a forum to discuss racial equality.
examples.turkish: Irksal eşitlik üzerine tartışmak için bir forum düzenlediler.

examples.english: Racial discrimination is a major issue in many societies.
examples.turkish: Irk ayrımcılığı birçok toplumda büyük bir sorundur.

examples.english: The policy aims to eliminate racial bias in the workplace.
examples.turkish: Politika, iş yerinde ırksal önyargıyı ortadan kaldırmayı amaçlıyor.

english_meaning: prejudice, discrimination, or antagonism directed against someone of a different race based on the belief that one's own race is superior

examples.english: Many organizations work to combat racism.
Racism remains a persistent problem in society.
examples.turkish: Irkçılık toplumda devam eden bir sorundur.

examples.english: He spoke out against racism at the public forum.

english_meaning: discriminatory or prejudiced against people based on their race; a person who believes that race is a primary determinant of human traits and capacities

examples.english: His comments were widely regarded as racist.
examples.turkish: Onun yorumları geniş çapta ırkçı olarak değerlendirildi.

examples.english: The film addresses the issues raised by racist attitudes.
examples.turkish: Film, ırkçı tutumların ortaya çıkardığı sorunları ele alıyor.

examples.english: A racist was arrested for inciting violence.
examples.turkish: Şiddet tahrik ettiği için bir ırkçı tutuklandı.

english_meaning: a system for detecting the presence, direction, distance, and speed of aircraft, ships, and other objects, by sending out pulses of radio waves and measuring their return

examples.english: The plane was detected on the radar.
Military radars monitor airspace for intruders.
The new car is equipped with advanced radar systems.
examples.turkish: Yeni araba, gelişmiş radar sistemleriyle donatılmıştır.

english_meaning: the emission of energy as electromagnetic waves or as moving subatomic particles

examples.english: Excessive radiation can be harmful to health.
examples.turkish: Aşırı radyasyon sağlık için zararlı olabilir.

examples.english: The scientists measured the radiation levels near the reactor.
examples.turkish: Bilim insanları, reaktör yakınlarındaki radyasyon seviyelerini ölçtü.

examples.english: Radiation from the sun is a natural phenomenon.
examples.turkish: Güneşten yayılan radyasyon doğal bir olgudur.

english_meaning: relating to or affecting the fundamental nature of something; far-reaching or thorough

examples.english: They proposed radical reforms to the educational system.
Her ideas were considered radical by traditionalists.
examples.turkish: Onun fikirleri, gelenekçilere göre radikal olarak değerlendirildi.

examples.english: Radical change is necessary to address the climate crisis.
examples.turkish: İklim krizini çözmek için köklü değişiklikler gereklidir.

english_meaning: violent, uncontrollable anger

examples.english: He was filled with rage when he heard the news.
The movie depicted the rage of an oppressed people.
examples.turkish: Film, baskı altındaki halkın öfkesini betimledi.

examples.english: Her outburst was a sudden eruption of rage.
examples.turkish: Ani patlaması, beklenmedik bir öfke patlamasıydı.

english_meaning: a sudden attack on an enemy by troops, aircraft, or other armed forces; to carry out such an attack

examples.english: The police launched a raid on the suspect's house.
A military raid disrupted the enemy camp.
examples.turkish: Askeri baskın, düşman kampını altüst etti.

examples.english: They planned a surprise raid to capture the leader.
examples.turkish: Lideri yakalamak için sürpriz bir baskın planladılar.

english_meaning: a bar or series of bars, typically of metal, used as part of a fence or barrier, or as a means of support or guidance

examples.english: The train runs on metal rails.
examples.turkish: Tren metal raylar üzerinde hareket eder.

examples.english: He held onto the railing as he climbed the stairs.
The rail system is the backbone of the city's transportation network.
examples.turkish: Ray sistemi, şehrin ulaşım ağının belkemiğidir.

english_meaning: a mass meeting of people making a political protest or showing support for a cause; to come together again in order to continue fighting after a defeat

examples.english: A rally was held in the city center to support the new law.
examples.turkish: Yeni yasayı desteklemek için şehir merkezinde bir miting düzenlendi.

examples.english: The team rallied in the second half to win the game.
examples.turkish: Takım, ikinci yarıda toparlanarak maçı kazandı.

examples.english: They rallied together to raise funds for charity.
examples.turkish: Hayır işi için para toplamak üzere bir araya geldiler.

english_meaning: made, done, or chosen without method or conscious decision

examples.english: They selected a random sample from the population.
Her comments seemed completely random.
The computer generated a random number.

english_meaning: a position or level in a hierarchy; the act of ranking

examples.english: The university has achieved a high ranking in national surveys.
examples.turkish: Üniversite, ulusal anketlerde yüksek bir sıralamaya ulaştı.

examples.english: Her ranking among her peers is exceptional.
The company's ranking improved significantly last year.
examples.turkish: Şirketin sıralaması geçen yıl önemli ölçüde yükseldi.

english_meaning: to commit sexual assault against someone by force or threat of violence

examples.english: The survivor courageously spoke out about the rape incident.
Laws have been strengthened to prevent rape and protect victims.
examples.turkish: Tecavüzü önlemek ve mağdurları korumak için yasalar güçlendirildi.

examples.english: The community condemned the act of rape in the strongest terms.
examples.turkish: Topluluk, tecavüz eylemini en sert şekilde kınadı.

english_meaning: a small rodent, typically regarded as a pest; an informer

examples.english: The laboratory was infested with rats.
He was labeled a rat for informing on his colleagues.
examples.turkish: Arkadaşlarına ihbar ettiği için fare olarak etiketlendi.

examples.english: They set traps to catch the rats in the building.
examples.turkish: Binada fareleri yakalamak için tuzaklar kurdular.

english_meaning: a classification or ranking based on a comparative assessment of quality, standard, or performance

examples.english: The movie received a high rating from critics.
Customer ratings help improve product quality.
examples.turkish: Müşteri puanlamaları, ürün kalitesinin artırılmasına yardımcı olur.

examples.english: The hotel's rating was downgraded after the inspection.
examples.turkish: Otel, denetimden sonra puanlamada düşüş yaşadı.

english_meaning: the quantitative relation between two amounts showing the number of times one value is contained within the other

examples.english: The ratio of students to teachers is very low at this school.
examples.turkish: Bu okulda öğrenci-öğretmen oranı çok düşüktür.

examples.english: They calculated the ratio of water to cement in the mix.
examples.turkish: Karışımda su ile çimento oranını hesapladılar.

examples.english: Understanding the ratio of ingredients is essential for baking.
examples.turkish: Malzemelerin oranını anlamak, fırıncılık için esastır.

english_meaning: based on or in accordance with reason or logic

examples.english: Her decision was both rational and well thought out.
examples.turkish: Onun kararı hem akılcı hem de iyi düşünülmüştü.

examples.english: We need a rational approach to solve this problem.
examples.turkish: Bu sorunu çözmek için mantıklı bir yaklaşıma ihtiyacımız var.

examples.english: The proposal is rational and supported by evidence.

english_meaning: a narrow beam of light; a line or stream of something

examples.english: A ray of sunlight broke through the clouds.
examples.turkish: Güneş ışığının bir ışını bulutların arasından süzüldü.

examples.english: The prism split the light into its component rays.
Her smile was like a ray of hope.

english_meaning: without hesitation; easily

examples.english: The solution was readily apparent.
She readily agreed to help with the project.
examples.turkish: Projeye yardım etmeyi hemen kabul etti.

examples.english: These materials can be readily recycled.

english_meaning: the act of becoming aware of or understanding something; the achievement of something desired or anticipated

examples.english: The realization of the project took several years.
She had a sudden realization about her true feelings.
His realization of the importance of education changed his life.
examples.turkish: Eğitimin öneminin farkına varması hayatını değiştirdi.

english_meaning: a field or domain of activity or interest

examples.english: She is a leading expert in the realm of biotechnology.
examples.turkish: O, biyoteknoloji alanında önde gelen bir uzmandır.

examples.english: The realm of digital media is constantly evolving.
His interests lie in the realm of art and culture.
examples.turkish: İlgi alanı sanat ve kültür bölgesindedir.

english_meaning: situated at the back; the back part of something

examples.english: They parked the car in the rear of the building.
The soldiers took position at the rear of the formation.
He entered through the rear entrance.

english_meaning: in a fair, sensible, or moderate way

examples.english: The price is reasonably affordable.
She behaved reasonably despite the difficult situation.
examples.turkish: Zor duruma rağmen makul şekilde davrandı.

examples.english: They reached a reasonably fair agreement.
examples.turkish: Makullük çerçevesinde adil bir anlaşmaya vardılar.

english_meaning: the action of thinking about something in a logical, sensible way

examples.english: Her reasoning was clear and persuasive.
examples.turkish: Akıl yürütmesi net ve ikna ediciydi.

examples.english: The professor explained his reasoning behind the theory.
Good reasoning is essential in problem solving.
examples.turkish: Problemleri çözmede iyi akıl yürütme şarttır.

english_meaning: to say or do something to remove the doubts or fears of someone

examples.english: The teacher reassured the students before the exam.
Her kind words reassured him during the crisis.
examples.turkish: Nazik sözleri kriz sırasında ona güven verdi.

examples.english: The manager reassured the team that the project was on track.
examples.turkish: Yönetici, projenin yolunda olduğuna ekip üyelerine güven verdi.

english_meaning: a person who rises in opposition or armed resistance against an established government or ruler

examples.english: The rebel fought against the oppressive regime.
Rebels seized control of the small town.
He was known as a rebel who never followed the rules.
examples.turkish: Kurallara asla uymayan bir isyancı olarak tanındı.

english_meaning: an act of violent or non-violent resistance to an established government or ruler

examples.english: The rebellion against the dictator lasted for several years.
examples.turkish: Diktatöre karşı isyan birkaç yıl sürdü.

examples.english: The rebellion was eventually suppressed by the military.
Historical rebellions have often led to significant change.
examples.turkish: Tarihsel isyanlar genellikle önemli değişimlere yol açmıştır.

english_meaning: to build something again after it has been damaged or destroyed

examples.english: The city plans to rebuild the damaged bridge.
examples.turkish: Şehir, hasar gören köprüyü yeniden inşa etmeyi planlıyor.

examples.english: They rebuilt the house after the fire.
examples.turkish: Yangından sonra evi yeniden inşa ettiler.

examples.english: Efforts are underway to rebuild the community after the disaster.
examples.turkish: Felaket sonrası topluluğu yeniden inşa etmek için çalışmalar sürüyor.

english_meaning: a person or device that receives something, such as a signal or a broadcast

examples.english: The receiver picked up the radio signal clearly.
examples.turkish: Alıcı, radyo sinyalini net bir şekilde aldı.

examples.english: He is a skilled receiver on the football team.
The new receiver has enhanced sound quality.
examples.turkish: Yeni alıcı, gelişmiş ses kalitesine sahip.

english_meaning: a period of temporary economic decline during which trade and industrial activity are reduced

examples.english: The country entered a recession following the financial crisis.
examples.turkish: Ülke, finansal kriz sonrası resesyona girdi.

examples.english: Economic policies are being implemented to overcome the recession.
The recession led to increased unemployment rates.
examples.turkish: Resesyon, işsizlik oranlarının artmasına yol açtı.

english_meaning: a person or thing that receives or is awarded something

examples.english: The scholarship recipient was honored at the ceremony.
Each recipient of the award received a certificate.
examples.turkish: Ödülü alan her kişi bir sertifika aldı.

examples.english: The charity recognized the recipient for their efforts.
examples.turkish: Hayır kurumu, çabaları için alanı tanıdı.

english_meaning: to calculate or estimate; to consider or regard in a specified way

examples.english: I reckon the journey will take about three hours.
examples.turkish: Yolculuğun yaklaşık üç saat süreceğini düşünüyorum.

examples.english: Many reckon that the new policy will boost the economy.
examples.turkish: Birçok kişi, yeni politikanın ekonomiyi güçlendireceğini düşünüyor.

examples.english: He reckoned that his expenses would be lower this month.
examples.turkish: Bu ay harcamalarının daha az olacağını hesapladı.

english_meaning: acknowledgment of the existence, validity, or legality of something; the act of identifying someone or something

examples.english: She received recognition for her contributions to the project.
examples.turkish: Projeye yaptığı katkılardan dolayı takdir gördü.

examples.english: The organization is known for its recognition of excellence.
Public recognition can boost a person's self-esteem.
examples.turkish: Kamuoyu tarafından tanınma, bir kişinin özgüvenini artırabilir.

english_meaning: the action or process of reconstructing or being reconstructed; rebuilding

examples.english: The reconstruction of the city began after the earthquake.
examples.turkish: Depremden sonra şehrin yeniden inşasına başlandı.

examples.english: They focused on the reconstruction of damaged infrastructure.
examples.turkish: Hasar görmüş altyapının yeniden yapılandırılmasına odaklandılar.

examples.english: The reconstruction efforts were supported by international aid.
examples.turkish: Yeniden inşa çalışmaları uluslararası yardım tarafından desteklendi.

english_meaning: to tell someone about something; to narrate or describe in detail

examples.english: She recounted her adventures during the trip.
He recounted the events of that day with great detail.
examples.turkish: O günün olaylarını büyük bir ayrıntıyla anlattı.

examples.english: They recounted their experiences at the reunion.

english_meaning: a return to a normal state of health, mind, or strength; the process of regaining something lost

examples.english: Her recovery from the illness was surprisingly quick.
The economy is showing signs of recovery after the recession.
examples.turkish: Resesyondan sonra ekonomi toparlanma belirtileri gösteriyor.

examples.english: They focused on the recovery of the damaged area.

english_meaning: to enlist someone in an organization, especially the armed forces; a person who is newly enlisted

examples.english: The company plans to recruit new staff next month.
examples.turkish: Şirket gelecek ay yeni personel işe almayı planlıyor.

examples.english: They recruited several volunteers for the charity event.
examples.turkish: Hayır etkinliği için birkaç gönüllü işe aldılar.

examples.english: Each recruit received thorough training.
examples.turkish: Her yeni üye kapsamlı bir eğitim aldı.

english_meaning: the process of finding new people to join an organization or support a cause

examples.english: Effective recruitment is essential for any growing company.
examples.turkish: Etkili işe alım, büyüyen her şirket için şarttır.

examples.english: The recruitment process can be lengthy and challenging.
examples.turkish: İşe alım süreci uzun ve zorlayıcı olabilir.

examples.english: They launched a recruitment campaign to attract top talent.
examples.turkish: En iyi yetenekleri çekmek için bir işe alım kampanyası başlattılar.

english_meaning: an official who watches a game or match closely to enforce the rules

examples.english: The referee made a controversial call during the match.
examples.turkish: Hakem maç sırasında tartışmalı bir karar verdi.

examples.english: A good referee ensures fair play throughout the game.
examples.turkish: İyi bir hakem, maç boyunca adil oyunu sağlar.

examples.english: Players respected the decisions of the referee.

english_meaning: a general vote by the electorate on a single political question that has been referred to them for a direct decision

examples.english: The country held a referendum on the new constitution.
examples.turkish: Ülke, yeni anayasa hakkında referandum yaptı.

examples.english: Voters participated actively in the referendum.
The outcome of the referendum will have far-reaching effects.
examples.turkish: Referandumun sonucu geniş kapsamlı etkilere sahip olacak.

english_meaning: serious thought or consideration; an image seen in a mirror or shiny surface

examples.english: After the meeting, he spent time in reflection about the issues raised.
examples.turkish: Toplantı sonrası, gündeme gelen konular üzerine düşündü.

examples.english: The calm lake provided a perfect reflection of the mountains.
examples.turkish: Sakin göl, dağların mükemmel bir yansımasını sundu.

examples.english: Her reflection on past experiences helped her make better decisions.
examples.turkish: Geçmiş deneyimler üzerine yaptığı düşünme, daha iyi kararlar vermesine yardımcı oldu.

english_meaning: to make changes in order to improve something; changes made in order to improve a system or society

examples.english: The government promised to reform the education system.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, eğitim sisteminde reform yapacağına söz verdi.

examples.english: They introduced a series of reforms to modernize the industry.
examples.turkish: Sanayiyi modernize etmek için bir dizi reform başlattılar.

examples.english: Reform is necessary to address the longstanding issues.
examples.turkish: Uzun süredir devam eden sorunları çözmek için reform gereklidir.

english_meaning: a condition of being safe or sheltered from pursuit, danger, or trouble

examples.english: The mountain cabin served as a refuge during the storm.
examples.turkish: Dağdaki kulübe, fırtına sırasında sığınak olarak hizmet etti.

examples.english: They sought refuge from the harsh winter weather.
examples.turkish: Sert kış havasından korunmak için sığınak aradılar.

examples.english: The park is a refuge for local wildlife.
examples.turkish: Park, yerel yaban hayatı için bir barınaktır.

english_meaning: a person who has been forced to leave their country in order to escape war, persecution, or natural disaster

examples.english: Thousands of refugees fled the war-torn region.
examples.turkish: Binlerce mülteci, savaş yıkan bölgeden kaçtı.

examples.english: The refugee camp provided shelter and basic necessities.
examples.turkish: Mülteci kampı, barınak ve temel ihtiyaçları sağladı.

examples.english: International organizations are working to help refugees.
examples.turkish: Uluslararası kuruluşlar mültecilere yardım etmek için çalışıyor.

english_meaning: the act of declining to accept, do, or agree to something

examples.english: Her refusal to compromise shocked everyone.
The manager's refusal to approve the budget led to delays.
examples.turkish: Yöneticinin bütçeyi onaylamaması gecikmelere yol açtı.

examples.english: They met with a refusal from the council regarding the proposal.
examples.turkish: Öneriye ilişkin olarak konseyden bir ret aldılar.

english_meaning: to obtain possession or use of something again after losing it

examples.english: She worked hard to regain her lost confidence.
examples.turkish: Kaybettiği özgüveni yeniden kazanmak için çok çalıştı.

examples.english: The country is trying to regain its economic stability.
examples.turkish: Ülke, ekonomik istikrarını yeniden sağlamaya çalışıyor.

examples.english: After the surgery, he slowly regained his strength.
examples.turkish: Ameliyattan sonra yavaş yavaş gücünü geri kazandı.

english_meaning: without paying attention to the current situation; despite the prevailing circumstances

examples.english: Regardless of the obstacles, she pursued her dreams.
They continued the project regardless of the setbacks.
examples.turkish: Geri dönüşlere rağmen projeye devam ettiler.

examples.english: Regardless of the weather, the event will be held outdoors.
examples.turkish: Havanın durumuna bakılmaksızın etkinlik açık havada yapılacak.

english_meaning: a government, especially an authoritarian one; a system or planned way of doing things

examples.english: The new regime promised to bring reform.
examples.turkish: Yeni rejim reform getireceğine söz verdi.

examples.english: Critics condemned the regime for its oppressive policies.
examples.turkish: Eleştirmenler, baskıcı politikaları nedeniyle rejimi kınadı.

examples.english: The regime was overthrown after widespread protests.
examples.turkish: Geniş çaplı protestolardan sonra rejim devrildi.

english_meaning: the action or process of registering or of being registered

examples.english: Registration for the conference opens next week.
The registration process was simple and efficient.
All participants must complete the registration form.
examples.turkish: Tüm katılımcılar kayıt formunu doldurmak zorundadır.

english_meaning: to control or maintain the rate or speed of a machine or process so that it operates properly

examples.english: The government introduced new laws to regulate online activities.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, çevrimiçi faaliyetleri düzenlemek için yeni yasalar çıkardı.

examples.english: They regulate the temperature in the laboratory carefully.
The system is designed to regulate the flow of electricity.
examples.turkish: Sistem, elektriğin akışını kontrol etmek üzere tasarlanmıştır.

english_meaning: a person or device that regulates something; one that controls or maintains a process

examples.english: The regulator ensured that the pressure remained constant.
He is a strict regulator of company finances.
examples.turkish: Şirket finansmanını sıkı bir şekilde kontrol eder.

examples.english: An automatic regulator controls the flow of gas in the engine.
examples.turkish: Otomatik düzenleyici, motordaki gaz akışını kontrol eder.

english_meaning: relating to the act of regulating or controlling something, especially by government or official rules

examples.english: The regulatory framework for financial institutions has been updated.
examples.turkish: Finansal kurumlar için düzenleyici çerçeve güncellendi.

examples.english: New regulatory measures were introduced to improve safety standards.
examples.turkish: Güvenlik standartlarını artırmak için yeni düzenleyici önlemler getirildi.

examples.english: Regulatory compliance is essential for businesses in this industry.
examples.turkish: Bu sektördeki işletmeler için düzenleyici uyum şarttır.

english_meaning: the process of restoring someone to health or normal life through therapy and education after imprisonment, addiction, or illness

examples.english: The rehabilitation center offers comprehensive treatment programs.
examples.turkish: Rehabilitasyon merkezi, kapsamlı tedavi programları sunuyor.

examples.english: After the accident, he underwent months of rehabilitation.
