examples.turkish: Kazadan sonra aylar süren rehabilitasyondan geçti.

examples.english: Rehabilitation is key to helping patients regain their independence.
examples.turkish: Hastaların bağımsızlıklarını yeniden kazanması için rehabilitasyon şarttır.

english_meaning: the period during which a sovereign occupies the throne; to rule

examples.english: The reign of the young king was marked by progress.
examples.turkish: Genç kralın saltanatı ilerleme ile damgalandı.

examples.english: They celebrated the long reign of the queen.
The dictator reigned over the country with absolute power.

english_meaning: to strengthen or support, especially with additional personnel or material

examples.english: They reinforced the building with steel beams.
The coach reinforced the importance of teamwork.
Additional soldiers were sent to reinforce the front line.
examples.turkish: İleri safları güçlendirmek için ek asker gönderildi.

english_meaning: the act of dismissing or refusing something; the state of being rejected

examples.english: The rejection of his proposal was a major setback.
examples.turkish: Önerisinin reddedilmesi büyük bir gerileme oldu.

examples.english: She handled the rejection with grace and determination.
His constant fear of rejection prevented him from taking risks.
examples.turkish: Sürekli reddedilme korkusu, risk almasını engelledi.

english_meaning: the quality or state of being closely connected or appropriate

examples.english: The relevance of the study was questioned by some experts.
examples.turkish: Çalışmanın alaka düzeyi bazı uzmanlar tarafından sorgulandı.

examples.english: Her comments had little relevance to the topic at hand.
examples.turkish: Onun yorumları, konu ile çok az alakalıydı.

examples.english: Understanding the relevance of the data is crucial for analysis.
examples.turkish: Verinin alaka düzeyini anlamak, analiz için hayati önem taşır.

english_meaning: to alleviate or remove pain, stress, or difficulty; to replace someone in a job or position

examples.english: The medicine helped to relieve her headache.
examples.turkish: İlaç, baş ağrısını hafifletmeye yardımcı oldu.

examples.english: They worked hard to relieve the suffering of the flood victims.
examples.turkish: Sel mağdurlarının acısını dindirmek için yoğun çalıştılar.

examples.english: The general was relieved of command after the defeat.

english_meaning: feeling happy or relaxed because something unpleasant has ended or not occurred

examples.english: She felt relieved after hearing the good news.
He was relieved to know that the exam was over.
After the storm passed, everyone was visibly relieved.
examples.turkish: Fırtına geçtikten sonra herkes belirgin şekilde rahatladı.

english_meaning: unwilling and hesitant; disinclined

examples.english: She was reluctant to leave her hometown.
He remained reluctant to share his ideas.
The team was reluctant to adopt the new strategy.

english_meaning: the part or quantity that is left over after the rest has been removed or dealt with

examples.english: The remainder of the cake was stored in the refrigerator.
After paying the bills, only a small remainder was left.
examples.turkish: Faturalar ödendikten sonra sadece küçük bir miktar kaldı.

examples.english: She used the remainder of her savings to buy a new car.
examples.turkish: Yeni bir araba almak için birikimlerinin kalanını kullandı.

english_meaning: the parts left over after other parts have been removed, used, or destroyed; often refers to ruins

examples.english: Archaeologists uncovered the remains of an ancient city.
examples.turkish: Arkeologlar, antik bir şehrin kalıntılarını ortaya çıkardı.

examples.english: The remains of the building were a testament to its history.
Only a few remains of the once magnificent structure survived.
examples.turkish: Bir zamanlar muhteşem olan yapının sadece birkaç kalıntısı kaldı.

english_meaning: worthy of attention; extraordinary or surprising

examples.english: Her achievement in science is truly remarkable.
The artist's work is remarkable for its detail.
It was a remarkable performance that left the audience in awe.
examples.turkish: Seyircileri hayran bırakan dikkate değer bir performanstı.

english_meaning: in a way that is surprising or extraordinary

examples.english: She performed remarkably well in the competition.
The project was completed remarkably quickly.
examples.turkish: Proje dikkate değer derecede hızlı tamamlandı.

examples.english: Remarkably, the results exceeded all expectations.
examples.turkish: Dikkate değer bir şekilde, sonuçlar tüm beklentileri aştı.

english_meaning: a means of counteracting or eliminating something undesirable; a cure or treatment

examples.english: They searched for a remedy to cure the disease.
examples.turkish: Hastalığı tedavi edecek bir çare aradılar.

examples.english: Her herbal remedy helped relieve her symptoms.
The remedy for stress is often found in relaxation techniques.
examples.turkish: Stresin çareleri genellikle rahatlama tekniklerinde bulunur.

english_meaning: a message or object that helps someone remember something

examples.english: I set a reminder on my phone to call her tomorrow.
examples.turkish: Yarın onu aramak için telefonuma bir hatırlatıcı ayarladım.

examples.english: The smell of fresh bread was a pleasant reminder of home.
examples.turkish: Taze ekmek kokusu, evimi güzelce hatırlattı.

examples.english: A sticky note on the fridge served as a reminder to buy milk.
examples.turkish: Buzdolabına yapıştırılmış not, süt almayı hatırlatıyordu.

english_meaning: the act of taking something away or off from the position occupied

examples.english: The removal of the old building was necessary for new construction.
examples.turkish: Yeni inşaat için eski binanın kaldırılması gerekiyordu.

examples.english: They scheduled the removal of the tree after the storm.
Proper removal of waste is essential for environmental health.
examples.turkish: Atıkların düzgün şekilde kaldırılması, çevre sağlığı için esastır.

english_meaning: to provide or give (a service, help, etc.); to cause to be or become

examples.english: The software can render images in high resolution.
The artist rendered the scene in vivid detail.
They rendered assistance to the victims of the accident.

english_meaning: to resume or begin again; to restore to a former or original state

examples.english: They decided to renew their contract for another year.
examples.turkish: Sözleşmeyi bir yıl daha yenilemeye karar verdiler.

examples.english: He renewed his membership at the club.
The government plans to renew the infrastructure project.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, altyapı projesini yeniden başlatmayı planlıyor.

english_meaning: widely acclaimed and highly honored; famous

examples.english: The renowned scientist received numerous awards for her work.
examples.turkish: Ünlü bilim insanı, çalışmaları için birçok ödül aldı.

examples.english: He is renowned for his contributions to modern art.
The restaurant is renowned for its exceptional cuisine.

english_meaning: the act or process of renting something or the amount charged for renting

examples.english: The rental of the apartment is quite affordable.
They signed a rental agreement for the office space.
examples.turkish: Ofis alanı için bir kira sözleşmesi imzaladılar.

examples.english: Rental properties in the city are in high demand.
examples.turkish: Şehirdeki kiralık mülkler yüksek talep görmektedir.

english_meaning: a person or thing that takes the place of another

examples.english: The replacement of the old engine improved the car's performance.
examples.turkish: Eski motorun değiştirilmesi, arabanın performansını artırdı.

examples.english: She found a suitable replacement for her broken phone.
examples.turkish: Kırık telefonunun yerine uygun bir cihaz buldu.

examples.english: The replacement policy covers defects and malfunctions.
examples.turkish: Değişim politikası, kusur ve arızaları kapsar.

english_meaning: according to what is reported; as has been stated by others

examples.english: The event was reportedly a huge success.
examples.turkish: Etkinlik, bildirildiğine göre büyük bir başarıydı.

examples.english: He was reportedly seen at the concert.
The new policy is reportedly under review by officials.
examples.turkish: Yeni politikanın yetkililer tarafından incelendiği bildiriliyor.

english_meaning: the act of presenting or disseminating information about something, especially news

examples.english: Her reporting on the election was thorough and unbiased.
examples.turkish: Seçim hakkında yaptığı haber sunumu kapsamlı ve tarafsızdı.

examples.english: The reporter is known for his investigative reporting.
Accurate reporting is crucial in journalism.
examples.turkish: Doğru haber sunumu gazetecilikte çok önemlidir.

english_meaning: the depiction or portrayal of someone or something; the act of representing

examples.english: Her artwork is a representation of modern society.
examples.turkish: Onun eserleri modern toplumun bir temsilidir.

examples.english: The committee discussed the representation of minority groups in government.
examples.turkish: Komite, hükümette azınlık gruplarının temsilini tartıştı.

examples.english: Accurate representation is important in statistics.

english_meaning: to make a copy of; to produce again

examples.english: The printer can reproduce high-quality images.
Scientists are trying to reproduce the experiment's results.
examples.turkish: Bilim insanları, deneyin sonuçlarını yeniden üretmeye çalışıyor.

examples.english: Many plants can reproduce asexually.
examples.turkish: Pek çok bitki eşeysiz olarak çoğalabilir.

english_meaning: the act of making a copy of something; the process by which organisms produce offspring

examples.english: The museum displayed several reproductions of famous paintings.
examples.turkish: Müze, ünlü tabloların birkaç reprodüksiyonunu sergiledi.

examples.english: Reproduction of the original design was challenging.
Biological reproduction is essential for the survival of species.
examples.turkish: Biyolojik üreme, türlerin hayatta kalması için gereklidir.

english_meaning: a state in which supreme power is held by the people and their elected representatives

examples.english: The country transitioned to a republic after the revolution.
Many believe that a republic is the best form of government.
examples.turkish: Pek çok kişi cumhuriyetin en iyi yönetim biçimi olduğuna inanır.

examples.english: The republic's constitution guarantees freedom of speech.
examples.turkish: Cumhuriyetin anayasası ifade özgürlüğünü garanti eder.

english_meaning: to have a similar appearance or character to

examples.english: The twins resemble each other so closely.
This painting resembles the work of a famous artist.
examples.turkish: Bu tablo, ünlü bir sanatçının eserine benziyor.

examples.english: He resembles his father in both looks and character.
examples.turkish: Hem görünüşü hem de karakteriyle babasına benziyor.

english_meaning: to live in a particular place

examples.english: They reside in a small town near the coast.
examples.turkish: Sahile yakın küçük bir kasabada yaşıyorlar.

examples.english: She has resided in this city all her life.
examples.turkish: Hayatı boyunca bu şehirde ikamet etti.

examples.english: Many expatriates reside in foreign countries for work.
examples.turkish: Pek çok yurt dışında yaşayan, iş için ikamet eden vardır.

english_meaning: a place where someone lives

examples.english: They moved into a new residence last month.
examples.turkish: Geçen ay yeni bir eve taşındılar.

examples.english: Her residence in the city is spacious and modern.
The residence of the ambassador is a historic building.

english_meaning: designed for or relating to housing or residences

examples.english: The area is primarily residential, with few commercial buildings.
examples.turkish: Bölge, az ticari bina içeren ağırlıklı olarak konut alanıdır.

examples.english: They live in a quiet residential neighborhood.
Residential zoning laws restrict the types of buildings that can be constructed.
examples.turkish: Konut bölgeleri, inşa edilebilecek bina türlerini sınırlar.

english_meaning: a small amount of something that remains after the main part has been removed

examples.english: After the fire, only residue remained of the old building.
examples.turkish: Yangından sonra, eski binanın sadece kalıntıları kaldı.

examples.english: There is a residue of dust on the shelves.
The chemical process leaves behind a residue that must be disposed of safely.
examples.turkish: Kimyasal işlem, güvenli bir şekilde atılması gereken bir kalıntı bırakır.

english_meaning: to voluntarily leave a job or position

examples.english: He decided to resign after a long career in politics.
examples.turkish: Uzun bir siyasi kariyerin ardından istifa etmeye karar verdi.

examples.english: She resigned from her position as manager.
They announced his resignation in a press release.

english_meaning: the act of resigning; an attitude of acceptance of something undesirable but inevitable

examples.english: Her resignation was a shock to the entire company.
examples.turkish: Onun istifası, tüm şirket için şok etkisi yarattı.

examples.english: He accepted his resignation with quiet dignity.
examples.turkish: Sessiz bir onurla istifasını kabul etti.

examples.english: The resignation of the board member was announced last week.
examples.turkish: Yönetim kurulu üyesinin istifası geçen hafta duyuruldu.

english_meaning: the refusal to accept or comply with something; opposition

examples.english: There was strong resistance to the proposed changes.
examples.turkish: Önerilen değişikliklere karşı güçlü bir direnç vardı.

examples.english: The resistance movement fought against the occupation.
He showed remarkable resistance to peer pressure.
examples.turkish: Arkadaş baskısına karşı dikkat çekici bir direnç gösterdi.

english_meaning: a firm decision to do or not do something; the act of resolving a problem or dispute

examples.english: She made a resolution to exercise every day.
examples.turkish: Her gün egzersiz yapmaya karar verdi.

examples.english: The committee reached a resolution on the issue.
examples.turkish: Komite, konu hakkında bir çözüme ulaştı.

examples.english: His resolution to improve his skills was evident in his work.
examples.turkish: Becerilerini geliştirme kararlılığı, işinde belli oluyordu.

english_meaning: relating individually to each of several people or things

examples.english: The students returned to their respective classrooms.
The two companies worked in their respective fields.
examples.turkish: İki şirket, kendi alanlarında faaliyet gösterdi.

examples.english: The awards were given to the winners in their respective categories.

english_meaning: in the same order as previously mentioned

examples.english: The three winners were John, Mary, and Sue, respectively.
examples.turkish: Üç kazanan sırasıyla John, Mary ve Sue idi.

examples.english: The funds were allocated to education, healthcare, and infrastructure respectively.
examples.turkish: Fonlar sırasıyla eğitim, sağlık ve altyapıya dağıtıldı.

examples.english: The products were shipped to the U.S., Germany, and Japan, respectively.
examples.turkish: Ürünler sırasıyla ABD, Almanya ve Japonya'ya gönderildi.

english_meaning: the act of returning something to its original condition

examples.english: The restoration of the old mansion took several years.
examples.turkish: Eski konağın onarımı birkaç yıl sürdü.

examples.english: Efforts are underway for the restoration of the historic monument.
examples.turkish: Tarihi anıtın yenilenmesi için çalışmalar yapılıyor.

examples.english: The restoration project aimed to preserve the building's original features.
examples.turkish: Onarım projesi, binanın orijinal özelliklerini korumayı amaçladı.

english_meaning: to bring back to a former or original state

examples.english: They worked hard to restore the historic building.
examples.turkish: Tarihi binayı eski haline getirmek için çok çalıştılar.

examples.english: The government promised to restore order in the city.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, şehirde düzeni yeniden sağlamaya söz verdi.

examples.english: Her primary goal was to restore the painting's original colors.
examples.turkish: Onun birinci hedefi, tablonun orijinal renklerini yeniden kazandırmaktı.

english_meaning: a measure or condition that keeps someone or something under control

examples.english: The use of restraint in the workplace is essential for safety.
examples.turkish: İşyeri güvenliği için kısıtlama yöntemlerinin kullanılması esastır.

examples.english: They imposed restraints on spending to cut costs.
examples.turkish: Maliyetleri düşürmek için harcamalara kısıtlama getirdiler.

examples.english: Self-restraint is a virtue in difficult times.
examples.turkish: Zor zamanlarda öz disiplin bir erdemdir.

english_meaning: to limit the amount, extent, or access to something

examples.english: The new policy will restrict access to the building after hours.
examples.turkish: Yeni politika, mesai saatleri dışında binaya erişimi kısıtlayacak.

examples.english: They restricted the use of mobile phones in class.
The law restricts the sale of certain hazardous materials.
examples.turkish: Yasa, belirli tehlikeli maddelerin satışını kısıtlar.

english_meaning: a limiting condition or measure

examples.english: There are restrictions on the use of electronic devices on airplanes.
examples.turkish: Uçaklarda elektronik cihaz kullanımına kısıtlamalar vardır.

examples.english: Dietary restrictions can make meal planning challenging.
The government imposed restrictions on public gatherings.

english_meaning: to begin again or continue after a pause or interruption

examples.english: After the break, the meeting will resume.
examples.turkish: Ara verdikten sonra toplantı devam edecek.

examples.english: She resumed her work after a short pause.
examples.turkish: Kısa bir ara verdikten sonra işine devam etti.

examples.english: The show resumed after the technical difficulties were resolved.
examples.turkish: Teknik sorunlar giderildikten sonra program yeniden başladı.

english_meaning: a document summarizing a person's education, qualifications, and previous experience

examples.english: She updated her résumé before applying for the job.
A well-organized résumé can help you get noticed by employers.
examples.turkish: Düzenli bir özgeçmiş, işverenlerin dikkatini çekmenize yardımcı olabilir.

examples.english: He printed several copies of his résumé for the interview.
examples.turkish: Röportaj için birkaç kopya özgeçmiş bastı.

english_meaning: the sale of goods to the public in relatively small quantities

examples.english: The retail sector has seen significant growth this year.
examples.turkish: Perakende sektörü bu yıl önemli bir büyüme gösterdi.

examples.english: He works in retail and manages a busy store.
examples.turkish: Perakende sektöründe çalışıyor ve yoğun bir mağazayı yönetiyor.

examples.english: Retail prices have dropped due to increased competition.
examples.turkish: Artan rekabet nedeniyle perakende fiyatları düştü.

english_meaning: the act or fact of leaving one's job and ceasing to work, typically due to age

examples.english: He looked forward to a peaceful retirement.
examples.turkish: Huzurlu bir emekliliği dört gözle bekliyordu.

examples.english: Retirement can be a time for new hobbies and adventures.
examples.turkish: Emeklilik, yeni hobiler ve maceralar için bir zaman olabilir.

examples.english: After decades of hard work, she finally entered retirement.
examples.turkish: On yıllar süren yoğun çalışmanın ardından sonunda emekli oldu.

english_meaning: a withdrawal, especially of troops; to withdraw or recede

examples.english: The army began its retreat after heavy losses.
examples.turkish: Askerler, ağır kayıpların ardından geri çekilmeye başladı.

examples.english: They decided to retreat to a quiet place for the weekend.
examples.turkish: Hafta sonu için sessiz bir yere çekilmeye karar verdiler.

examples.english: The retreat from the market was seen as a strategic move.
examples.turkish: Piyasadan geri çekilme, stratejik bir hamle olarak görüldü.

english_meaning: to get or bring (something) back from somewhere

examples.english: Please retrieve your belongings from the office.
The dog managed to retrieve the ball from the pond.
examples.turkish: Köpek, gölden topu geri getirmeyi başardı.

examples.english: They had to retrieve the files from the backup drive.
examples.turkish: Dosyaları yedek sürücüden geri almaları gerekti.

english_meaning: a surprising and previously unknown fact that has been disclosed

examples.english: The revelation of the scandal shocked the public.
examples.turkish: Skandalın ortaya çıkması kamuoyunu şoke etti.

examples.english: Her memoir was full of personal revelations.
The scientist made a groundbreaking revelation about climate change.
examples.turkish: Bilim insanı, iklim değişikliği hakkında çığır açan bir açıklama yaptı.

english_meaning: the act of inflicting hurt or harm on someone for an injury or wrong suffered

examples.english: He sought revenge against those who betrayed him.
examples.turkish: Ona ihanet edenlerden intikam almak istedi.

examples.english: The film is a story of revenge and redemption.
Her desire for revenge was evident in her actions.

english_meaning: income, especially when of a large amount, generated by a business or government

examples.english: The company's revenue increased significantly last quarter.
examples.turkish: Şirketin geliri geçen çeyrekte önemli ölçüde arttı.

examples.english: Government revenue is mainly derived from taxes.
examples.turkish: Hükümetin geliri ağırlıklı olarak vergilerden elde edilir.

examples.english: They rely on revenue from international sales.
examples.turkish: Uluslararası satışlardan elde edilen gelire bağımlılar.

english_meaning: to change to the opposite direction, order, or character; opposite in direction

examples.english: They decided to reverse the decision after further review.
examples.turkish: Daha fazla incelemeden sonra kararı tersine çevirmeye karar verdiler.

examples.english: The reverse of his opinion was clearly evident.
The car shifted into reverse before backing up.
examples.turkish: Araba, geri gitmeden önce geri vitese geçti.

english_meaning: the act of revising or a revised edition

examples.english: The manuscript is undergoing revision before publication.
examples.turkish: El yazması, yayımlanmadan önce revizyona tabi tutuluyor.

examples.english: He made several revisions to his report.
The revision of the textbook improved its clarity.

english_meaning: the process of becoming active, popular, or successful again

examples.english: The revival of interest in classical music is heartening.
examples.turkish: Klasik müziğe olan ilginin yeniden canlanması moral vericidir.

examples.english: There has been a revival of traditional crafts in the region.
examples.turkish: Bölgede geleneksel el sanatlarının yeniden canlandığı görülüyor.

examples.english: The revival of the theater scene has attracted many new audiences.
examples.turkish: Tiyatro sahnesinin yeniden canlanması, pek çok yeni izleyici çekti.

english_meaning: to restore to life or consciousness; to bring back into use

examples.english: The paramedics worked quickly to revive the unconscious man.
examples.turkish: Paramedikler, baygın adamı yeniden canlandırmak için hızlıca çalıştılar.

examples.english: The new policy revived interest in the local arts.
examples.turkish: Yeni politika, yerel sanata olan ilgiyi yeniden canlandırdı.

examples.english: Her speech revived hope among the team members.
examples.turkish: Konuşması, takım üyeleri arasında umudu yeniden yeşertti.

english_meaning: involving or causing a complete or dramatic change; relating to a revolution

examples.english: The revolutionary new design changed the industry.
examples.turkish: Devrim niteliğindeki yeni tasarım, sektörü değiştirdi.

examples.english: His ideas were considered revolutionary at the time.
examples.turkish: Onun fikirleri, o zamanlar devrimci sayılırdı.

examples.english: They introduced revolutionary technology that reshaped the market.
examples.turkish: Pazarı yeniden şekillendiren devrimci teknolojiyi tanıttılar.

english_meaning: the art of effective or persuasive speaking or writing

examples.english: His speech was full of impressive rhetoric.
The politician's rhetoric won him many supporters.
examples.turkish: Siyasetçinin üslubu pek çok destekçi kazandı.

examples.english: She studied classical rhetoric as part of her literature course.
examples.turkish: Edebiyat dersinin bir parçası olarak klasik retoriği inceledi.

english_meaning: deserving or inviting derision or mockery; absurd

examples.english: The idea of walking to work in the snow is ridiculous.
His explanation was so ridiculous that no one believed him.
examples.turkish: Açıklaması o kadar saçmaydı ki kimse ona inanmadı.

examples.english: They laughed at the ridiculous costumes at the party.

english_meaning: a long-barreled gun designed for accurate shooting, typically fired from the shoulder

examples.english: The soldier carried a rifle during the training exercise.
examples.turkish: Asker, eğitim tatbikatı sırasında bir tüfek taşıdı.

examples.english: Rifles are commonly used in hunting and military operations.
examples.turkish: Tüfekler avcılık ve askeri operasyonlarda sıklıkla kullanılır.

examples.english: He learned how to handle a rifle at the shooting range.
examples.turkish: Atış poligonunda bir tüfekle nasıl uğraşılacağını öğrendi.

english_meaning: a violent disturbance of the peace by a crowd

examples.english: The riot caused widespread damage to the city.
examples.turkish: İsyan, şehirde yaygın hasara yol açtı.

examples.english: Police intervened to break up the riot.
examples.turkish: Polis, ayaklanmayı dağıtmak için müdahale etti.

examples.english: The incident escalated into a full-blown riot.
examples.turkish: Olay, tam anlamıyla bir isyana dönüştü.

english_meaning: to tear or pull something apart quickly or forcibly

examples.english: He accidentally ripped his shirt on a nail.
The strong wind ripped the paper from his hand.
She ripped the letter into pieces after reading it.

english_meaning: involving risk; dangerous or likely to result in harm or loss

examples.english: Investing in that company is very risky.
examples.turkish: O şirkete yatırım yapmak çok risklidir.

examples.english: He took a risky decision by quitting his job without another offer.
examples.turkish: Başka teklif olmadan işten ayrılarak riskli bir karar verdi.

examples.english: They warned him that the expedition was too risky.
examples.turkish: Gezinin çok riskli olduğunu ona uyardılar.

english_meaning: a set of fixed actions and sometimes words performed regularly, especially as part of a ceremony

examples.english: The ritual of lighting candles is part of the celebration.
examples.turkish: Mum yakma ritüeli kutlamanın bir parçasıdır.

examples.english: They performed a ritual to honor their ancestors.
examples.turkish: Atalarına saygı göstermek için bir tören düzenlediler.

examples.english: Many cultures have unique rituals for important life events.
examples.turkish: Pek çok kültür, önemli yaşam olayları için benzersiz ritüellere sahiptir.

english_meaning: a person, group, or thing that competes with another for the same objective; competitive

examples.english: They are long-time rivals in the business world.
The rival teams met in a heated match.
examples.turkish: Rakip takımlar, çekişmeli bir maçta karşılaştı.

examples.english: Her rival attitude made her work even harder.
examples.turkish: Rekabetçi tavrı, daha çok çalışmasını sağladı.

english_meaning: to take property unlawfully from a person or place by force or threat of force

examples.english: The thieves robbed the bank at night.
He was robbed of his wallet while riding the bus.
They planned to rob the jewelry store.

english_meaning: the act of robbing a person or place, typically involving violence or threat of violence

examples.english: The robbery at the museum shocked everyone.
He was sentenced to prison for the robbery.
The police are investigating a series of robberies in the area.
examples.turkish: Polis, bölgede meydana gelen bir dizi soygunu araştırıyor.

english_meaning: strong and healthy; vigorous

examples.english: The robust economy has led to increased consumer spending.
examples.turkish: Sağlam ekonomi, tüketici harcamalarında artışa yol açtı.

examples.english: She built a robust network of contacts in the industry.
examples.turkish: Sektörde sağlam bir iletişim ağı kurdu.

examples.english: The robust design of the machine ensures long-lasting performance.
examples.turkish: Makinenin sağlam tasarımı, uzun ömürlü performansı garanti eder.

english_meaning: to move gently to and fro or from side to side

examples.english: The cradle rocked the baby to sleep.
The boat rocked in the rough waves.
Her emotions rocked her throughout the day.
examples.turkish: Duyguları, tüm gün boyunca onu etkiledi.

english_meaning: a missile or vehicle that obtains thrust from a rocket engine

examples.english: The rocket launched successfully into space.
Engineers designed a new type of rocket fuel.
examples.turkish: Mühendisler, yeni tip bir roket yakıtı tasarladı.

examples.english: The rocket's trajectory was carefully monitored.

english_meaning: a long, thin, straight bar of material, typically used for support or as a tool

examples.english: He used a metal rod to prop open the window.
examples.turkish: Pencereyi açık tutmak için metal bir çubuk kullandı.

examples.english: The fisherman fixed a hook to a long rod.
examples.turkish: Balıkçı, uzun bir olta çubuğuna kanca taktı.

examples.english: The carpenter measured the rod carefully before cutting.
examples.turkish: Marangoz, kesmeden önce çubuğu dikkatle ölçtü.

english_meaning: a love story or a strong feeling of love

examples.english: They enjoyed a sweet romance during their summer vacation.
examples.turkish: Yaz tatili boyunca tatlı bir aşk yaşadılar.

examples.english: The movie is a classic romance set in Paris.
examples.turkish: Film, Paris'te geçen klasik bir aşk hikayesidir.

examples.english: She writes romance novels that captivate her readers.

english_meaning: a person who is new to a field or activity; a beginner

examples.english: The rookie player impressed everyone with his skills.
As a rookie, she had much to learn about the industry.
examples.turkish: Yeni başlayan biri olarak, sektörü öğrenmesi gerekiyordu.

examples.english: Rookie mistakes are common in any new job.
examples.turkish: Her yeni işte acemi hataları yaygındır.

english_meaning: a type of flower known for its beauty and fragrance; also the past tense of rise

examples.english: She received a bouquet of red roses on her birthday.
examples.turkish: Doğum gününde ona kırmızı güllerden oluşan bir buket verildi.

examples.english: The sun rose over the horizon, signaling a new day.
examples.turkish: Güneş ufukta yükseldi, yeni bir günü müjdeliyordu.

examples.english: The rose in the garden is particularly beautiful.

english_meaning: a list or plan showing the turns of duty or leave for individuals in an organization

examples.english: The coach published the team's roster for the season.
examples.turkish: Antrenör, sezon için takım listesini yayımladı.

examples.english: Employees were added to the roster as new positions opened.
examples.turkish: Yeni pozisyonlar açıldıkça çalışanlar listeye eklendi.

examples.english: The roster for the meeting was distributed to all participants.

english_meaning: to turn around an axis or center; to change positions or functions periodically

examples.english: The Earth rotates on its axis once every 24 hours.
examples.turkish: Dünya, her 24 saatte bir kendi ekseni etrafında döner.

examples.english: The manager rotates job assignments to give everyone equal opportunities.
examples.turkish: Yönetici, herkese eşit fırsatlar vermek için görevleri döndürüyor.

examples.english: Wheels on a car rotate to allow it to move.
examples.turkish: Bir arabanın tekerlekleri, hareket etmesine olanak vermek için döner.

english_meaning: the act of rotating; a regularly recurring turn of duty or position

examples.english: The rotation of the earth creates the cycle of day and night.
examples.turkish: Dünya'nın dönmesi, gece ve gündüz döngüsünü oluşturur.

examples.english: The hospital implemented a rotation schedule for its staff.
examples.turkish: Hastane, personeli için bir vardiya rotasyonu uygulamaya koydu.

examples.english: They studied the rotation of the planets in the solar system.

english_meaning: approximately; not exactly

examples.english: The journey took roughly three hours.
There were roughly fifty people at the event.
The cost is roughly estimated at $100.
examples.turkish: Maliyet yaklaşık olarak 100 dolar olarak tahmin ediliyor.

english_meaning: to destroy or cause the destruction of; the remains of something that has been destroyed

examples.english: The heavy rains ruined the crops.
The ancient ruins attracted many tourists.
examples.turkish: Antik kalıntılar pek çok turisti cezbetti.

examples.english: Neglect can ruin even the best relationships.
examples.turkish: İhmal, en iyi ilişkileri bile bozabilir.

english_meaning: an official decision or judgment, especially by a court

examples.english: The court's ruling was upheld on appeal.
The ruling defined the legal precedent for future cases.
examples.turkish: Hüküm, gelecekteki davalar için yasal emsal oluşturdu.

examples.english: His ruling as mayor brought significant changes to the city.
examples.turkish: Belediye başkanı olarak aldığı karar şehirde önemli değişikliklere yol açtı.

english_meaning: a currently circulating story or report of uncertain or doubtful truth

examples.english: There is a rumor that the company will be sold.
examples.turkish: Şirketin satılacağına dair bir söylenti var.

examples.english: Rumors about his resignation spread quickly.
examples.turkish: Onun istifasıyla ilgili söylentiler hızla yayıldı.

examples.english: She dismissed the rumor as baseless.

english_meaning: regarded with great respect and reverence, often because of religious significance

examples.english: The temple is a sacred place for worship.
examples.turkish: Tapınak, ibadet için kutsal bir yerdir.

examples.english: They treated the ancient texts as sacred relics.
examples.turkish: Antik metinleri kutsal kalıntılar olarak gördüler.

examples.english: The concept of sacred duty is deeply embedded in their culture.
examples.turkish: Kutsal görev kavramı, kültürlerine derinlemesine işlemiştir.

english_meaning: the act of giving up something valued for the sake of something else; to give up something as a price for achieving a goal

examples.english: They made a great sacrifice for the benefit of their country.
examples.turkish: Ülkenin yararı için büyük fedakarlık yaptılar.

examples.english: She sacrificed her personal interests for her career.
The ultimate sacrifice is often considered the highest act of love.
examples.turkish: En büyük fedakarlık, genellikle sevginin en yüce eylemi olarak kabul edilir.

english_meaning: a person acknowledged as holy or virtuous, especially in Christianity

examples.english: She was considered a saint for her selfless charity work.
examples.turkish: Fedakâr hayır işleri nedeniyle o aziz olarak kabul edildi.

examples.english: The town venerates its patron saint with an annual festival.
examples.turkish: Kasaba, koruyucu azizini yıllık bir festival ile anıyor.

examples.english: His kind deeds made him a saint in the eyes of many.
examples.turkish: Onun iyilikleri, pek çok kişinin gözünde onu aziz yaptı.

english_meaning: for the purpose of; for the benefit of someone or something

examples.english: He sacrificed his time for the sake of his family.
They worked hard for the sake of success.
For the sake of clarity, please explain again.

english_meaning: a threatened penalty for disobeying a law or rule; official permission or approval for an action

examples.english: The government imposed sanctions on the country.
They received official sanctions to proceed with the project.
examples.turkish: Projeye devam etmek için resmi onay aldılar.

examples.english: Economic sanctions were put in place to deter further violations.
examples.turkish: Daha fazla ihlali önlemek için ekonomik yaptırımlar uygulandı.

english_meaning: the fulfillment of one's wishes, expectations, or needs, or the pleasure derived from this

examples.english: Customer satisfaction is our top priority.
He felt a great sense of satisfaction after completing the project.
examples.turkish: Projeyi tamamladıktan sonra büyük bir memnuniyet hissetti.

examples.english: The high level of satisfaction among participants was evident.
examples.turkish: Katılımcılar arasındaki yüksek memnuniyet seviyesi belirgindi.

english_meaning: an opportunity to express one's opinion or input in a decision or discussion

examples.english: Everyone deserves a say in the decision-making process.
examples.turkish: Herkesin karar alma sürecinde söz hakkı vardır.

examples.english: The employees had no say in the company’s restructuring.
examples.turkish: Çalışanların şirketin yeniden yapılandırılmasında söz hakkı yoktu.

examples.english: She wanted to have a say in the planning of the event.
examples.turkish: Etkinliğin planlanmasında söz sahibi olmak istedi.

english_meaning: an action or event regarded as morally or legally wrong and causing general public outrage

examples.english: The scandal rocked the political establishment.
The celebrity was involved in a major scandal.
News of the scandal spread quickly throughout the community.

english_meaning: to cause someone to feel afraid; a sudden feeling of fear

examples.english: The loud noise scared the children.
A sudden scare made him jump out of his seat.
examples.turkish: Ani bir korku, onun koltuğundan fırlamasına neden oldu.

examples.english: There was a scare about the safety of the bridge.
examples.turkish: Köprünün güvenliği hakkında bir korku vardı.

english_meaning: spread or dispersed in various directions

examples.english: The papers were scattered all over the floor.
Leaves were scattered by the wind across the yard.
The scattered population made it hard to organize the event.
examples.turkish: Dağılmış nüfus, etkinliği organize etmeyi zorlaştırdı.

english_meaning: a written outline or plan of a movie, novel, or stage work showing the plot and individual scenes

examples.english: The director presented a detailed scenario for the film.
examples.turkish: Yönetmen, film için ayrıntılı bir senaryo sundu.

examples.english: In the worst-case scenario, we may lose a significant amount of data.
examples.turkish: En kötü senaryoda, önemli miktarda veri kaybedebiliriz.

examples.english: They discussed various scenarios before making a decision.
examples.turkish: Karar vermeden önce çeşitli senaryoları tartıştılar.

english_meaning: a person who is highly educated or has an aptitude for study

examples.english: The scholar published several articles on ancient history.
examples.turkish: Bilgin, antik tarih üzerine birkaç makale yayımladı.

examples.english: She is a renowned scholar in the field of literature.
examples.turkish: O, edebiyat alanında tanınmış bir bilgindir.

examples.english: The university invited a famous scholar to give a lecture.
examples.turkish: Üniversite, ünlü bir bilgini konferansa davet etti.

english_meaning: financial support granted to a student based on academic or other achievement

examples.english: She received a scholarship to study abroad.
The scholarship program covers tuition fees and living expenses.
examples.turkish: Burs programı, öğrenim ücretleri ve yaşam masraflarını karşılar.

examples.english: He was awarded a prestigious scholarship for his research.
examples.turkish: Araştırmaları nedeniyle prestijli bir burs kazandı.

english_meaning: the extent or range of something's coverage or applicability

examples.english: The scope of the project was broader than initially expected.
examples.turkish: Projenin kapsamı, başlangıçta beklenenden daha genişti.

examples.english: They discussed the scope of the new policy in detail.
The study aims to define the scope of the issue.

english_meaning: to scrape or mark the surface of something with a sharp object; a minor injury or mark

examples.english: He accidentally scratched the car with his keys.
There was a scratch on the surface of the table.
She gave the cat a scratch when it jumped on her lap.
examples.turkish: Kedinin, kucağına atlamasıyla ona çizik attı.

english_meaning: the process of showing a movie, play, or performance; also, a preliminary test or examination

examples.english: The film's screening was attended by many critics.
They organized a screening of the documentary.
The screening process helped identify potential issues.
examples.turkish: Tarama süreci, olası sorunları belirlemeye yardımcı oldu.

english_meaning: to fasten something with a screw; a spiral fastener; also to cheat or swindle

examples.english: He screwed the lid tightly onto the jar.
The carpenter used screws to assemble the furniture.
examples.turkish: Marangoz, mobilyayı birleştirmek için vidalar kullandı.

examples.english: They accused him of trying to screw the investors out of their money.
examples.turkish: Yatırımcıların parasını almaya çalıştığı iddia edildi.

english_meaning: critical observation or examination

examples.english: The company's accounts are under close scrutiny.
His actions came under public scrutiny after the scandal.
examples.turkish: Skandalın ardından, davranışları kamuoyu tarafından yakından incelendi.

examples.english: The proposal passed scrutiny by the board of directors.
examples.turkish: Teklif, yönetim kurulu tarafından detaylıca incelendi.

english_meaning: to fasten or close securely; an official mark or stamp used for authentication

examples.english: Please seal the envelope before mailing it.
examples.turkish: Lütfen zarfı posta atmadan önce mühürleyin.

examples.english: The document was signed and sealed by the company.
The seal on the ancient artifact is still intact.
examples.turkish: Antik eserin mühürü hala sağlam durumda.

english_meaning: used to introduce the second point or item in a list

examples.english: Firstly, we need to consider the costs; secondly, the benefits.
examples.turkish: İlk olarak maliyetleri, ikinci olarak faydaları değerlendirmemiz gerekiyor.

examples.english: Secondly, I'd like to add that we should plan carefully.
examples.turkish: İkinci olarak, dikkatli planlama yapmamız gerektiğini eklemek istiyorum.

examples.english: He explained his arguments, secondly emphasizing the urgency of the matter.
examples.turkish: Argümanlarını açıkladı, ikinci olarak meselenin aciliyetini vurguladı.

english_meaning: denoting attitudes, activities, or other things that have no religious or spiritual basis

examples.english: The country has a strong tradition of secularism.
examples.turkish: Ülkenin güçlü bir laiklik geleneği vardır.

examples.english: The university promotes secular values and academic freedom.
examples.turkish: Üniversite, laik değerleri ve akademik özgürlüğü teşvik eder.

examples.english: They celebrated a secular holiday that is observed nationwide.
examples.turkish: Ülke genelinde kutlanan dünyevi bir bayramı kutladılar.

english_meaning: a person who is in search of something, especially information or advice

examples.english: He is a job seeker looking for new opportunities.
examples.turkish: Yeni fırsatlar arayan bir iş arayan biridir.

examples.english: The forum is a great place for knowledge seekers.
examples.turkish: Forum, bilgi arayanlar için harika bir yerdir.

examples.english: She is a truth seeker, always questioning the status quo.
examples.turkish: O, her zaman mevcut durumu sorgulayan bir gerçeği arayan kişidir.

english_meaning: in appearance; it appears that

examples.english: Seemingly, the task was simpler than it actually was.
examples.turkish: Görünüşe göre, görev aslında olduğundan daha basitti.

examples.english: He is seemingly unaware of the problem.
The solution is seemingly straightforward, but it is quite complex.
examples.turkish: Çözüm görünüşte basit ama aslında oldukça karmaşıktır.

english_meaning: a part or section of something that is divided from the whole

examples.english: The market can be divided into several segments.
The television show is divided into different segments.
Each segment of the audience received a different discount.
examples.turkish: Seyirci grubunun her bir parçasına farklı indirim verildi.

english_meaning: to take hold of suddenly and forcibly

examples.english: The police managed to seize the stolen goods.
examples.turkish: Polis, çalınan malları ele geçirmeyi başardı.

examples.english: He seized the opportunity to start his own business.
The company seized control of its competitor's assets.

english_meaning: not often; rarely

examples.english: He seldom visits his relatives in the countryside.
Such mistakes occur seldom in professional work.
examples.turkish: Böyle hatalar profesyonel işlerde nadiren meydana gelir.

examples.english: They are seldom seen together in public.
examples.turkish: Kamuya açık yerlerde nadiren birlikte görülürler.

english_meaning: characterized by careful choice; made with deliberate discrimination among alternatives

examples.english: The college is very selective about its admissions.
She is known for her selective taste in art.
His selective memory means he only recalls important details.
examples.turkish: Seçici hafızası, sadece önemli detayları hatırlamasını sağlar.

english_meaning: a conference or other meeting for discussion or training

examples.english: The professor will lead a seminar on modern literature.
examples.turkish: Profesör modern edebiyat üzerine bir seminer verecek.

examples.english: Students are required to attend the weekly seminar.
The seminar provided practical insights into digital marketing.
examples.turkish: Seminer, dijital pazarlama hakkında pratik bilgiler sağladı.

english_meaning: a physical feeling or perception resulting from something that happens to or comes into contact with the body; a widespread reaction of interest or excitement
turkish_meaning: hissiyat, duygu; büyük ilgi uyandıran olay

examples.english: The new smartphone created a sensation among tech enthusiasts.
examples.turkish: Yeni akıllı telefon, teknoloji meraklıları arasında büyük bir sansasyon yarattı.

examples.english: The sudden sensation of warmth made her smile.
There was a sensation of excitement at the concert.

english_meaning: the quality of being sensitive; the ability to perceive and respond to slight changes, signals, or influences

examples.english: Her sensitivity to criticism often makes her withdraw.
examples.turkish: Eleştiriye duyarlılığı onu sık sık içine kapanmaya iter.

examples.english: The camera is very sensitive to light.
Sensitivity to cultural differences is important in international business.
examples.turkish: Uluslararası iş dünyasında kültürel farklılıklara duyarlılık önemlidir.

english_meaning: a view or attitude toward a situation or event; an emotion or feeling

examples.english: The film evoked strong sentiment among its viewers.
examples.turkish: Film, izleyiciler arasında güçlü duygular uyandırdı.

examples.english: There is a nostalgic sentiment attached to the old photographs.
examples.turkish: Eski fotoğraflara nostaljik bir duygu bağlıdır.

examples.english: Her sentiment about the issue was clearly expressed in her speech.
examples.turkish: Konuyla ilgili duyguları, konuşmasında açıkça ifade edildi.

english_meaning: the action or state of moving or being moved apart

examples.english: The separation of church and state is an important principle.
examples.turkish: Din ve devletin ayrılması önemli bir ilkedir.

examples.english: They experienced a painful separation after the breakup.
examples.turkish: Ayrılık sonrası acı verici bir ayrım yaşadılar.

examples.english: The separation of recyclable materials is crucial for waste management.
examples.turkish: Geri dönüştürülebilir malzemelerin ayrılması atık yönetimi için çok önemlidir.

english_meaning: appearing or occurring in a series; published in installments

examples.english: The serial novel kept readers eagerly awaiting the next chapter.
examples.turkish: Seri roman, okuyucuları bir sonraki bölümü sabırsızlıkla bekletiyordu.

examples.english: The television series was released as a serial over several weeks.
examples.turkish: Televizyon dizisi, birkaç hafta boyunca seri olarak yayınlandı.

examples.english: He became fascinated with a serial killer case on the news.
examples.turkish: Haberlerde seri katil davasına ilgi duymaya başladı.

english_meaning: an official agreement intended to resolve a dispute or conflict; a place where people establish a community

examples.english: The settlement between the two companies ended the long legal battle.
examples.turkish: İki şirket arasındaki anlaşma uzun süren hukuki mücadeleyi sona erdirdi.

examples.english: They founded a small settlement in the remote wilderness.
examples.turkish: Uzak vahşi doğada küçük bir yerleşim kurdular.

examples.english: The settlement was reached after months of negotiations.
examples.turkish: Aylar süren müzakerelerden sonra anlaşmaya varıldı.

english_meaning: a person who moves to a new country or area in order to live there

examples.english: The early settlers faced many hardships in the new land.
examples.turkish: İlk yerleşimciler yeni topraklarda birçok zorlukla karşılaştılar.

examples.english: Settlers built cabins and farms in the wilderness.
examples.turkish: Yerleşimciler vahşi doğada kulübeler ve çiftlikler inşa ettiler.

examples.english: Historical records document the lives of the settlers.

english_meaning: the way in which something is organized, arranged, or planned

examples.english: The setup of the new office was modern and efficient.
examples.turkish: Yeni ofisin kurulumu modern ve verimliydi.

examples.english: They discussed the setup of the conference in detail.
examples.turkish: Konferansın düzeni detaylı bir şekilde tartışıldı.

examples.english: A proper setup is crucial for a successful event.
examples.turkish: Başarılı bir etkinlik için doğru düzen çok önemlidir.

english_meaning: to a very great degree; harshly

examples.english: The building was severely damaged by the earthquake.
He was severely criticized for his comments.
The patient was severely ill and required immediate care.
examples.turkish: Hasta çok ağır derecede rahatsızdı ve acil bakım gerektiriyordu.

english_meaning: the quality or state of being sexual; sexual orientation

examples.english: The study explored various aspects of human sexuality.
examples.turkish: Çalışma, insan cinselliğinin çeşitli yönlerini inceledi.

examples.english: Sexuality is a complex interplay of biological and cultural factors.
examples.turkish: Cinsellik, biyolojik ve kültürel faktörlerin karmaşık bir etkileşimidir.

examples.english: Open discussions about sexuality can help reduce stigma.
examples.turkish: Cinsellik hakkında açık tartışmalar, damgalanmayı azaltmaya yardımcı olabilir.

english_meaning: sexually attractive or exciting

examples.english: The actress looked very sexy in her red dress.
examples.turkish: Oyuncu, kırmızı elbisesiyle çok seksi görünüyordu.

examples.english: He thinks that confidence is one of the sexiest qualities.
examples.turkish: Onun düşüncesine göre özgüven en seksi özelliklerden biridir.

examples.english: The advertisement was designed to be both stylish and sexy.
examples.turkish: Reklam hem şık hem de seksi olacak şekilde tasarlandı.

english_meaning: having a particular form or outline; formed or molded in a specific way

examples.english: Her personality was largely shaped by her early experiences.
examples.turkish: Kişiliği büyük ölçüde erken yaşantıları tarafından şekillendirildi.

examples.english: The sculpture was beautifully shaped by the artist.
examples.turkish: Heykel, sanatçı tarafından muhteşem bir biçimde şekillendirildi.

examples.english: Modern architecture is shaped by both function and aesthetics.
examples.turkish: Modern mimari, hem işlev hem de estetik tarafından şekillendirilir.

english_meaning: an owner of shares in a company

examples.english: The shareholders will vote on the proposed merger at the annual meeting.
examples.turkish: Hissedarlar, yıllık toplantıda önerilen birleşmeyi oylayacak.

examples.english: A shareholder meeting is scheduled for next month.
examples.turkish: Gelecek ay bir hissedar toplantısı planlandı.

examples.english: Shareholders are entitled to a portion of the company's profits.
examples.turkish: Hissedarlar, şirketin karından bir pay alma hakkına sahiptir.

english_meaning: to break suddenly into many small pieces; to destroy completely

examples.english: The glass vase shattered when it fell on the floor.
examples.turkish: Cam vazo yere düştüğünde parçalara ayrıldı.

examples.english: The news of the accident shattered her heart.
The storm shattered several windows in the building.

english_meaning: to discard, remove, or let fall (e.g., tears, leaves, or light)

examples.english: The tree sheds its leaves in autumn.
He began to shed tears during the emotional movie.
examples.turkish: Duygusal film sırasında gözyaşlarını dökmeye başladı.

examples.english: The company decided to shed its unprofitable divisions.
examples.turkish: Şirket, karlı olmayan bölümlerini elden çıkarmaya karar verdi.

english_meaning: complete and utter; pure; very steep

examples.english: The sheer beauty of the landscape left everyone speechless.
examples.turkish: Manzaranın saf güzelliği herkesi şaşkına çevirdi.

examples.english: They climbed the sheer cliff without any safety gear.
examples.turkish: Herhangi bir güvenlik ekipmanı olmadan dik kayaya tırmandılar.

examples.english: It was sheer luck that they arrived on time.

english_meaning: the process of transporting goods by sea, air, or land

examples.english: Shipping costs have increased significantly over the past year.
examples.turkish: Geçen yıl boyunca nakliye maliyetleri önemli ölçüde arttı.

examples.english: The company specializes in international shipping.
They tracked the shipping status of the package online.
examples.turkish: Paketin gönderim durumunu çevrimiçi takip ettiler.

english_meaning: causing shock or surprise; very upsetting or offensive

examples.english: The news of the scandal was truly shocking.
It was shocking to learn about the corruption in the organization.
examples.turkish: Kuruluş içindeki yolsuzluğu öğrenmek dehşet vericiydi.

examples.english: The film contained several shocking scenes.
examples.turkish: Filmde birkaç dehşet verici sahne vardı.

english_meaning: to fire a gun or other weapon; a sudden burst of light or sound; to film or record

examples.english: The photographer will shoot the advertisement tomorrow.
The soldier was ordered to shoot at the target.
A sudden shoot of light illuminated the dark room.
examples.turkish: Ani bir ışık patlaması karanlık odayı aydınlattı.

english_meaning: the land along the edge of a sea, lake, or other large body of water

examples.english: They walked along the shore collecting seashells.
The waves crashed onto the rocky shore.
He set up his tent on the shore of the lake.

english_meaning: a situation in which something needed cannot be obtained in sufficient amounts

examples.english: There is a shortage of clean water in the region.
The shortage of skilled workers is affecting production.
Food shortages became common during the war.
examples.turkish: Savaş sırasında gıda kıtlığı yaygın hale geldi.

english_meaning: in a short time; soon

examples.english: The meeting will begin shortly.
She will arrive shortly after the train lands.
examples.turkish: Tren indikten kısa süre sonra gelecek.

examples.english: They promised to respond to the inquiry shortly.
examples.turkish: Sorguya kısa süre içinde yanıt vereceklerine söz verdiler.

english_meaning: lasting only for a short period of time

examples.english: They took a short-term loan to cover expenses.
examples.turkish: Masrafları karşılamak için kısa vadeli bir kredi aldılar.

examples.english: The project has short-term goals to boost performance.
examples.turkish: Projenin performansı artırmaya yönelik kısa vadeli hedefleri var.

examples.english: Short-term memory can fade quickly without reinforcement.
examples.turkish: Kısa süreli hafıza, pekiştirme olmadan hızla silinebilir.

english_meaning: to become smaller in size or amount; to contract

examples.english: The sweater may shrink if washed in hot water.
examples.turkish: Kazağın sıcak suda yıkanırsa küçülmesi muhtemeldir.

examples.english: Sales shrank during the economic downturn.
He watched the ice shrink under the summer sun.
examples.turkish: Yaz güneşi altında buzun küçüldüğünü izledi.

english_meaning: to raise (one's shoulders) slightly and momentarily to express uncertainty or indifference

examples.english: He shrugged when asked about his future plans.
examples.turkish: Gelecek planları hakkında sorulduğunda omuz silkti.

examples.english: She shrugged off the criticism without a word.
examples.turkish: Eleştirileri kelime etmeden umursamazcasına omuz silkti.

examples.english: When questioned, he simply shrugged.

english_meaning: a brother or sister

examples.english: She has two siblings, an older brother and a younger sister.
examples.turkish: Onun iki kardeşi var, biri ağabey biri de kız kardeş.

examples.english: Siblings often share a deep bond.
examples.turkish: Kardeşler genellikle derin bir bağ paylaşır.

examples.english: He spent the holidays with his siblings.

english_meaning: a path along the side of a road for pedestrians

examples.english: The children played on the sidewalk near their home.
Please walk on the sidewalk for safety.
The city installed new sidewalks in the downtown area.

english_meaning: to emit a long, deep audible breath expressing sadness, relief, tiredness, or a similar feeling; the sound made by such a breath

examples.english: She let out a long sigh after hearing the news.
examples.turkish: Haberi duyunca uzun bir iç çekiş çıkardı.

examples.english: His sigh was a sign of resignation.
The room filled with a collective sigh of relief.
examples.turkish: Oda, toplu bir rahatlama iç çekişiyle doldu.

english_meaning: a person's name written in a distinctive way as a form of identification; a characteristic manner or style

examples.english: Please sign your name as your signature on the form.
The artist's signature style is recognizable worldwide.
examples.turkish: Sanatçının ayırt edici imzası dünya çapında tanınır.

examples.english: Her signature on the letter confirmed its authenticity.
examples.turkish: Mektuptaki imzası, onun gerçekliğini teyit etti.

english_meaning: the quality of being worthy of attention; importance

examples.english: The significance of the discovery cannot be overstated.
They discussed the significance of the event in depth.
The significance of the monument lies in its historical value.

english_meaning: to imitate the appearance or character of; to reproduce the conditions of

examples.english: The software can simulate real-world weather conditions.
examples.turkish: Yazılım, gerçek dünya hava koşullarını simüle edebilir.

examples.english: Engineers use models to simulate complex systems.
examples.turkish: Mühendisler, karmaşık sistemleri simüle etmek için modeller kullanır.

examples.english: The training program simulates a high-pressure work environment.
examples.turkish: Eğitim programı, yüksek baskılı bir iş ortamını simüle eder.

english_meaning: an imitation of a situation or process, especially for the purpose of study or training

examples.english: The flight simulation helped pilots practice emergency procedures.
examples.turkish: Uçuş simülasyonu, pilotların acil durum prosedürlerini pratik yapmasına yardımcı oldu.

examples.english: A computer simulation of the economy was developed for analysis.
examples.turkish: Ekonominin bilgisayar simülasyonu analiz için geliştirildi.

examples.english: The simulation provided valuable insights into the process.
examples.turkish: Simülasyon, sürece dair değerli bilgiler sağladı.

english_meaning: at the same time

examples.english: The two events occurred simultaneously.
examples.turkish: İki olay aynı anda meydana geldi.

examples.english: She managed to work and study simultaneously.
examples.turkish: Hem çalışıp hem de aynı anda ders çalışmayı başardı.

examples.english: The software can run multiple processes simultaneously.
examples.turkish: Yazılım, aynı anda birden fazla işlemi çalıştırabilir.

english_meaning: an immoral act considered to be a transgression against divine law

examples.english: He confessed his sins to the priest.
Many religious texts warn against sin.
examples.turkish: Pek çok kutsal metin, günahtan sakınmayı öğütler.

examples.english: She believed that forgiveness could cleanse one of sin.

english_meaning: located in a particular place

examples.english: The hotel is situated in the heart of the city.
Their house is situated on a quiet, tree-lined street.
examples.turkish: Evleri, ağaçlarla çevrili sessiz bir sokakta yer alıyor.

examples.english: The museum is situated near the river.

english_meaning: not easily convinced; having doubts or reservations

examples.english: She remained skeptical about the new theory.
The audience was skeptical of his claims.
He was skeptical whether the plan would succeed.
examples.turkish: Planın başarılı olup olmayacağı konusunda kuşkuydu.

english_meaning: a rough or unfinished drawing or painting, often used as a preliminary study

examples.english: The artist made a quick sketch of the landscape.
examples.turkish: Sanatçı, manzaranın hızlıca bir eskizini yaptı.

examples.english: Her sketch captured the essence of the subject.
He presented a series of sketches to outline his ideas.
examples.turkish: Fikirlerini özetlemek için bir dizi eskiz sundu.

english_meaning: having the ability, knowledge, or experience to do something well

examples.english: She is a skilled technician with years of experience.
examples.turkish: Yılların deneyimine sahip yetenekli bir teknisyendir.

examples.english: The workshop attracted skilled artisans from around the region.
His skilled performance impressed the audience.

english_meaning: to move lightly and quickly, typically by hopping on one foot or with both feet off the ground briefly

examples.english: The child skipped happily down the street.
She decided to skip breakfast and grab a coffee instead.
examples.turkish: Kahvaltıyı atlayıp yerine kahve içmeye karar verdi.

examples.english: He skipped several steps in the process to save time.
examples.turkish: Zaman kazanmak için süreçte birkaç adımı atladı.

english_meaning: the bony framework of the head, enclosing the brain

examples.english: The archaeologists uncovered a human skull at the site.
examples.turkish: Arkeologlar, alanda bir insan kafatası buldu.

examples.english: In many cultures, the skull is a symbol of mortality.
examples.turkish: Pek çok kültürde, kafatası ölümün sembolüdür.

examples.english: The museum display included a complete skull of a prehistoric animal.
examples.turkish: Müze sergisinde, tarih öncesi bir hayvanın tam kafatası yer aldı.

english_meaning: to shut (a door, window, or lid) forcefully and loudly; also, to criticize harshly

examples.english: He slammed the door in frustration.

examples.turkish: Eleştirmen, zayıf hikayesi nedeniyle filmi sertçe eleştirdi.

examples.english: She slammed her fist on the table to emphasize her point.
examples.turkish: Fikrini vurgulamak için masaya yumruk attı.

english_meaning: to hit someone or something with the flat part of the hand

examples.english: He slapped his friend on the back in greeting.

examples.turkish: Koç, cesaret vermek için kolunu tokatladı.

examples.english: She gave him a playful slap during the argument.
examples.turkish: Tartışma sırasında ona şakacı bir tokat attı.

english_meaning: to cut with a sweeping or slashing movement; to reduce drastically

examples.english: The attacker slashed the victim with a knife.

examples.english: They had to slash prices to clear the inventory.
examples.turkish: Envanteri eritmek için fiyatları büyük ölçüde düşürdüler.

examples.english: The hurricane slashed the coastline, causing extensive damage.
examples.turkish: Kasırga, kıyı şeridini keskin şekilde vurdu ve büyük hasara yol açtı.

english_meaning: the state of being a slave; forced servitude

examples.english: The history of slavery is a dark chapter in human civilization.
examples.turkish: Kölelik tarihi, insan uygarlığının karanlık bir dönemidir.

examples.english: They studied the impact of slavery on modern society.
examples.turkish: Köleliğin modern toplum üzerindeki etkisini incelediler.

examples.english: Abolitionists fought tirelessly against slavery.
examples.turkish: Köleliğe karşı mücadele edenler yorulmadan savaştı.

english_meaning: a short, memorable phrase used in advertising or political campaigns

examples.english: The company's slogan is 'Quality and Innovation'.

examples.turkish: Siyasi kampanyalar, seçmenleri çekmek için akılda kalıcı sloganlar kullanır.

examples.english: He remembered the slogan from the commercial clearly.
examples.turkish: Reklamdaki sloganı net bir şekilde hatırladı.

english_meaning: a narrow opening into which something can be inserted; a scheduled time

examples.english: Insert the coin into the slot to play the machine.
examples.turkish: Makineyi oynatmak için parayı yuvaya atın.

examples.english: She booked a time slot for her doctor's appointment.
examples.turkish: Doktor randevusu için bir zaman aralığı ayırdı.

examples.english: The parking slot was just big enough for his car.
examples.turkish: Park yeri arabası için yeterince genişti.

english_meaning: to break something into pieces violently or forcefully

examples.english: He smashed the old television with a hammer.
The vase smashed into a thousand pieces when it hit the floor.
examples.turkish: Vazo yere çarptığında bin parçaya ayrıldı.

examples.english: The team smashed their record in the championship.
examples.turkish: Takım, şampiyonada rekorlarını alt üst etti.

english_meaning: to break suddenly and completely, typically with a sharp cracking sound; to take a photograph quickly

examples.english: She snapped the pencil in half during the argument.

examples.turkish: Güzel gün batımının fotoğrafını hızla çekti.

examples.english: The branch snapped under the weight of the snow.

english_meaning: to make something thoroughly wet by immersing it in liquid

examples.english: He soaked the dirty clothes in water before washing them.
examples.turkish: Kirli giysileri yıkamadan önce suda ıslattı.

examples.english: The rain soaked everyone on the outdoor event.
examples.turkish: Açık hava etkinliğinde yağmur herkesi ıslattı.

examples.english: Let the beans soak overnight to improve their texture.
examples.turkish: Fasulyeleri dokularını iyileştirmek için gece boyunca ıslatın.

english_meaning: to fly or rise high in the air; to increase rapidly

examples.english: The eagle soared high above the mountains.

examples.turkish: Yeni vergi uygulandıktan sonra fiyatlar fırladı.

examples.english: Her spirits soared when she heard the good news.

english_meaning: commonly designated by a particular name, often implying skepticism about its appropriateness

examples.english: The so-called expert was later exposed as a fraud.
examples.turkish: Sözde uzman daha sonra dolandırıcı olarak ortaya çıktı.

examples.english: They criticized the so-called solution as being ineffective.

examples.turkish: Sözde mucizevi tedaviyi bir aldatmaca olarak reddetti.

english_meaning: relating to or advocating socialism; a person who supports socialism

examples.english: The country adopted socialist policies in the 20th century.
He identifies as a socialist and actively participates in political debates.
examples.turkish: Kendini sosyalist olarak tanımlıyor ve siyasi tartışmalara aktif olarak katılıyor.

examples.english: The socialist movement has a long history in that region.
examples.turkish: O bölgede sosyalist hareketin uzun bir geçmişi vardır.

english_meaning: being the only one; exclusive

examples.english: She was the sole survivor of the accident.
examples.turkish: Kazadan tek sağ kalan o oldu.

examples.english: The sole purpose of the meeting was to discuss the merger.
He is the sole owner of the business.

english_meaning: only; exclusively

examples.english: The project was designed solely for educational purposes.
She relies solely on her own experience to make decisions.
examples.turkish: Kararlarını sadece kendi deneyimlerine dayanarak verir.

examples.english: They funded the research solely through private donations.
examples.turkish: Araştırma, sadece özel bağışlarla finanse edildi.

english_meaning: unity or agreement of feeling or action, especially among individuals with a common interest

examples.english: Workers showed solidarity during the strike.
The community acted in solidarity with the victims.
examples.turkish: Topluluk, mağdurlarla dayanışma içinde hareket etti.

examples.english: Solidarity among team members is crucial for success.
examples.turkish: Takım üyeleri arasındaki dayanışma, başarı için çok önemlidir.

english_meaning: done or performed by one person alone; a performance by a single performer

examples.english: She performed a stunning piano solo at the concert.
examples.turkish: Konserde muhteşem bir piyano solosu çaldı.

examples.english: He embarked on a solo journey around the world.
The artist's solo exhibition received critical acclaim.
examples.turkish: Sanatçının tek kişilik sergisi eleştirmenlerden övgü aldı.

english_meaning: in a way that is not known or specified; by some unspecified means

examples.english: Somehow, they managed to finish the project on time.
examples.turkish: Bir şekilde projeyi zamanında bitirmeyi başardılar.

examples.english: I must have left my keys somewhere around here.
examples.turkish: Anahtarlarımı bir şekilde buranın etrafında bırakmışım.

examples.english: Somehow, she always finds a solution to every problem.
examples.turkish: Bir şekilde her soruna çözüm bulmayı başarıyor.

english_meaning: at an unspecified or unstated time in the future or past

examples.english: Let's meet sometime next week.
I plan to travel abroad sometime in the near future.
examples.turkish: Yakın gelecekte bir ara yurt dışına seyahat etmeyi planlıyorum.

examples.english: We should catch up sometime soon.

english_meaning: complex or refined; having a great deal of worldly experience and knowledge

examples.english: The software uses sophisticated algorithms to analyze data.
examples.turkish: Yazılım, verileri analiz etmek için sofistike algoritmalar kullanır.

examples.english: She has a sophisticated sense of style.
examples.turkish: Onun gelişmiş bir tarz anlayışı vardır.

examples.english: The city is known for its sophisticated art scene.

english_meaning: a second-year student in high school or college

examples.english: The sophomore class organized a charity event.
examples.turkish: İkinci sınıf öğrencileri bir hayır etkinliği düzenledi.

examples.english: She is a promising sophomore in the literature department.
examples.turkish: O, edebiyat bölümünde gelecek vadeden bir ikinci sınıf öğrencisidir.

examples.english: Sophomore year can be challenging as students adjust to higher academic demands.
examples.turkish: İkinci sınıf, öğrencilerin daha yüksek akademik taleplere uyum sağladıkları zorlu bir dönem olabilir.

english_meaning: in good condition; reliable and valid; based on reason

examples.english: She provided sound advice on financial planning.
examples.turkish: Mali planlama konusunda sağlam tavsiyeler verdi.

examples.english: The building is structurally sound after the renovation.
examples.turkish: Yenilemeden sonra bina yapısal olarak sağlam oldu.

examples.english: His argument was based on sound logic.

english_meaning: supreme power or authority; the authority of a state to govern itself

examples.english: The nation regained its sovereignty after years of occupation.
examples.turkish: Ülke, yıllarca süren işgalden sonra egemenliğini yeniden kazandı.

examples.english: Sovereignty is a fundamental principle of international law.
The debate centered on the sovereignty of indigenous peoples.
examples.turkish: Tartışma, yerli halkların egemenliği üzerine odaklandı.

english_meaning: irrelevant or unsolicited messages sent over the internet, typically to a large number of users

examples.english: Her inbox was flooded with spam emails.
The website filters out spam to protect its users.
examples.turkish: Web sitesi, kullanıcılarını korumak için spamleri filtreler.

examples.english: Spam can be a major nuisance for email users.
examples.turkish: Spam, e-posta kullanıcıları için büyük bir sıkıntı olabilir.

english_meaning: to extend across a period of time or a physical distance; the full extent or measure of something

examples.english: The bridge spans the river from one bank to the other.
examples.turkish: Köprü, nehri bir kıyıdan diğerine kaplar.

examples.english: His career spanned over four decades.
examples.turkish: Kariyeri kırk yılı aşkın bir süreyi kapsadı.

examples.english: The span of the project was determined by available resources.
examples.turkish: Projenin kapsamı, mevcut kaynaklara bağlı olarak belirlendi.

english_meaning: additional; to refrain from harming, punishing, or killing

examples.english: She kept a spare key in case of emergency.
examples.turkish: Acil durum için yedek bir anahtar tuttu.

examples.english: Please spare me a moment of your time.
