examples.turkish: Yönetici, çalışanı daha fazla eleştiriden kurtarmaya karar verdi.

english_meaning: to ignite or trigger an event, feeling, or idea

examples.english: The controversial article sparked a heated debate.
examples.turkish: Tartışmalı makale, hararetli bir tartışma başlattı.

examples.english: Her inspiring speech sparked hope in the audience.
examples.turkish: Onun ilham verici konuşması, izleyicilerde umut kıvılcımı yaktı.

examples.english: The experiment sparked a new line of research.
examples.turkish: Deney, yeni bir araştırma hattını ateşledi.

english_meaning: to concentrate on and become expert in a particular subject or skill

examples.english: He decided to specialize in cardiology after medical school.
examples.turkish: Tıp fakültesinden sonra kardiyoloji alanında uzmanlaşmaya karar verdi.

examples.english: The firm specializes in renewable energy solutions.
She plans to specialize in environmental law.

english_meaning: requiring or involving detailed and specific training or knowledge

examples.english: The hospital has a specialized unit for cardiac care.
examples.turkish: Hastanede kalp bakımı için uzmanlaşmış bir ünite var.

examples.english: She received specialized training in advanced robotics.
examples.turkish: İleri robotik alanında uzmanlaşmış eğitim aldı.

examples.english: Specialized software is used in scientific research.

english_meaning: a detailed description or assessment of requirements, dimensions, or characteristics

examples.english: The product meets all the specifications outlined in the contract.
examples.turkish: Ürün, sözleşmede belirtilen tüm özelliklere uygundur.

examples.english: Please review the specifications before placing your order.
examples.turkish: Sipariş vermeden önce lütfen şartnameleri gözden geçirin.

examples.english: The engineer wrote a detailed specification for the new device.
examples.turkish: Mühendis, yeni cihaz için detaylı bir şartname yazdı.

english_meaning: to state something in detail; to mention or name specifically

examples.english: Please specify your requirements in the order form.
The instructions specify that the mixture must be stirred continuously.
examples.turkish: Talimatlar, karışımın sürekli karıştırılması gerektiğini belirtiyor.

examples.english: He failed to specify the exact time of the meeting.

english_meaning: an individual animal, plant, piece of a mineral, etc., used as an example of its species or type for scientific study or display

examples.english: The museum displayed a rare specimen of the ancient fossil.
examples.turkish: Müze, nadir bulunan eski fosil örneğini sergiledi.

examples.english: Each specimen was carefully labeled for the study.
examples.turkish: Her numune, çalışma için dikkatlice etiketlendi.

examples.english: The scientist collected several specimens for further analysis.
examples.turkish: Bilim insanı, daha fazla analiz için birkaç örnek topladı.

english_meaning: a visually striking performance or display

examples.english: The fireworks created a magnificent spectacle in the sky.
examples.turkish: Havai fişekler gökyüzünde muhteşem bir şov yarattı.

examples.english: The parade was a grand spectacle of color and music.
examples.turkish: Geçit töreni renk ve müzikle büyük bir görsel şovdu.

examples.english: Tourists flocked to see the natural spectacle of the northern lights.
examples.turkish: Turistler, kuzey ışıklarının doğal şovunu izlemek için akın etti.

english_meaning: beautiful in a dramatic and eye-catching way; impressive

examples.english: The view from the mountain was absolutely spectacular.
They put on a spectacular display of fireworks.
examples.turkish: Muhteşem bir havai fişek gösterisi sundular.

examples.english: Her performance in the play was nothing short of spectacular.

english_meaning: a person who watches an event, such as a game or performance

examples.english: Thousands of spectators gathered to watch the final match.
examples.turkish: Final maçını izlemek için binlerce seyirci toplandı.

examples.english: The stadium was packed with enthusiastic spectators.
Spectators cheered as the athlete crossed the finish line.
examples.turkish: Seyirciler, sporcunun bitiş çizgisini geçtiğinde tezahürat yaptı.

english_meaning: a band of colors produced by separation of the components of light; a wide range or scope

examples.english: The visible spectrum consists of all the colors that can be seen by the human eye.
examples.turkish: Görünür spektrum, insan gözünün görebileceği tüm renkleri içerir.

examples.english: Her interests cover a wide spectrum of subjects.
examples.turkish: Onun ilgi alanları çok geniş bir yelpazeye yayılmıştır.

examples.english: The debate covered the entire spectrum of political views.
examples.turkish: Tartışma, siyasi görüşlerin tüm spektrumunu kapsadı.

english_meaning: to form a theory or conjecture about a subject without firm evidence; to invest in stocks, property, etc., in the hope of profit but with the risk of loss

examples.english: Investors often speculate on future market trends.
examples.turkish: Yatırımcılar sıklıkla gelecekteki piyasa trendleri üzerine spekülasyon yaparlar.

examples.english: They speculated about the reasons for the sudden drop in sales.
examples.turkish: Satışlardaki ani düşüşün nedenleri üzerine spekülasyon yaptılar.

examples.english: It is unwise to speculate without sufficient evidence.
examples.turkish: Yeterli kanıt olmadan spekülasyon yapmak akıllıca değildir.

english_meaning: the forming of a theory or conjecture without firm evidence; risky investment in hope of profit

examples.english: There has been a lot of speculation about the company's future.
examples.turkish: Şirketin geleceği hakkında çok spekülasyon yapıldı.

examples.english: Real estate speculation often leads to unstable markets.
examples.turkish: Gayrimenkul spekülasyonu genellikle dengesiz piyasalara yol açar.

examples.english: The speculation on the new product caused its price to skyrocket.
examples.turkish: Yeni ürün üzerine yapılan spekülasyon, fiyatının fırlamasına neden oldu.

english_meaning: a short period of time; a form of words used as a magical charm or incantation

examples.english: He was under a spell of exhaustion after the long journey.
examples.turkish: Uzun yolculuktan sonra bitkinlik büyüsü altındaydı.

examples.english: She whispered an ancient spell to ward off evil.
examples.turkish: Kötülüğü uzaklaştırmak için eski bir büyü fısıldadı.

examples.english: There was a brief spell of silence in the crowded room.
examples.turkish: Kalabalık odada kısa bir sessizlik anı oldu.

english_meaning: a round solid figure, or a domain or area of activity, interest, or knowledge

examples.english: The Earth is a sphere.
She is a leading expert in the sphere of digital marketing.
examples.turkish: Dijital pazarlama alanında önde gelen bir uzmandır.

examples.english: They expanded their business into new spheres of technology.

english_meaning: an aromatic or pungent vegetable substance used to flavor food; to flavor food with spices

examples.english: Indian cuisine is known for its rich variety of spices.
examples.turkish: Hint mutfağı, zengin baharat çeşitliliği ile bilinir.

examples.english: She added a pinch of spice to enhance the flavor of the soup.
examples.turkish: Çorbanın lezzetini artırmak için bir tutam baharat ekledi.

examples.english: The recipe calls for a blend of exotic spices.
examples.turkish: Tarif, egzotik baharatların bir karışımını gerektiriyor.

english_meaning: to cause or allow liquid to flow over the edge of its container; to scatter or fall out

examples.english: Be careful not to spill the coffee on your shirt.
The contents of the bottle spilled onto the floor.
Tears began to spill down her cheeks.

english_meaning: to turn or cause to turn around quickly; a rapid turning motion; a particular interpretation or version of events

examples.english: The dancer spun gracefully across the stage.
He put a positive spin on the disappointing news.
examples.turkish: Hayal kırıklığı yaratan habere olumlu bir yorum kattı.

examples.english: The record spins at 33 1/3 revolutions per minute.

english_meaning: the series of vertebrae extending from the skull to the lower back, enclosing the spinal cord

examples.english: A strong spine is essential for good posture.
examples.turkish: İyi duruş için sağlam bir omurga gereklidir.

examples.english: The injury damaged several vertebrae along his spine.
Yoga helps strengthen the muscles around the spine.

english_meaning: a desire to hurt, annoy, or offend someone

examples.english: He acted out of pure spite, even though it hurt him too.
examples.turkish: Kendisine zarar verse de, tamamen kinle hareket etti.

examples.english: She ignored his remarks out of spite.
Their decision was motivated by spite rather than reason.
examples.turkish: Karar, akıldan çok kin duygusuyla alındı.

english_meaning: to diminish or destroy the value, quality, or enjoyment of something

examples.english: Don't spoil the ending of the movie for others.
The rain spoiled our picnic plans.
Excessive heat can spoil fresh produce quickly.
examples.turkish: Aşırı sıcaklık taze ürünleri hızla bozabilir.

english_meaning: a man who speaks on behalf of an organization or group

examples.english: The spokesman held a press conference to address the issue.
examples.turkish: Temsilci, konuyu açıklamak için basın toplantısı düzenledi.

examples.english: He was appointed as the official spokesman for the campaign.
examples.turkish: Kampanya için resmi basın sözcüsü olarak atandı.

examples.english: The spokesman assured the public that the situation was under control.
examples.turkish: Temsilci, durumun kontrol altında olduğunu halka temin etti.

english_meaning: a person, regardless of gender, who speaks on behalf of an organization or group

examples.english: The spokesperson answered all the questions from the media.
examples.turkish: Temsilci, medyadan gelen tüm soruları yanıtladı.

examples.english: She was chosen as the spokesperson for the environmental group.
The spokesperson clarified the company's policies during the interview.
examples.turkish: Temsilci, röportaj sırasında şirketin politikalarını açıkladı.

english_meaning: a female who speaks on behalf of an organization or group

examples.english: The spokeswoman addressed the media with clarity.
examples.turkish: Kadın temsilci, medyaya net bir şekilde hitap etti.

examples.english: She was the first spokeswoman for the new initiative.
examples.turkish: Yeni girişim için ilk kadın temsilci o oldu.

examples.english: The spokeswoman explained the company's new policy.

english_meaning: the act of providing funds or support for an event, activity, person, or organization

examples.english: The event was a success thanks to corporate sponsorship.
examples.turkish: Etkinlik, kurumsal sponsorluk sayesinde başarılı oldu.

examples.english: They secured sponsorship for the new sports team.
examples.turkish: Yeni spor takımı için sponsorluk sağladılar.

examples.english: Sponsorship agreements are common in the entertainment industry.

english_meaning: a strong beam of light used to illuminate a particular area; public attention

examples.english: The actor enjoyed being in the spotlight on stage.
examples.turkish: Oyuncu, sahnede spot ışığı altında olmaktan hoşlandı.

examples.english: The scandal put the company in the media spotlight.
examples.turkish: Skandal, şirketi medya dikkatinin odağına aldı.

examples.english: She stepped into the spotlight to receive her award.
examples.turkish: Ödülünü almak için spot ışığının altına çıktı.

english_meaning: a husband or wife, considered in relation to their partner

examples.english: Her spouse supported her career ambitions.
They celebrated their anniversary with their spouse and family.
examples.turkish: Evlilik yıldönümlerini eşleri ve aileleriyle kutladılar.

examples.english: The benefits include health insurance for the spouse.
examples.turkish: Yan haklar arasında eş için sağlık sigortası da vardır.

english_meaning: a person who secretly collects and reports information about the activities, movements, and plans of an enemy or competitor; to observe secretly

examples.english: The spy infiltrated the enemy headquarters undetected.
examples.turkish: Casus, düşman karargahına fark edilmeden sızdı.

examples.english: She spent years spying on the rival company.
examples.turkish: Rakip şirketi yıllarca casusluk yaparak izledi.

examples.english: They hired a private detective to spy on the suspect.
examples.turkish: Şüpheliyi izlemek için özel bir dedektif tuttular.

english_meaning: a small group of people organized for a particular purpose, especially in military or sports contexts

examples.english: The police squad quickly responded to the emergency.
examples.turkish: Polis takımı, acil duruma hızla müdahale etti.

examples.english: He was selected to join the elite squad of athletes.
examples.turkish: Seçkin sporcular takımına katılmak üzere seçildi.

examples.english: The military squad conducted a surprise raid.
examples.turkish: Askeri birlik, sürpriz bir baskın gerçekleştirdi.

english_meaning: to firmly press (something) from two sides; to compress

examples.english: She squeezed the lemon to extract its juice.
They had to squeeze through the narrow gap.
He managed to squeeze in a quick workout before work.
examples.turkish: İşe gitmeden önce kısa bir egzersiz yapmayı başardı.

english_meaning: to pierce or wound (someone) with a pointed object

examples.english: The attacker attempted to stab the victim with a knife.
He was stabbed during the altercation.
The movie depicted a dramatic stabbing scene.
examples.turkish: Film, dramatik bir bıçaklama sahnesini konu aldı.

english_meaning: the state of being stable; firmness in position or consistency

examples.english: The government is working to restore economic stability.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, ekonomik istikrarı yeniden sağlamaya çalışıyor.

examples.english: The structure's stability was compromised during the storm.
examples.turkish: Yapının istikrarı fırtına sırasında zarar gördü.

examples.english: Family stability is important for a child’s development.
examples.turkish: Bir çocuğun gelişimi için aile istikrarı önemlidir.

english_meaning: to make or hold stable; to maintain a steady condition

examples.english: The government introduced measures to stabilize the currency.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, para birimini istikrara kavuşturmak için önlemler aldı.

examples.english: Efforts were made to stabilize the building after the earthquake.
examples.turkish: Depremden sonra binanın sabitlenmesi için çabalar gösterildi.

examples.english: The therapy helped stabilize her mood over time.
examples.turkish: Tedavi, zamanla modunu sabitlemesine yardımcı oldu.

english_meaning: a sum of money or something else of value risked on the outcome of a venture or contest

examples.english: They have a significant stake in the success of the company.
examples.turkish: Şirketin başarısında önemli bir payları var.

examples.english: Investors often put a stake in innovative startups.
examples.turkish: Yatırımcılar, yenilikçi girişimlere sıklıkla yatırım yaparlar.

examples.english: He raised the stake to increase the pressure on his opponent.
examples.turkish: Rakibini daha fazla zorlamak için bahsi artırdı.

english_meaning: a booth or compartment in a market or other public area; a temporary stop

examples.english: The farmer set up his stall at the local market.
There is a small food stall near the entrance.
examples.turkish: Girişin yanında küçük bir yiyecek tezgahı var.

examples.english: The car came to a sudden stall in traffic.

english_meaning: a way of standing; an attitude or position in a debate

examples.english: Her stance on environmental issues is well-known.
He assumed a defensive stance during the debate.
examples.turkish: Tartışma sırasında savunmacı bir duruş sergiledi.

examples.english: The politician's stance changed after new evidence emerged.
examples.turkish: Siyasetçinin duruşu, yeni kanıtlar ortaya çıktıktan sonra değişti.

english_meaning: existing, current; having a specified social status

examples.english: He has a good standing in the community.
examples.turkish: Toplum içinde saygın bir konuma sahip.

examples.english: The standing committee meets every month.
Her academic standing is among the best in her class.
examples.turkish: Akademik başarı sıralaması sınıfında en iyiler arasındadır.

english_meaning: severe or bare in appearance or outline; complete

examples.english: The landscape was stark and barren.
There was a stark contrast between the rich and the poor.
examples.turkish: Zengin ile fakir arasında belirgin bir fark vardı.

examples.english: The report gave a stark warning about the future.
examples.turkish: Rapor, gelecekle ilgili açıkça sert bir uyarı verdi.

english_meaning: to suffer or die from lack of food

examples.english: Many people starved during the harsh winter.
examples.turkish: Sert kış mevsiminde birçok insan açlıktan öldü.

examples.english: If the supply chain fails, the animals may starve.
examples.turkish: Tedarik zinciri aksarsa, hayvanlar aç kalabilir.

examples.english: The community was on the verge of starve due to the drought.
examples.turkish: Kuraklık nedeniyle topluluk açlığa mahkum oluyordu.

english_meaning: relating to the use of statistics

examples.english: They conducted a statistical analysis of the survey data.
examples.turkish: Anket verileri üzerinde istatistiksel analiz yaptılar.

examples.english: Statistical methods are essential for scientific research.
examples.turkish: Bilimsel araştırmalar için istatistiksel yöntemler gereklidir.

examples.english: The report provided statistical evidence to support the findings.
examples.turkish: Rapor, bulguları desteklemek için istatistiksel kanıtlar sundu.

english_meaning: in a regular and even manner

examples.english: The company's profits have been rising steadily.
examples.turkish: Şirketin kârı istikrarlı bir şekilde artıyor.

examples.english: She worked steadily throughout the day.
The population is growing steadily in that region.
examples.turkish: O bölgede nüfus istikrarlı bir şekilde artıyor.

english_meaning: the vapor into which water is converted when heated, forming a white mist of minute water droplets in the air

examples.english: The kettle began to produce steam as the water boiled.
examples.turkish: Su kaynamaya başladığında ketleden buhar çıkmaya başladı.

examples.english: Steam rises from the hot pavement on a summer day.
The engine operates by converting water into steam.

english_meaning: to guide or control the movement of a vehicle, vessel, or aircraft

examples.english: She learned how to steer a car in her driving lesson.
The pilot skillfully steered the plane through the storm.
examples.turkish: Pilot, fırtına sırasında uçağı ustaca yönlendirdi.

examples.english: He struggled to steer the boat in rough waters.

english_meaning: the main body or stalk of a plant; to originate from or be caused by

examples.english: The flower's stem was long and slender.
The conflict stems from historical grievances.
Water flows down the stem of the plant.

english_meaning: a widely held but fixed and oversimplified image or idea of a particular type of person or thing

examples.english: The film challenges common stereotypes about gender roles.
examples.turkish: Film, cinsiyet rollerine ilişkin yaygın stereotipleri sorguluyor.

examples.english: Stereotypes can lead to unfair generalizations about groups of people.
examples.turkish: Stereotipler, belirli insan grupları hakkında adaletsiz genellemelere yol açabilir.

examples.english: It is important to break free from outdated stereotypes.

english_meaning: to encourage interest or activity in something

examples.english: The teacher used games to stimulate the students' interest in math.
examples.turkish: Öğretmen, öğrencilerin matematiğe ilgisini uyandırmak için oyunlar kullandı.

examples.english: Exercise helps stimulate the body's metabolism.
The new policy is expected to stimulate economic growth.
examples.turkish: Yeni politikanın ekonomik büyümeyi teşvik etmesi bekleniyor.

english_meaning: something that incites or quickens action, feeling, or thought

examples.english: The government introduced a stimulus package to boost the economy.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, ekonomiyi canlandırmak için bir teşvik paketi başlattı.

examples.english: A sudden noise acted as a stimulus, startling everyone.
examples.turkish: Ani bir ses, herkesi ürküterek bir tetikleyici oldu.

examples.english: The scientist studied the stimulus response in the experiment.
examples.turkish: Bilim insanı, deneyde uyarıya verilen tepkiyi inceledi.

english_meaning: to mix a substance in a liquid or to cause movement or activity

examples.english: Please stir the soup before serving.
The controversial remark stirred a heated debate.
examples.turkish: Tartışmalı açıklama, hararetli bir tartışmayı ateşledi.

examples.english: He used a spoon to stir the coffee.
examples.turkish: Kahveyi karıştırmak için bir kaşık kullandı.

english_meaning: the action or method of storing something for future use

examples.english: The storage capacity of the new hard drive is impressive.
examples.turkish: Yeni sabit diskin depolama kapasitesi etkileyici.

examples.english: They built additional storage to accommodate their growing inventory.
examples.turkish: Artan stoklarını barındırmak için ek depolama alanı inşa ettiler.

examples.english: Proper storage of food helps maintain its freshness.
examples.turkish: Yiyeceklerin doğru şekilde saklanması, tazeliğini korumasına yardımcı olur.

english_meaning: easy to understand or simple; honest and direct

examples.english: The instructions were straightforward and easy to follow.
examples.turkish: Talimatlar açık ve kolayca takip edilebilirdi.

examples.english: He gave a straightforward answer to the question.
The process is straightforward and efficient.

english_meaning: a force tending to pull or stretch something to an extreme degree; mental or physical stress

examples.english: The long hours at work put a strain on his health.
examples.turkish: Uzun çalışma saatleri sağlığına zarar verdi.

examples.english: She felt the strain of the heavy workload.
examples.turkish: Yoğun iş yükünün getirdiği baskıyı hissetti.

examples.english: The strain on the bridge was evident after the heavy traffic.
examples.turkish: Ağır trafikten dolayı köprüdeki gerilim belli oluyordu.

english_meaning: a single thin length of something, such as thread, fiber, or hair

examples.english: She found a strand of hair on her dress.
A single strand of evidence can be crucial in an investigation.
examples.turkish: Bir tek ipucu, soruşturmada çok önemli olabilir.

examples.english: The artist used strands of fiber to create a textured sculpture.
examples.turkish: Sanatçı, dokulu bir heykel oluşturmak için lif iplikleri kullandı.

english_meaning: relating to the identification of long-term aims and interests and the means of achieving them

examples.english: They made a strategic decision to enter the new market.
examples.turkish: Yeni pazara girmek için stratejik bir karar verdiler.

examples.english: The military planned a strategic attack on the enemy base.
examples.turkish: Ordu, düşman üssüne stratejik bir saldırı planladı.

examples.english: Her strategic vision helped the company grow rapidly.
examples.turkish: Onun stratejik vizyonu, şirketin hızla büyümesine yardımcı oldu.

english_meaning: to make or become stronger

examples.english: Regular exercise helps to strengthen muscles.
They implemented new policies to strengthen the economy.
examples.turkish: Ekonomiyi güçlendirmek için yeni politikalar uyguladılar.

examples.english: The coach worked to strengthen the team's defense.
examples.turkish: Antrenör, takımın savunmasını güçlendirmek için çalıştı.

english_meaning: in a strict manner; exactly

examples.english: The rules must be followed strictly.
They adhere strictly to the company's guidelines.
examples.turkish: Şirketin yönergelerine sıkı sıkıya bağlı kalırlar.

examples.english: The children were strictly supervised during the field trip.
examples.turkish: Çocuklar gezi sırasında sıkı bir şekilde denetlendi.

english_meaning: attracting attention by reason of being unusual, extreme, or prominent

examples.english: Her striking appearance turned heads wherever she went.
examples.turkish: Çarpıcı görünümü, gittiği her yerde dikkat çekti.

examples.english: The building's architecture is truly striking.
A striking contrast was visible between the two paintings.
examples.turkish: İki tablo arasında çarpıcı bir zıtlık vardı.

english_meaning: a long, narrow piece of material or land

examples.english: The fabric came in a long strip.
examples.turkish: Kumaş uzun bir şerit halinde geldi.

examples.english: They laid a strip of carpet along the hallway.
A strip of land bordered the property.
examples.turkish: Mülkü çevreleyen ince bir arazi vardı.

english_meaning: to remove the covering or outer layer from something; to remove clothing from

examples.english: They stripped the old paint from the walls before repainting.
examples.turkish: Yenilemeden önce duvarlardan eski boyayı sıyırdılar.

examples.english: He stripped off his wet clothes after the rainstorm.
examples.turkish: Yağmur fırtınasından sonra ıslak giysilerini çıkardı.

examples.english: The technician stripped the device to access its components.
examples.turkish: Teknisyen, bileşenlerine erişmek için cihazı söktü.

english_meaning: to make great efforts to achieve or obtain something

examples.english: They strive to achieve excellence in all their endeavors.
examples.turkish: Tüm çabalarında mükemmelliğe ulaşmak için uğraşırlar.

examples.english: She continues to strive for better results every day.
examples.turkish: Her gün daha iyi sonuçlar elde etmek için çabalıyor.

examples.english: He strove to overcome the challenges he faced.
examples.turkish: Karşılaştığı zorlukların üstesinden gelmek için çabaladı.

english_meaning: a sudden, brief movement; a blow delivered with the hand

examples.english: He suffered a stroke of bad luck.
She gave the canvas a gentle stroke with her brush.
examples.turkish: Fırçasıyla tuvale hafif bir darbe yaptı.

examples.english: The boxer delivered a powerful stroke to his opponent.
examples.turkish: Boksör, rakibine güçlü bir yumruk attı.

english_meaning: relating to the arrangement or organization of parts in an entity; fundamental

examples.english: Engineers examined the structural integrity of the building.
The structural design of the bridge is impressive.
Structural changes were necessary to support the new load.

english_meaning: for a limited period of time; not permanently

examples.english: The store is temporarily closed for renovations.
examples.turkish: Mağaza tadilat nedeniyle geçici olarak kapalı.

examples.english: He moved to another city temporarily for work.
examples.turkish: İş için geçici olarak başka bir şehre taşındı.

examples.english: The website is temporarily unavailable due to maintenance.
examples.turkish: Bakım nedeniyle web sitesi geçici olarak kullanılamıyor.

english_meaning: to entice or allure someone to do something that may be unwise or inadvisable

examples.english: The advertisement was designed to tempt customers with discounts.
examples.turkish: Reklam, indirimlerle müşterileri cezbetmek için tasarlandı.

examples.english: She was tempted to skip the meeting, but decided to attend.
examples.turkish: Toplantıyı atlamak için ayartıldı, ancak katılmaya karar verdi.

examples.english: Tempting offers can sometimes lead to poor decisions.
examples.turkish: Çekici teklifler bazen kötü kararlara yol açabilir.

english_meaning: a person who occupies land or property rented from a landlord

examples.english: The tenant signed a one-year lease for the apartment.
examples.turkish: Kiracı, daire için bir yıllık kira sözleşmesi imzaladı.

examples.english: It is the tenant's responsibility to pay rent on time.

examples.turkish: Ev sahibi, kiracılarıyla iyi ilişkiler sürdürdü.

english_meaning: an inclination toward a particular characteristic or type of behavior

examples.english: There is a tendency for teenagers to rebel against authority.
examples.turkish: Ergenlerin otoriteye karşı isyan etme eğilimi vardır.

examples.english: The tendency to procrastinate is common among students.

examples.turkish: İyimserliğe meyilli olması, zorlukların üstesinden gelmesine yardımcı oldu.

english_meaning: soft or delicate in texture or quality; also, showing gentleness and concern

examples.english: The meat was so tender that it melted in your mouth.
examples.turkish: Et o kadar yumuşaktı ki ağızda eriyordu.

examples.english: She gave him a tender smile that warmed his heart.
examples.turkish: Ona kalbini ısıtan nazik bir gülümseme sundu.

examples.english: The tender treatment of the elderly is a social priority.
examples.turkish: Yaşlılara nazik davranış sosyal bir önceliktir.

english_meaning: mental or emotional strain; the state of being stretched tight

examples.english: There was a lot of tension in the meeting after the disagreement.
examples.turkish: Anlaşmazlıktan sonra toplantıda büyük bir gerilim vardı.

examples.english: The tension in the rope was enough to hold the weight.
examples.turkish: İpi gerdiren gerilim, ağırlığı taşıyacak kadar yüksekti.

examples.english: He tried to relieve the tension with a joke.
examples.turkish: Gerilimi bir şaka ile hafifletmeye çalıştı.

english_meaning: the period during which someone holds a job or office

examples.turkish: Şirketin CEO'su olarak uzun bir görev süresi geçirdi.

examples.english: Academic tenure guarantees job security for professors.
examples.turkish: Akademik görev süresi, profesörlere iş güvencesi sağlar.

examples.english: Her tenure at the university was marked by several reforms.
examples.turkish: Üniversitedeki görev süresi, pek çok reformla anıldı.

english_meaning: relating to the end of something; a facility where passengers begin or end a journey

examples.english: The terminal stage of the process was the most critical.

english_meaning: to bring to an end; to conclude

They decided to terminate the project after several setbacks.
examples.turkish: Birkaç aksaklıktan sonra projeyi sonlandırmaya karar verdiler.

examples.english: The meeting was terminated when the decision was reached.

english_meaning: the conditions or stipulations in an agreement or contract

examples.english: They agreed to the terms of the contract without hesitation.

examples.turkish: Müzakereler, anlaşmanın şartlarını yeniden düzenlemeye odaklandı.

english_meaning: a stretch of land, especially with regard to its physical features

examples.english: The rugged terrain made the hike challenging.
They studied the terrain to plan the construction project.
examples.turkish: İnşaat projesini planlamak için araziyi incelediler.

examples.english: The terrain in this region is mostly hilly.

english_meaning: in a very bad or unpleasant way; extremely

The weather was terribly cold last night.

examples.turkish: Final sınavında çok kötü performans sergiledi.

english_meaning: extremely good; excellent

examples.english: She gave a terrific performance on stage.
The meal was terrific and very satisfying.

english_meaning: to cause extreme fear in someone

examples.english: The haunted house is designed to terrify visitors.
examples.turkish: Perili ev, ziyaretçileri korkutmak için tasarlanmıştır.

examples.english: The loud noise terrified the children.

examples.turkish: Toplum önünde konuşma düşüncesi onu korkuttu.

english_meaning: an area of land under the jurisdiction of a ruler or state

examples.english: The lion defends its territory from intruders.

They marked the territory boundaries on the map.

english_meaning: extreme fear

examples.english: The sudden attack filled the city with terror.
examples.turkish: Ani saldırı, şehri dehşet içine aldı.

examples.english: Terror gripped the population after the incident.
examples.turkish: Olaydan sonra halk arasında korku hakim oldu.

examples.english: They lived in constant terror during the war.
examples.turkish: Savaş sırasında sürekli dehşet içinde yaşadılar.

english_meaning: the systematic use of violence to create fear, especially for political purposes

examples.english: Governments around the world are fighting terrorism.
examples.turkish: Dünya genelinde hükümetler terörizme karşı mücadele ediyor.

examples.english: The organization was accused of supporting terrorism.

examples.turkish: Terörizm, küresel ölçekte büyük bir tehdit olmaya devam ediyor.

english_meaning: a person who uses unlawful violence and intimidation, especially against civilians, in the pursuit of political aims

examples.english: The government increased security after a terrorist attack.
examples.turkish: Bir terör saldırısından sonra hükümet güvenliği artırdı.

examples.english: Terrorists are responsible for spreading fear among the public.
examples.turkish: Teröristler, halk arasında korku yaymaktan sorumludur.

examples.english: Authorities arrested several suspected terrorists last week.

english_meaning: to give evidence as a witness in a law court

examples.turkish: Pek çok tanık kazayla ilgili ifade verdi.

examples.english: He refused to testify against his friend.

english_meaning: a formal written or spoken statement, especially one given in a court of law

examples.english: Her testimony was crucial in the court case.

Testimony from multiple sources helped solve the mystery.
examples.turkish: Çeşitli kaynaklardan gelen ifadeler, gizemi çözmeye yardımcı oldu.

english_meaning: the act of conducting a test or evaluation

examples.english: The testing of the new software will begin tomorrow.
examples.turkish: Yeni yazılımın test edilmesi yarın başlayacak.

examples.english: They conducted rigorous testing to ensure quality.
examples.turkish: Kaliteyi sağlamak için titiz testler yaptılar.

examples.english: The product went through several rounds of testing before release.
examples.turkish: Ürün, piyasaya çıkmadan önce birkaç tur testten geçti.

english_meaning: a book used as a standard work for the study of a particular subject

examples.english: She bought a new textbook for her chemistry class.
examples.turkish: Kimya dersi için yeni bir ders kitabı aldı.

examples.english: Textbooks are essential resources for academic learning.
examples.turkish: Ders kitapları, akademik öğrenme için temel kaynaklardır.

english_meaning: the feel, appearance, or consistency of a surface or a substance

examples.turkish: Sanatçılar, eserlerindeki dokuya büyük özen gösterirler.

examples.english: The texture of the painting adds depth to the scene.

english_meaning: in a way that expresses gratitude

english_meaning: relating to the theater or drama; overly dramatic

examples.english: Her performance was very theatrical and engaging.

examples.turkish: Yönetmenin hikaye anlatımında tiyatral bir yaklaşımı var.

examples.english: The decorations had a theatrical quality that impressed the audience.
examples.turkish: Dekorasyonlar, seyircileri etkileyen tiyatral bir özellik taşıyordu.

english_meaning: the study of the nature of the divine, religious beliefs, and the practice of religious faith

examples.english: She decided to major in theology at university.

The study of theology has evolved over the centuries.

english_meaning: concerned with theories rather than their practical applications

examples.turkish: Profesör, kuantum fiziğinin teorik yönlerini açıkladı.

examples.turkish: Araştırması çok teoriktir ve soyut kavramlara odaklanır.

english_meaning: a person trained to provide treatment and rehabilitation in therapy

examples.turkish: Terapist, iyileşme için değerli öneriler sundu.

examples.english: He works as a family therapist in a community clinic.
examples.turkish: Toplum kliniğinde aile terapisti olarak çalışıyor.

english_meaning: after that; subsequently

examples.english: He graduated in 2010 and worked in finance thereafter.

examples.turkish: Edebiyat alanında yüksek lisans tezi üzerinde çalışıyor.

examples.english: The thesis argued for a new interpretation of historical events.
examples.turkish: Tez, tarihi olaylara yeni bir yorum getirdi.

examples.english: His thesis received high praise from the examiners.

english_meaning: complete with regard to every detail; not superficial or partial

examples.english: The report provided a thorough analysis of the problem.
examples.turkish: Rapor, sorunun kapsamlı bir analizini sundu.

examples.english: She is known for her thorough approach to research.

english_meaning: in a thorough manner; completely

examples.turkish: İmzalamadan önce belgeyi tamamen gözden geçirdiler.

english_meaning: showing consideration for the needs of others; reflective

examples.english: She wrote a thoughtful letter to express her gratitude.

english_meaning: extremely pleased and excited

english_meaning: to make or become tight or tighter

examples.english: The timing of his arrival was perfect.

examples.english: The doctor examined the tissue sample under a microscope.

examples.english: The tissue paper was very soft and delicate.
examples.turkish: Mendil kağıdı çok yumuşak ve narindi.

english_meaning: a plant cultivated for its leaves which are smoked or chewed

examples.english: The government has introduced strict regulations on tobacco sales.
examples.turkish: Hükümet, tütün satışları için sıkı düzenlemeler getirdi.

examples.turkish: Farklı kültürler arasında hoşgörü ve anlayışı teşvik ettiler.

examples.english: I cannot tolerate such rude behavior.

examples.turkish: Herhangi bir ayrımcılığa hoşgörü göstermeye istekli değiller.

english_meaning: the cost in terms of loss or suffering; a charge payable for use of a bridge or road

examples.english: The long-term toll of the crisis was evident in the economy.

english_meaning: to reach or surpass a specified level or limit; to defeat or beat

The film topped the box office charts for several weeks.
examples.turkish: Film, birkaç hafta boyunca gişe rekorlarını kırdı.

english_meaning: the act of inflicting severe pain as a punishment or as a means of coercion; to cause extreme pain or suffering

examples.english: They vowed never to use torture as a means of punishment.

examples.english: The documentary explored the history of torture in ancient times.

english_meaning: to add up; to reach a final amount

english_meaning: a series of contests between a number of competitors, who compete for an overall prize

examples.turkish: Satranç turnuvası, dünyanın dört bir yanından oyuncuları çekti.

examples.english: She won the tennis tournament last summer.
They are preparing for the upcoming gaming tournament.

english_meaning: poisonous; very harmful or unpleasant

examples.english: The chemical waste was extremely toxic.

They removed all toxic substances from the laboratory.

english_meaning: to find or discover by investigation; a small amount or sign of something

english_meaning: a symbol, word, or words legally registered or established by use as representing a company or product

examples.turkish: Yüksek kaliteli ürünleri ve güçlü ticari markaları ile tanınıyorlar.

examples.english: Violating a trademark can lead to legal consequences.
examples.turkish: Ticari marka ihlali yasal sonuçlara yol açabilir.

english_meaning: the activity or business of buying and selling goods and services

english_meaning: an event causing great suffering, destruction, or distress

examples.english: The play is a tragedy that tells of lost love.
examples.turkish: Oyun, kaybedilen aşkı anlatan bir trajedidir.

examples.english: The natural disaster was a tragedy for the entire region.
examples.turkish: Doğal felaket, tüm bölge için bir trajedi oldu.

examples.english: He wrote a novel based on a real-life tragedy.
examples.turkish: Gerçek bir trajediye dayalı bir roman yazdı.

english_meaning: causing or characterized by extreme distress or sorrow

examples.english: The play's tragic ending left the audience in tears.

examples.turkish: Birçok can alan trajik bir kazaydı.

examples.english: Her life took a tragic turn after the loss.
examples.turkish: Kaybın ardından hayatı trajik bir hal aldı.

english_meaning: a path or track laid down for walking; to follow or lag behind

examples.english: We followed a trail through the forest.

examples.turkish: Uzakta hafif bir duman izi görünüyordu.

english_meaning: a vehicle designed for being towed by a motor vehicle; a short preview of a movie

examples.english: The movie trailer gave a glimpse of the upcoming film.

english_meaning: a distinguishing quality or characteristic, typically one belonging to a person

examples.english: Honesty is a trait that is highly valued.
examples.turkish: Dürüstlük, çok değer verilen bir özelliktir.

examples.english: She has a friendly trait that endears her to others.
examples.turkish: Onun dostça bir özelliği, onu başkalarına sevdirtir.

examples.english: A sense of humor is an admirable trait.
examples.turkish: Mizah duygusu takdire şayan bir özelliktir.

english_meaning: an instance of buying or selling something; a business deal

examples.english: The transaction was completed online.

english_meaning: a written or printed version of material originally presented in another medium

examples.turkish: Mahkeme, duruşmanın metin kaydını talep etti.

examples.english: The transcript of the lecture was available online.

english_meaning: a marked change in form, nature, or appearance

examples.english: The transformation of the city over the past decade is remarkable.
examples.turkish: Geçtiğimiz on yılda şehrin dönüşümü dikkate değerdir.

examples.english: Digital technology has brought about a transformation in the way we communicate.
examples.turkish: Dijital teknoloji, iletişim şeklimizde büyük bir dönüşüme yol açtı.

examples.english: The company's transformation led to a significant increase in profits.
examples.turkish: Şirketin dönüşümü, kârlarında önemli bir artışa neden oldu.

english_meaning: the act or process of moving goods or people from one place to another

examples.english: Public transit systems are essential in large cities.
examples.turkish: Büyük şehirlerde toplu taşıma sistemleri esastır.

examples.english: The transit time for the shipment was two days.
Efficient transit networks reduce commute times.
examples.turkish: Verimli transit ağları, işe gidiş sürelerini azaltır.

english_meaning: the act or process of sending something from one place to another

examples.english: The transmission of the signal was disrupted by interference.
They studied the transmission of genetic traits in families.
Efficient transmission of data is critical in modern communications.
examples.turkish: Modern iletişimde verilerin verimli aktarımı kritiktir.

english_meaning: to send or convey from one person or place to another

examples.english: The radio station transmits signals across the region.
examples.turkish: Radyo istasyonu, sinyalleri bölge genelinde iletir.

examples.english: Diseases can be transmitted through contact.
He used email to transmit the document.

english_meaning: the quality of being done in an open way without secrets

examples.english: Transparency in government is essential for democracy.
The company promised greater transparency in its financial reports.
examples.turkish: Şirket, mali raporlarında daha fazla şeffaflık sözü verdi.

examples.english: Transparency helps build trust with the public.

english_meaning: allowing light to pass through so that objects behind can be distinctly seen; easy to perceive or detect

examples.english: The glass is completely transparent.
The company prides itself on its transparent policies.
Her motives were transparent to everyone.

english_meaning: to catch or hold someone or something in a particular place, typically by trickery or force; a device used for catching animals

examples.english: The mouse was trapped in a humane trap.
They set a trap for the burglar.
examples.turkish: Hırsızı yakalamak için bir tuzak kurdular.

examples.english: He felt trapped in a cycle of poverty.

english_meaning: a deeply distressing or disturbing experience

examples.english: The accident left her with severe emotional trauma.
examples.turkish: Kaza, ona ciddi duygusal travma yaşattı.

examples.english: He struggled to overcome the trauma of his past.
Therapy can help individuals heal from trauma.
examples.turkish: Terapiler, bireylerin travmalarından iyileşmelerine yardımcı olabilir.

english_meaning: a quantity of precious metals, gems, or other valuable objects

examples.english: The pirates buried their treasure on a remote island.
examples.turkish: Korsanlar, hazinelerini ıssız bir adada gömdüler.

examples.english: She regarded the old watch as a family treasure.
examples.turkish: Eski saati aile hazinesi olarak gördü.

examples.english: They discovered a hidden treasure in the ruins.

english_meaning: a formally concluded and ratified agreement between states

examples.english: The two countries signed a peace treaty.
examples.turkish: İki ülke bir barış antlaşması imzaladı.

examples.english: Treaties are essential for maintaining international relations.
examples.turkish: Antlaşmalar, uluslararası ilişkilerin sürdürülmesi için esastır.

examples.english: The treaty was hailed as a historic achievement.
examples.turkish: Antlaşma tarihi bir başarı olarak karşılandı.

english_meaning: very great in amount, scale, or intensity

examples.english: The project required a tremendous amount of effort.
She showed tremendous courage in the face of adversity.
They achieved tremendous growth last year.
examples.turkish: Geçen yıl olağanüstü bir büyüme kaydettiler.

english_meaning: relating to a tribe or tribes

examples.english: The museum displayed tribal artifacts from various cultures.
examples.turkish: Müze, çeşitli kültürlerden kabile eserlerini sergiledi.

examples.english: Tribal customs are still practiced in remote regions.
examples.turkish: Uzak bölgelerde hala kabile gelenekleri uygulanıyor.

examples.english: They studied tribal music to understand their heritage.
examples.turkish: Miraslarını anlamak için kabile müziğini incelediler.

english_meaning: a social division in a traditional society consisting of families or communities linked by social, economic, religious, or blood ties

examples.english: The tribe gathered for a traditional ceremony.
examples.turkish: Kabile, geleneksel bir tören için toplandı.

examples.english: Many indigenous tribes maintain their ancient traditions.
examples.turkish: Pek çok yerli kabile eski geleneklerini sürdürüyor.

examples.english: He learned a lot about the tribe's history during his travels.
examples.turkish: Seyahatleri sırasında kabile tarihi hakkında çok şey öğrendi.

english_meaning: an act, statement, or gift that is intended to show gratitude, respect, or admiration

examples.english: They paid tribute to the retiring coach with a special ceremony.
examples.turkish: Emekli olan antrenöre özel bir törenle övgüde bulundular.

examples.english: The film is a tribute to classic cinema.
Her speech was a heartfelt tribute to her mentor.
examples.turkish: Konuşması, mentörüne içten bir övgü niteliğindeydi.

english_meaning: to cause an event or situation to happen or exist; a stimulus

examples.english: The news triggered a wave of protests across the country.
examples.turkish: Haber, ülke genelinde protesto dalgasını tetikledi.

examples.english: A loud noise can trigger an alarm system.

examples.turkish: Stres, onun migrenlerini tetikleyen bir faktördür.

english_meaning: the number equivalent to 1,000,000,000,000

examples.english: The national debt is estimated to be over two trillion dollars.
examples.turkish: Ulusal borç, iki trilyon dolardan fazla olarak tahmin ediliyor.

examples.english: It is hard to imagine a trillion grains of sand on the beach.
examples.turkish: Plajda bir trilyon tane kum tanesi hayal etmek zordur.

examples.english: The company's valuation reached a trillion dollars.
examples.turkish: Şirketin değeri bir trilyon dolara ulaştı.

english_meaning: a group of three people or things

examples.english: The musical trio performed a beautiful piece.
examples.turkish: Müzikal trio, güzel bir eser sergiledi.

examples.english: They formed a trio to compete in the contest.
examples.turkish: Yarışmaya katılmak için bir üçlü oluşturdular.

examples.english: A trio of friends went on a road trip.
examples.turkish: Üç arkadaş, birlikte bir yolculuğa çıktılar.

english_meaning: a great victory or achievement

examples.english: Her triumph over adversity inspired many.
examples.turkish: Zorlukların üstesinden gelmesi, pek çok kişiye ilham verdi.

examples.english: The team's triumph in the championship was celebrated widely.
examples.turkish: Takımın şampiyonluk zaferi geniş çapta kutlandı.

examples.english: The historic triumph marked a turning point in the war.
examples.turkish: Tarihi zafer, savaşta bir dönüm noktası oldu.

english_meaning: a group of soldiers, especially a cavalry or armored unit

examples.english: A troop of soldiers marched into the city.
The troop was deployed to the conflict zone.
He joined a troop of scouts in his youth.

english_meaning: a cup or other decorative object awarded as a prize for a victory or success

examples.english: The team proudly displayed their trophy.
She won a trophy for first place in the competition.
The trophy symbolizes years of hard work and dedication.
examples.turkish: Kupa, yıllarca süren emek ve özveriyi simgeler.

english_meaning: experiencing difficulty or problems

examples.english: He has been troubled by financial issues for years.
The troubled youth found solace in art.
The region has a long history of troubled times.
examples.turkish: Bölge, uzun bir dertli geçmişe sahiptir.

english_meaning: a person given responsibility for the administration of someone else's property or affairs

examples.english: She was appointed as the trustee of the estate.
The trustee is responsible for managing the trust fund.
He served as a trustee for the charity organization.
examples.turkish: Hayır kurumu için vekil olarak görev yaptı.

english_meaning: a long high sea wave caused by an earthquake or other disturbance

examples.english: The tsunami caused widespread destruction along the coast.
examples.turkish: Tsunami, kıyı boyunca geniş çaplı yıkıma neden oldu.

examples.english: Authorities issued a tsunami warning after the earthquake.
examples.turkish: Depremden sonra yetkililer tsunami uyarısı verdi.

examples.english: Many lives were lost during the devastating tsunami.
examples.turkish: Yıkıcı tsunamide pek çok can kaybı yaşandı.

english_meaning: the fee that is charged by educational institutions for instruction

examples.english: Tuition fees have risen sharply over the past decade.
examples.turkish: Öğrenim ücretleri son on yılda hızla arttı.

examples.english: She applied for a scholarship to help cover her tuition.
examples.turkish: Öğrenim ücretini karşılamak için burs başvurusunda bulundu.

examples.english: Many students struggle to pay their tuition on time.
examples.turkish: Pek çok öğrenci, öğrenim ücretini zamanında ödemekte zorlanıyor.

english_meaning: an abnormal mass of tissue that forms when cells divide more than they should or do not die when they should

examples.english: The doctor detected a tumor during the routine examination.
examples.turkish: Doktor, rutin muayene sırasında bir tümör tespit etti.

examples.english: Early detection of a tumor can significantly improve treatment outcomes.
examples.turkish: Bir tümörün erken tespiti, tedavi sonuçlarını önemli ölçüde iyileştirebilir.

examples.english: He underwent surgery to remove the tumor.

english_meaning: the number of people who attend or take part in an event

examples.english: The turnout at the rally was impressive.
Voter turnout is an important indicator of a healthy democracy.
examples.turkish: Seçmen katılımı, sağlıklı bir demokrasinin önemli göstergesidir.

examples.english: The event's high turnout exceeded all expectations.
examples.turkish: Etkinliğin yüksek katılımı tüm beklentileri aştı.

english_meaning: the amount of business done in a particular period; the rate at which employees leave a workforce

examples.english: The company's turnover increased dramatically last year.
examples.turkish: Şirketin cirosu geçen yıl dramatik şekilde arttı.

examples.english: High employee turnover can be a sign of organizational problems.
examples.turkish: Yüksek iş gücü değişim hızı, kurumsal sorunların bir göstergesi olabilir.

examples.english: They are working to reduce turnover by improving working conditions.
examples.turkish: Çalışma koşullarını iyileştirerek iş gücü değişimini azaltmaya çalışıyorlar.

english_meaning: to turn something about its axis; a sudden change or unexpected turn in events

examples.english: She twisted the cap off the bottle.
The plot of the novel had an unexpected twist.
examples.turkish: Romanın kurgusunda beklenmedik bir dönüş vardı.

examples.english: He twisted his ankle during the game.

english_meaning: being or happening at the end of a process; final

examples.english: The ultimate goal of the project is to improve public health.
examples.turkish: Projenin nihai hedefi, kamu sağlığını iyileştirmektir.

examples.english: After years of hard work, she achieved her ultimate dream.
examples.turkish: Yıllarca süren çalışmanın ardından nihai hayaline ulaştı.

examples.english: This is the ultimate test of his abilities.

english_meaning: not satisfactory or allowable

examples.english: The behavior was completely unacceptable.
Such errors are unacceptable in a professional setting.
examples.turkish: Böyle hatalar profesyonel bir ortamda kabul edilemez.

examples.english: The company refused to accept the unacceptable terms.
examples.turkish: Şirket, kabul edilemez şartları kabul etmeyi reddetti.

english_meaning: the state of being uncertain; lack of sureness

examples.english: Economic uncertainty has led to decreased investment.
examples.turkish: Ekonomik belirsizlik, yatırımlarda azalmaya yol açtı.

examples.english: The uncertainty of the situation made everyone nervous.
He faced uncertainty about his future career.

english_meaning: not in accordance with a political constitution, especially the US Constitution

examples.english: The law was declared unconstitutional by the court.
examples.turkish: Yasa, mahkeme tarafından anayasalara aykırı ilan edildi.

examples.english: Many activists argue that the policy is unconstitutional.
examples.turkish: Birçok aktivist, politikanın anayasalara aykırı olduğunu savunuyor.

examples.english: They filed a lawsuit claiming the decision was unconstitutional.
examples.turkish: Kararın anayasalara aykırı olduğunu iddia ederek dava açtılar.

english_meaning: to experience or be subjected to (something, typically something unpleasant or arduous)

examples.english: She had to undergo surgery after the accident.
examples.turkish: Kaza sonrası ameliyat olmak zorunda kaldı.

examples.english: Many patients undergo chemotherapy for cancer treatment.
examples.turkish: Birçok hasta, kanser tedavisi için kemoterapiye maruz kalır.

examples.english: He will undergo training before starting his new job.
examples.turkish: Yeni işine başlamadan önce eğitimden geçecek.

english_meaning: a university student who has not yet received a first degree

examples.english: She is an undergraduate studying biology.
examples.turkish: O, biyoloji okuyan bir lisans öğrencisidir.

examples.english: Undergraduates are required to complete a set number of credits.
examples.turkish: Lisans öğrencilerinin belirli kredi sayısını tamamlaması gerekmektedir.

examples.english: The university offers various resources for undergraduates.
examples.turkish: Üniversite, lisans öğrencileri için çeşitli kaynaklar sunar.

english_meaning: present or existing beneath the surface; fundamental

examples.english: The underlying cause of the problem was not immediately apparent.
examples.turkish: Sorunun temel nedeni hemen fark edilmedi.

examples.english: They addressed the underlying issues during the meeting.

english_meaning: to weaken or subvert the foundation, power, or authority of something

examples.english: Constant criticism can undermine a person's confidence.
examples.turkish: Sürekli eleştiri, bir kişinin özgüvenini zayıflatabilir.

examples.english: Corruption undermines the trust of the public in government.
examples.turkish: Yolsuzluk, hükümete olan kamu güvenini baltalar.

examples.english: The scandal threatened to undermine the company's reputation.
examples.turkish: Skandal, şirketin itibarını zayıflatma tehlikesi yarattı.

english_meaning: to commit oneself to and begin (an enterprise or responsibility); to take on

examples.english: She will undertake the project with great enthusiasm.

examples.turkish: Yeni bir meydan okumayı üstlenmeye karar verdiler.

examples.english: He undertook the responsibility of organizing the event.

english_meaning: without doubt; certainly

examples.english: She is undoubtedly the best candidate for the job.
examples.turkish: İş için şüphesiz en iyi aday o.

examples.english: Undoubtedly, the film was a major success.
He is undoubtedly talented in music.

english_meaning: to open or spread out from a folded state; to reveal gradually

examples.english: The events began to unfold slowly.
She unfolded the map to show us the route.
examples.turkish: Bize güzergahı göstermek için haritayı açtı.

examples.english: The mystery began to unfold as the investigation continued.
examples.turkish: Soruşturma devam ederken gizem ortaya çıkmaya başladı.

english_meaning: unlucky; causing unhappiness or disaster

examples.english: It was an unfortunate accident.
Her remarks had unfortunate consequences.
He made an unfortunate decision.

english_meaning: to make or become united, uniform, or whole

examples.english: The leader aimed to unify the divided communities.

They worked together to unify their ideas.

english_meaning: to come or bring together for a common purpose

examples.english: They united in their efforts to help the community.

examples.turkish: Takım, ortak bir amaç etrafında birleşti.

english_meaning: the state of being united or joined as a whole

examples.english: The country's unity was evident during the national celebration.
examples.turkish: Ülkenin birliği, ulusal kutlamada belli oldu.

examples.english: They worked hard to promote unity among the diverse groups.
examples.turkish: Farklı gruplar arasında birlik sağlamak için çok çalıştılar.

examples.english: Unity in the community is essential for progress.

english_meaning: applicable to all cases; affecting or done by all people or things

examples.english: The theory has universal appeal.

english_meaning: never done or known before; without previous example

examples.english: The team achieved unprecedented success.
examples.turkish: Takım benzeri görülmemiş bir başarı elde etti.

examples.english: There was unprecedented support for the initiative.
examples.turkish: Girişime eşi benzeri görülmemiş destek oldu.

examples.english: The event was marked by unprecedented levels of participation.
examples.turkish: Etkinlik, eşi benzeri görülmemiş katılım oranlarıyla dikkat çekti.

english_meaning: to show or announce publicly for the first time

examples.english: The company will unveil its new product next month.
examples.turkish: Şirket, yeni ürününü gelecek ay tanıtacak.

examples.english: They unveiled the statue at the ceremony.
The artist unveiled her latest work at the gallery.

english_meaning: about to happen or take place; forthcoming

examples.english: I am excited about the upcoming concert.
The upcoming election will be closely watched.
They are preparing for several upcoming events.

english_meaning: to raise to a higher standard or improve (equipment, software, etc.); an improvement or update

examples.english: We need to upgrade our computer system.
The new upgrade has improved the performance of the device.
They offered a free upgrade to premium service.

english_meaning: to support or maintain (a law, principle, or decision)

examples.english: The court upheld the previous ruling.
They vowed to uphold the values of the organization.
It is important to uphold human rights.

english_meaning: requiring immediate action or attention

examples.english: There is an urgent need for medical supplies.
She received an urgent message from her boss.
The situation calls for urgent measures.

english_meaning: the manner in which something is used; the action of using something

examples.english: The usage of mobile phones has increased dramatically.
examples.turkish: Cep telefonu kullanımı büyük ölçüde arttı.

examples.english: Proper usage of the tool is essential for safety.
examples.turkish: Aletin doğru kullanımı güvenlik için gereklidir.

examples.english: The manual explains the usage of the new software.

english_meaning: not useful; not serving any practical purpose

examples.english: The broken tool was completely useless.
He felt useless after the failure.
examples.turkish: Başarısızlıktan sonra kendini işe yaramaz hissetti.

examples.english: The instructions were useless and confusing.

english_meaning: the quality of being useful or beneficial; a public service (such as electricity, water, etc.)

examples.english: The utility of the new software was immediately apparent.
examples.turkish: Yeni yazılımın yararlılığı hemen belli oldu.

examples.english: They measure the utility of the project in terms of cost savings.
He paid his utility bills on time.

english_meaning: to make practical and effective use of something

examples.english: We need to utilize all available resources.
The company utilizes advanced technology to improve efficiency.
examples.turkish: Şirket, verimliliği artırmak için gelişmiş teknolojiden yararlanır.

examples.english: She utilized her skills to solve the problem.

english_meaning: completely; absolutely

examples.english: I was utterly surprised by the news.
The movie was utterly disappointing.
He was utterly convinced of his decision.

english_meaning: a space entirely devoid of matter; a device for cleaning by suction

examples.english: The scientist studied the effects of a vacuum on materials.
examples.turkish: Bilim insanı, vakumun malzemeler üzerindeki etkilerini inceledi.

examples.english: The room was cleaned using a vacuum cleaner.
A vacuum exists in outer space.

english_meaning: unclear or not clearly expressed

examples.english: His explanation was vague and left us confused.
examples.turkish: Onun açıklaması belirsizdi ve bizi karıştırdı.

examples.english: The details of the plan remain vague.

examples.turkish: Soruyu yanıtsız bırakarak belirsiz cevap verdi.

english_meaning: well-founded, sound, or legally binding

examples.english: The contract is legally valid.

examples.turkish: Tartışma sırasında geçerli bir argüman sundu.

examples.english: Make sure your ticket is still valid for entry.
examples.turkish: Biletinizin hala geçerli olduğundan emin olun.

english_meaning: the quality of being logically or factually sound; soundness

examples.english: The validity of the research was questioned by experts.
They examined the validity of his claims.
Ensuring the validity of data is crucial for accurate results.
examples.turkish: Verinin doğruluğunu sağlamak, doğru sonuçlar için çok önemlidir.

english_meaning: to disappear suddenly and completely

examples.english: The magician made the rabbit vanish from the hat.
All my worries vanished after the vacation.
examples.turkish: Tatil sonrası tüm dertlerim yok oldu.

examples.english: The fog began to vanish as the sun rose.

english_meaning: capable of changing; an element, feature, or factor that is liable to vary or change

examples.english: The weather in this region is highly variable.

His mood is as variable as the weather.

english_meaning: a change or slight difference in condition, amount, or level

examples.english: There is a noticeable variation in temperature between day and night.
examples.turkish: Gündüz ve gece arasında belirgin bir sıcaklık farkı var.

examples.english: The recipe allows for slight variation in ingredients.
examples.turkish: Tarifte malzemelerde hafif bir farklılığa izin veriliyor.

examples.english: He observed variations in the results of the experiment.

english_meaning: incorporating a number of different types; showing variety

examples.english: The museum has a varied collection of art from around the world.
examples.turkish: Müze, dünyanın dört bir yanından çeşitli sanat eserlerine sahip.

examples.english: Her interests are varied, ranging from music to literature.
examples.turkish: Onun ilgi alanları müzikten edebiyata kadar çeşitlidir.

examples.english: They enjoyed a varied menu at the restaurant.
examples.turkish: Restoranda çeşitli bir menünün keyfini çıkardılar.

english_meaning: a blood vessel that carries blood toward the heart; a distinctive style or quality

examples.english: The doctor examined the vein for signs of blockage.
examples.turkish: Doktor, tıkanıklık belirtileri için damarı inceledi.

examples.english: Her writing has a humorous vein running through it.
examples.turkish: Yazılarında sürekli esprili bir üslup var.

examples.english: The miner extracted ore from a rich vein in the rock.
examples.turkish: Madenci, kayadan zengin bir damar üzerinden maden çıkardı.

english_meaning: a risky or daring journey or undertaking; to dare to do something risky

examples.english: They started a new business venture in the tech industry.
examples.turkish: Teknoloji sektöründe yeni bir girişim başlattılar.

examples.english: He ventured into the forest despite the warnings.
examples.turkish: Uyarılara rağmen ormana girmeye cesaret etti.

examples.english: The venture proved to be successful in the long run.

english_meaning: relating to or in the form of words; spoken rather than written

examples.english: They reached a verbal agreement before signing the contract.
examples.turkish: Sözleşmeyi imzalamadan önce sözlü bir anlaşmaya vardılar.

examples.english: Her verbal skills are excellent.
The dispute was resolved through verbal negotiation.

english_meaning: a decision on a disputed issue in a civil or criminal case, especially one made by a jury

examples.english: The jury delivered a guilty verdict.
The verdict shocked everyone in the courtroom.
He awaited the verdict with great anxiety.

english_meaning: to make sure or demonstrate that something is true, accurate, or justified

examples.english: Please verify your account information before proceeding.
examples.turkish: Lütfen devam etmeden önce hesap bilgilerinizi doğrulayın.

examples.english: The engineer verified the calculations for accuracy.
They need to verify the results of the experiment.

english_meaning: a line of poetry or a stanza

examples.english: The poet wrote a beautiful verse about nature.
examples.turkish: Şair, doğa hakkında güzel bir dize yazdı.

examples.english: Each verse of the song has a unique rhythm.
examples.turkish: Şarkının her dizesi benzersiz bir ritme sahiptir.

examples.english: She memorized a verse from her favorite poem.
examples.turkish: En sevdiği şiirin bir dizisini ezbere öğrendi.

english_meaning: against; in contrast to

examples.english: The game will be Team A versus Team B.
examples.turkish: Maç, A Takımı ile B Takımı arasında olacak.

examples.english: It's a battle of tradition versus innovation.
examples.turkish: Bu, gelenek ile yenilik arasındaki bir mücadele.

examples.english: The debate was framed as freedom versus control.
examples.turkish: Tartışma, özgürlük ile kontrol arasındaki zıtlık olarak sunuldu.

english_meaning: at right angles to the horizon; upright

examples.english: The climbers scaled the vertical rock face.

examples.turkish: Dikey çizgiler, resimde yükseklik hissi yaratabilir.

examples.english: The building has a striking vertical design.
examples.turkish: Bina dikkat çekici bir dikey tasarıma sahip.

english_meaning: a ship or large boat; a container for holding something

examples.english: The vessel sailed across the stormy sea.
The blood vessel was examined by the doctor.
They stored the liquid in a sealed vessel.

english_meaning: a person who has had long experience in a particular field, especially military service

examples.english: The veteran shared his experiences from the war.

examples.english: Veterans are honored on special days of remembrance.

examples.english: The proposal is viable and has received positive feedback.

english_meaning: full of energy and life; bright and striking

examples.english: The vibrant colors of the painting were mesmerizing.

examples.english: The city is known for its vibrant nightlife.

examples.english: The film explored the vices of modern society.

english_meaning: to break or fail to comply with (a rule or formal agreement)

examples.english: The company was fined for violating environmental regulations.

examples.english: He vowed never to violate his principles.

examples.english: The violation of the law led to severe penalties.

examples.english: There have been several violations of company policy recently.

english_meaning: behavior showing high moral standards; a quality considered morally good

examples.english: Honesty is a virtue that is highly valued.
examples.turkish: Dürüstlük çok değer verilen bir erdemdir.

examples.english: She is known for her virtue and integrity.

examples.turkish: Öğrencinin erdemi ve çalışkanlığı övgüye layıktı.

english_meaning: an endorsement on a passport that allows the holder to enter, leave, or stay in a country for a specified period

examples.english: He applied for a visa to travel to Europe.

english_meaning: relating to the voice; expressing opinions openly

examples.english: He made a vocal objection to the new policy.

english_meaning: done or given of one's own free will; not compelled

english_meaning: a large building where goods are stored

examples.turkish: Bilim insanları, gelecekteki iklim değişikliklerini tahmin etmek için ısınma eğilimlerini inceliyor.

examples.turkish: Solucanlar, organik maddeleri parçalayıp toprağın verimliliğini artırır.

english_meaning: to show reverence and adoration for a deity; to engage in religious service

english_meaning: worth the time, effort, or money spent; beneficial

examples.turkish: Çalışkanlığı, onun terfiye layık olduğunu gösteriyor.

examples.turkish: Gürültü arasında duyulabilmek için haykırmak zorunda kaldı.

english_meaning: to produce or provide; to give way or surrender; the amount produced

examples.english: After much negotiation, he finally yielded to their demands.
